column2: I am now a thorn in His Majesty's mind. As long as I hold military power for a day, His Majesty will not be at ease for a day. Now that I am a criminal, in order not to involve more innocent lives, I might as well go far away and become an ordinary citizen.
column3: ข้าเป็นหนามในใจฝ่าบาทแล้ว ตราบเท่าที่ข้ายึดกุมอำนาจทหารไว้ได้เพียงวันเดียว ฝ่าบาทคงไม่ทรงวางใจ ในเมื่อข้าตกเป็นอาชญากรแล้ว เพื่อไม่ให้ชีวิตผู้บริสุทธิ์มาเกี่ยวข้องอีก ข้าควรออกเดินทาง ไปเป็นประชาชนธรรมดาดีกว่า

column2: I will go to His Majesty to vindicate you, Marshal, and to restore the reputation of Ye Family Battalion. Ye Family Battalion cannot be without a marshal for a day.
column3: ข้าจะไปเข้าเฝ้าฝ่าบาทเพื่อชี้แจงความจริงเกี่ยวกับท่านแม่ทัพ และเพื่อกอบกู้ชื่อเสียงของกองพันตระกูลเย่ กองพันตระกูลเย่ไม่สามารถอยู่ได้โดยปราศจากท่านแม่ทัพ

column2: The latter waves of the Yangtze River push front waves forward, and the new generation surpasses the old.\nIf there is a day when Ye Family Battalion is restarted, having you young people is enough.
column3: คลื่นหลังของแม่น้ำแยงซีเกียงผลักคลื่นหน้าไปข้างหน้า คนรุ่นใหม่ก้าวข้ามคนรุ่นเก่า\nถ้าวันหนึ่งค่ายกองทัพเย่เริ่มต้นใหม่ การมีคนหนุ่มสาวอย่างพวกเจ้าก็เพียงพอแล้ว

column2: Where does the marshal plan to live in seclusion, so I can request to follow at any time.
column3: ท่านแม่ทัพมีแผนจะอาศัยอยู่อย่างสันโดษที่ใด เพื่อพวกข้าจะได้ติดต่อได้ตลอด

column2: I will go wherever I please, north or south. After fighting for a lifetime, I want to go and see the places where I once led the army.
column3: ข้าจะไปทุกที่ ตามใจชอบ เหนือหรือใต้ หลังจากสู้มาทั้งชีวิตก็อยากจะไปดูสถานที่ที่เคยนำทัพมาบ้าง

column2: Yun, you stay and help {PlayerName}. If you act impulsively and ruin the big picture, don't come to see me in the future.
Yes, father.
Alright, from now on, it's young people's world. These old bones of mine should take a rest.
{PlayerName}, I will return to Ye Family Battalion camp first. If there is anything from me, I will accompany you with my life.
Alright, from now on, it's young people's world. These old bones of mine should take a rest.
Where is Marshal Ye now?

Lord Qin promised you that if you can wipe out the Yan Yun Iron Army within ten days. Lord Qin will allow Ye Pengju to walk. Now that the ten-day period has passed, the criminal confessed and was executed.
column3: ใต้เท้าฉินให้สัญญากับเจ้า หากเจ้าสามารถกวาดล้างกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนได้ภายในสิบวัน ใต้เท้าฉินจะอนุญาตให้ปล่อยเย่เผิงจูไปได้ ตอนนี้เวลาสิบวันได้ผ่านไปแล้ว นักโทษได้สารภาพความผิดและถูกประหารแล้ว

column2: You, you...
column3: เจ้า เจ้า...

column2: Lord Qin, Lord Tong has already returned to the palace to report, this matter can't be blamed on me, I am just following the Royal decree.
Because you broke into Supreme Court privately, Lord Qin now treats you as a remnant of Ye Family Battalion. I advise you to take off that uniform and escape as soon as possible.
Qin Huizhi...Tong Daofu...none of you will get away with this!
It's been a long time since I heard such a funny joke.
Lord Qin, this Imperial token is here, will you obey or not?
column3: ใต้เท้าฉิน ตราจักรพรรดินี้อยู่ที่นี่ เจ้าจะเชื่อฟังหรือไม่?

column2: Wait until you survive before you bargain with me.
You are a smart person, but unfortunately, you are not on the same side as the emperor, so I have to ask you to die.
column3: เจ้าเป็นคนฉลาด แต่น่าเสียดายที่เจ้าไม่ได้อยู่ฝ่ายเดียวกับฮ่องเต้ ดังนั้นที่ข้าทำได้เพียงขอให้เจ้าตายสถานเดียว!

column2: You, you dare to assassinate a court official!
Lord Qin is disobeying the Imperial token in secret. If His Majesty knows about this, it will be a big trouble.
column3: ใต้เท้าฉินกำลังขัดคำสั่งตราจักรพรรดิอย่างลับๆ หากฝ่าบาททรงทราบเรื่องนี้คงเป็นปัญหาใหญ่

column2: What do you want!
column3: เจ้าต้องการสิ่งใด!

column2: Release Marshal Ye, declare his innocence, and restore the reputation of Ye Family Battalion.
column3: ปล่อยจอมพลเย่ ประกาศความบริสุทธิ์ของเขาและฟื้นฟูชื่อเสียงของกองพันตระกูลเย่

column2: Release the Ye family father and son, declare Marshal Ye innocent, and restore the reputation of the Ye Family Battalion.
I have no authority to pardon Ye Pengju, today I can only let him leave Supreme Court. But you broke into Supreme Court privately and threatened me, I can't allow this to slide.
column3: ข้าไม่มีสิทธินิรโทษกรรมให้ เย่เผิงจู ทำได้แค่ให้เขาออกจากศาลฎีกาในวันนี้ แต่เจ้าบุกเข้าไปในศาลฎีกาเป็นการส่วนตัวและข่มขู่ข้า ข้าปล่อยให้เรื่องนี้ผ่านไปไม่ได้

column2: I will go to the emperor for an explanation, as for what crime you want to charge me with, it's up to you, as long as you can catch me.
column3: ข้าจะไปเข้าเฝ้าฝ่าบาทเพื่อขอคำอธิบาย ส่วนความผิดใดที่ท่านต้องการลงโทษข้า จะทำอะไรก็ได้ตราบใดที่ท่านจับข้าได้

column2: Marshal Ye, let's go home.
column3: แม่ทัพยี่ กลับบ้านกันเถอะ

column2: {PlayerName}, you've worked hard.
column3: {PlayerName} ลำบากเจ้าแล้ว

column2: I am willing to shatter my body and bones for Marshal Ye. It is my greatest honor to be able to save you.
Alas, because I missed the deadline, Marshal Ye was executed...\nWhat pride do I have to wear this uniform again...
Qin Huizhi...Tong Daofu...none of you will get away with this!

Ye Pengju drank the poison, and went to his death generously.
A generation of loyal officials, a generation of good generals, carrying a full of unwillingness to slowly close their eyes.
Young General Ye Yun willingly accompanied his father to his death, and had no regrets in his life as a Ye family member.
You and some soldiers with a conscience slowly carried the bodies of Ye Pengju and his son, which were still warm, out of the Supreme Court, and no one dared to stop you along the way.
Fortunately, the poison in the wine was neutralized by you, and the Ye family father and son turned danger into safety.
The Ye family father and son, in order not to involve more people, willingly went to live in seclusion in a faraway place, as if they had already died once in this world, and many people can be at ease from now on.
With the departure of the Ye family father and son, the Ye Family Battalion no longer exists, and you are at a loss at this moment.

Ye Pengju drank the poison, and went to his death generously.
A generation of loyal officials, a generation of good generals, carrying a full of unwillingness to slowly close their eyes.
You carry Ye Pengju's still warm body slowly out of the Supreme Court, and no one dares to stop you along the way.
Fortunately, the poison in the wine was neutralized by you, and Ye Pengju turned danger into safety.
Ye Pengju, in order not to involve more people, willingly went to live in seclusion in a faraway place, as if he had already died once in this world, and many people can be at ease from now on.
With the departure of Ye Pengju, the Ye Family Battalion no longer exists, and you are at a loss at this moment.
Chuxiang City has been besieged by the Yan army for several days and is already out of arrows and food.
In order to seek a glimmer of hope, Lü Wenhuan, the Pacifying Envoy of Chuxiang City, finally decides to open the city gates and surrender without a fight.
Thus, the Yan army takes over Chuxiang City without shedding a drop of blood.
column3: ด้วยเหตุนี้ กองทัพเยี่ยนจึงเข้ายึดเมืองฉู่เซียงโดยไม่เสียเลือดแม้แต่หยดเดียว

column2: However, Lü Wenhuan's surrender does not ensure the safety of Chuxiang City's people.\nUnder the command of Wanyan Wuzhu, the Yan army carries out a brutal massacre in Chuxiang City.\nWherever the Yan army advances, not a single living thing is spared, and blood flows like a river, like a living hell.
column3: อย่างไรก็ตาม การยอมจำนนของ ลู่เหวินหวน ไม่ได้ให้ความหวังแก่ผู้คนในเมืองฉู่เซียงเลย\nภายใต้การบังคับบัญชาของหวันเหยียนอู๋จู ได้ทำการสังหารหมู่อย่างเหี้ยมโหดในเมืองฉู่เซียง\nไม่ว่ากองทัพเยี่ยนจะเคลื่อนทัพไปที่ใด ไม่มีสิ่งมีชีวิตใดรอดพ้น และเลือดก็ไหลนองราวกับแม่น้ำ ราวกับอยู่ในนรก

column2: Chuxiang City, the southern gateway of the Zhao Kingdom that has been defended for centuries, is razed to the ground.

Thus, the Zhao Kingdom, which lasts for more than three hundred years, is completely destroyed.\nThe Yan Kingdom, originally located in the remote and cold north, has now become the hegemon of the Central Plain.
Old officials of the former dynasty and wandering heroes of the martial arts world, who harbor dreams of restoring the Zhao kingdom, are all purged by the Yan Kingdom.

And you, after a period of hiding, are eventually discovered by the Yan army.\nYou fight back bravely, killing hundreds of Yan soldiers, but in the end, you are outnumbered and killed in the wilderness...
Chuxiang City has been besieged by the Yan army for several days and is already out of arrows and food.

Inside Chuxiang City, due to the death of Lü Wenhuan, there is no leader to make a decision.\nSpies of the Yan Kingdom easily infiltrat Chuxiang City, open the city gates, and welcome the Yan army into the city.
Thus, the Yan army easily occupies Chuxiang City.
column3: เมื่อมาถึงจุดนี้ กองทัพเยี่ยนก็เข้ายึดครองเมืองฉู่เซียงได้อย่างง่ายดาย

column2: Under the command of Wanyan Wuzhu, the Yan army carries out a brutal massacre in Chuxiang City.\nWherever the Yan army advances, not a single living thing is spared, and blood flows like a river, like a living hell.
column3: ภายใต้การบังคับบัญชาของหวันเหยียนอู๋จู กองทัพเยี่ยน ได้ทำการสังหารหมู่อย่างเหี้ยมโหดในเมืองฉู่เซียง\nไม่ว่ากองทัพเยี่ยนจะเคลื่อนทัพไปที่ใด ไม่มีสิ่งมีชีวิตใดรอดพ้น และเลือดก็ไหลนองราวกับแม่น้ำ ราวกับอยู่ในนรก

column2: With the death of Duke Kang, Duke Qi also lost his value.\nUnder the command of the Yan King, Duke Qi hangs himself in his mansion.
column3: ด้วยการตายของอ๋องคัง ทำให้อ๋องฉีสูญเสียคุณค่าของเขาไปด้วย\nภายใต้คำสั่งของฮ่องเต้เยี่ยน, อ๋องฉีได้แขวนคอตัวเองในตำหนักของเขา

column2: Thus, the Zhao Kingdom, which lasts for more than three centuries, is completely destroyed.\nThe Yan Kingdom, originally located in the remote and cold north, has now become the hegemon of the Central Plain.
Old officials of the former dynasty and wandering heroes of the martial arts world, who harbor dreams of restoring the Zhao kingdom, are all purged by the Yan Kingdom.

And you, after a period of hiding, are eventually discovered by the Yan army.\nYou fight back bravely, killing hundreds of Yan soldiers, but in the end, you are outnumbered and killed in the wilderness...
And you, after a period of hiding, manage to escape by a hair's breadth and flee to the Refugee Camp outside Chuxiang City...
Finally escaped...
Sir, please have mercy, I have elderly parents and young children, I really can't go with you...
{yell} Don't push your luck, do you know what happens to those who defy us?
I know... I know...
There's a village nearby that refused to obey us,\nSince they're useless, we burned it to the ground.
I know... I know...
Since you know, hurry up and come with us!\nIf you dawdle any longer, we'll burn your village too!
Sir, I heard that those who go with you, they are lucky to hold on to their lives if not dead.
I don't want to die...
What a nuisance.\nSince you don't want to go, then go to hell!
Ah--
column3: ฮะ--

column2: Wasting my time!
Let's go!
{yell} Stop!
Oh, someone dares to come and oppose me at this time, how commendable.
Young man, you better run, they are killers without any remorse!
Hmph, just a bunch of barbarians, nothing to be afraid of!
Scum of Yan Kingdom, this is Chuxiang City territory, not a place for you to run wild!
Looking for death!!!!!
Thank you, brave man, for your timely rescue!
But they will surely send someone to investigate when they notice their patrol soldiers haven't returned, \nit will be even more dangerous here then.
If it's dangerous, why are you still staying here?
Alas, we were originally planning to seek refuge in Chuxiang City today,\nbut they found us. They saw that I am a blacksmith and wanted me to make weapons for them.
I need to hurry back and get my family to escape from here.
Alas, life is as insignificant as an ant in troubled times...\nIf I was stronger, could I save this man...
Brave man, you are so skilled, can you escort us to Chuxiang City?
column3: ท่านผู้กล้า ท่านดูมีความสามารถได้โปรดคุ้มกันเราไปยัง เมืองฉู่เซียง ได้หรือไม่?

column2: I'm sorry, I was too presumptuous.\nIn that case, I will go ahead, brave man, be careful of the barbarians...
I can't thank you enough for your kindness, I will go back and have my family pack up,\nplease go to the village to the east to find us.
Brave man, you're finally here!
Thank you for making this trip, brave man.
Thank you, brave man.
Big brother, are you here to play with me?
Is everything packed up?\nIf everything is ready, let's set off.
Alright, let's go now.
column3: ตกลง ไปกันเถอะ

column2: Where are you guys going?
We have a dead centurion on our hand. Did you see the murderer?
No, didn't see...
No, I didn't see neither.
Laughing and joking, there must be something wrong!\nSurround them, take them all back for interrogation!
Yes!
Since you're in a hurry to reincarnate, I'll send you on your way!
How did patrol soldiers show up suddenly? they scared me to death...
A bunch of unworthy opponents, seeking their own death!
Brave man, there are other patrolling barbarians here.\nJust in case, let's set off as soon as possible.
May the Bodhisattva bless us, I hope we don't run into those barbarians.
I can't believe it, our whole family finally made it to Chuxiang City safely!
This blueprint has been passed down from my family ancestors, I will give it to you, brave man, as a thank you for escorting us.
column3: แบบแปลนนี้ได้ถูกส่งทอดมาให้คนในตระกูลตั้งแต่บรรบุรุษแล้ว ข้าจะขอมอบมันให้กับท่าน ขอบคุณที่ท่านมาคุ้มกันเรามาก

column2: Wait a bit longer, there are still people who didn't catch up.
{yell} You promised to escort us, why didn't you do your best!
column3: {yell}เจ้าสัญญาว่าจะคุ้มภัยเรา ทำไมเจ้าไม่ทำให้ดีกว่านี้!

column2: {yell} My family is dead, you killed them!
I killed them too...\nIf I didn't insist on coming to Chuxiang City, maybe nothing would happen...
Let's talk about it when we get to Chuxiang City,\nevery moment we delay here is a moment of danger.
Chuxiang City...\nI can't believe I made it here alive...
Kid, thanks for this trip.\nI have a bottle of fine wine that I've been saving for years, I'll give it to you.
You guys walk slower, I can't keep up.
Young man, thank you for escorting us this way.\nI have some cakes here, please accept them, I hope you won't refuse my gratitude.
column3: ขอบคุณที่ท่านมาคุ้มกันเรามากพ่อหนุ่ม\nข้ามีเค้ก เชิญรับไว้ หวังว่าเจ้าจะปฏิเสธน้ำใจของข้า

column2: Big brother, where are we going, why are we not there yet?
Big brother, tell me, will I never be able to go back to my old home?
I hid a lot of candied fruit in the pottery jar in the yard, but I'll never be able to eat it again.
It's a pity, I didn't protect my big brother and the others, if only I could be stronger...
{yell} Who goes there? This is the camp of Grand Marshal of the Yan Kingdom's cavalries. No one is allowed to barge in!
column3: {yell} ใครอยู่ตรงนั้น? นี่คือค่ายของแม่ทัพทหารม้าแห่งแคว้นเยี่ยน ไม่มีใครได้รับอนุญาตให้เข้ามา!

column2: I am {PlayerName}, here to pay a visit to Grand Marshal.
So it's the young hero {PlayerSurName},\nOur Grand Marshal has heard of you. If he knew you are here to visit, he would surely treat you as an honored guest.
Please follow me...
A nobody dares to see our marshal!\nI think you are a spy sent by Chuxiang City to gather military intelligence!
Since I've seen through your identity, prepare to die!
So powerful... Luckily, I ran fast.
What Yan Yun Iron Army, they are simply no match!
I am {PlayerName}, the envoy sent by Lord of Chuxiang City, here to pay a visit to Grand Marshal.
Hmph, you're here to negotiate peace, aren't you?\nLet's see how sincere your Lord is.
Follow me...
Judging from the tone of your speech, you seem to be hiding something,\nAre you an assassin sent by Chuxiang City, planning to assassinate our Grand Marshal!
Dressed as a wanderer, you for sure are not an court official!\nGuards, there's an assassin! Someone is trying to assassinate Grand Marshal!
This is the Marshal's tent.\nBut you can only go in alone, let your friends wait outside the big tent.
What kind of rule is this?
This is a rule set by Marshal, visitors can only see Marshal alone,\nIf you don't heed to my advice, I can only treat you and your party as assassins.
{PlayerName}, we'll wait outside.\nYou can go in with confidence, if there is danger, we will rush in at the drop of a hat!
Be careful!
Reporting to Grand Marshal, someone claiming to be {PlayerName} is here to visit Grand Marshal.
{PlayerName}...\nI've heard of him, a very active young hero in recent time.
Let him come, I'd like to see this person.
{PlayerName}... I've never heard of him.
Let him come.\nSince he dares to come alone, I'm somewhat interested in meeting him.
Yes!
Go ahead, Marshal wants to see you.
I am {PlayerName}, paying my respects to Grand Marshal of cavalries!
{PlayerName}, what brings you to see me?
Truly, the ignorant are fearless.\nToday, let me show you my skills!
A trap?!
Fool, without my bait, how can I catch all of you martial artists in one fell swoop!
Better luck in your next life!
Phew... That scared me, but at least I escaped...
Hahaha, I'm curious, how can you be so naive?
I want to see, where can you escape to now!
I didn't expect you to have such strength at a young age, it's my miscalculation!
Grand Marshal of Yan cavalries, By killing you, I suppose Chuxiang City and Wuyue regions can rest easy.
column3: จอมพลแห่งกองทัพม้าของแคว้นเยี่ยน ฆ่าเจ้าซะ ข้าคิดว่าเมืองฉู่เซียงและเขตหวู่เยว่สามารถอาศัยได้อย่างสบายใจ

column2: Hmph, wishful thinking!
If I die, the king will only send more brutal soldiers in greater numbers to the south,\nBy then, Chuxiang City will be a hundred times more miserable than it is now!
If a soldier came, a general can provide cover. If a floord comes, an earthly dam can obstruct its flow. we'll cross that bridge when we come to it!
If you spare me, I will immediately withdraw my troops and return to Yan Kingdom.\nAnd I promise that I will not set foot in the south for the rest of my life.
I can also form a brotherhood pact with you, and if you ever need my help in the future, I will not refuse!
What should I do with this guy?
column3: ข้าควรทำอย่างไรกับผู้ชายคนนี้?

column2: Also, you haven't forgotten about the Soul taker poison pill in your body, have you? I can also give you the antidote for this poison.
column3: นอกจากนี้เจ้ายังไม่ลืมเกี่ยวกับโอสถพิษพรากวิญญาณในร่างกายของเจ้าใช่ไหม? ข้ายังสามารถให้ยาแก้พิษนี้แก่เจ้าได้

column2: Sorry, I can't trust you!
Uh...
column3: อา..

column2: This guy must have the antidote for the Soul taker poison pill...
column3: ชายคนนี้ต้องมียาถอนพิษสำหรับพิษพรากวิญญาณแน่ๆ...

column2: Got it! This must be the antidote!
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว นี่ต้องเป็นยาถอนพิษแน่ๆ!

column2: Wanyan Wuzhu is dead, the crisis in Chuxiang City should have been resolved.
column3: หวันเหยียนอู๋จูตายแล้ว วิกฤติในเมืองฉู่เซียงน่าจะได้รับการแก้ไขแล้ว

column2: The people in Chuxiang City may not know this news yet, I should hurry back and tell them!
I will spare you today, I hope you can keep your promise.
We Yan people are most trustworthy, not cunning and fickle like you!
column3: พวกเราชาวเยี่ยนน่าเชื่อถือที่สุด ไม่ใช่พวกเจ้าเล่ห์และไม่แน่นอนเช่นเจ้า!

column2: Here's the antidote for the Soul taker poison pill, you must live well.\nWe're not done yet!
column3: นี่คือยาถอนพิษสำหรับโอสถพิษพรากวิญญาณเจ้าต้องใช้ชีวิตให้ดี\nเรายังไม่เสร็จ!

column2: Leave before I change my mind!
I will order the army to withdraw now, my promise is always valid!\n{PlayerName}, we will meet again!
Wanyan Wuzhu led the army to retreat, the crisis in Chuxiang City should have been resolved.
column3: หวันเหยียนอู๋จูนำกองทัพล่าถอย วิกฤติในเมืองฉู่เซียงน่าจะได้รับการแก้ไขแล้ว

column2: The people in Chuxiang City may not know this news yet, I should hurry back and tell them!
If you sincerely want to follow me, then take this Pill.
This Pill looks a bit strange, should I take it?
If you refuse, it only shows that you are not sincere.
I'm not used to taking these strange things, diarrhea is a small matter, but it's not worth risking my life.

You people from the Central Plain have a saying 'Clever people may be victims of their own cleverness.'\nBeing too clever is not necessarily a good thing, in your next life. In your next life, don't be too clever.
You take the pill from Wanyan Wuzhu and swallow it.\nSeeing this, a playful smile appears on Wanyan Wuzhu's face.
column3: เจ้ารับยาเม็ดจากหวันเหยียนอู๋จูแล้วกลืนลงไป\nเมื่อเห็นสิ่งนี้ รอยยิ้มก็ปรากฏขึ้นบนใบหน้าของหวันเหยียนอู๋จู

column2: Hehehehe...\n{PlayerName}, do you know what kind of magical pill you just took?
I don't know.
This pill is called <color=#c44b0e>Soul taker pill</color>.\nIf you don't take the antidote in time after taking this pill, you will die of intestinal rupture <color=#c44b0e>three days later</color>.
column3: ยาเม็ดนี้เรียกว่า <color=#c44b0e>โอสถพิษพรากวิญญาณ</color>\nหากเจ้ารับประทานยาถอนพิษไม่ตรงเวลาหลังจากรับประทานยาเม็ดนี้ เจ้าจะเสียชีวิตด้วยลำไส้แตก <color=#c44b0e>สามวันต่อมา</color>

column2: Marshal, what do you mean by this?

Since you are loyal to me, theoretically, I should trust you.\nHowever, as you people from the Central Plain say, "Those who are not of my kind have different intentions". Therefore, I have to be cautious.
But don't worry, as long as you complete the task I give you, I will give you the antidote!
It seems I have no choice.\nIn that case, what task do I need to complete?
Don't worry, you can definitely do this.\n<color=#c44b0e>Take Lü Wenhuan's life within three days</color>!
Are you kidding me? It's no different from sending me to death!
Do it or not, it's up to you.\nAt worst, you will die of intestinal rupture in three days.
I will inform the whole army that from today, you are a member of the <color=#c44b0e>Yan Yun Iron Cavalries</color>.\nHere, no one will trouble you, you can go to Chuxiang City with peace of mind.
Haven't you finished the task yet? Your time is running out.
You did it, I know I didn't misjudge you!
Now you should cure the poison in me!
Of course, from today on, you will serve as my confidant, accompanying me at all times!
You take the antidote given by Wanyan Wuzhu, and the deadly poison in your body is removed.
column3: เจ้าทานยาแก้พิษที่หวันเหยียนอู๋จูมอบให้ และพิษร้ายแรงในร่างกายของเจ้าก็จะถูกกำจัดออกไป

column2: Although the toxicity of the Soul-binding Pill is gone, you don't feel relieved at all.

On the contrary, you feel as if there is a dark cloud over your mind,\nyou know, you have embarked on a road of no return, no matter what is at the end of this road, you can only grit your teeth and keep going.
{yell} Do you think this is a market?\nCome and go as you please?!
{yell} How dare you!\nWhat do you think my tent is?!
What does this mean?
I'm about to lead the army to attack the city, and you will be the perfect sacrifice for my flag!
Who are you, daring to break into my tent!
column3: เจ้าเป็นใครกล้าบุกเข้าไปในเต็นท์ของข้า!

column2: {PlayerName}, have you finished the task I gave you?

After Wanyan Wuzhu's death, the Yan army is immediately disintegrated and flees in panic.\nChuxiang City iss spared from disaster once again, all thanks to you - a nobody from a hundred days ago.\nUnbeknownst to you, someone has already spread the news of your solo heroic act of driving away the Yan army to Chuxiang City...
column3: หลังจากการตายของหวันเหยียนอู๋จู, กองทัพเยี่ยนก็สลายตัวทันทีและหลบหนีด้วยความตื่นตระหนก\nเมืองฉู่เซียงได้รับการช่วยเหลือจากหายนะอีกครั้ง ต้องขอบคุณเจ้า - ชายผู้ไม่มีใครรู้จักเมื่อร้อยวันก่อน\nก่อนที่เจ้าจะรู้ตัว มีคนแพร่กระจายข่าวเกี่ยวกับวีรกรรมอันกล้าหาญของเจ้า ในการขับไล่กองทัพเยี่ยนเพียงลำพัง...

column2: Wanyan Wuzhu didn't lie to you. Just as he said, the Yan army withdraws immediately.\nChuxiang City is spared from disaster once again, all thanks to you - a nobody from a hundred days ago.\nUnbeknownst to you, someone has already spread the news of your solo heroic act of driving away the Yan army to Chuxiang City...
column3: หวันเหยียนอู๋จูไม่ได้โกหกเจ้า ตามที่เขาพูด กองทัพเยี่ยน ก็ถอนตัวจากไปทันที\nเมืองฉู่เซียงได้รับการช่วยเหลือจากหายนะอีกครั้ง ต้องขอบคุณเจ้า - ชายผู้ไม่มีใครรู้จักเมื่อร้อยวันก่อน\nก่อนที่เจ้าจะรู้ตัว มีคนแพร่กระจายข่าวเกี่ยวกับวีรกรรมอันกล้าหาญของเจ้า ในการขับไล่กองทัพเยี่ยนเพียงลำพัง...

column2: The great hero is back!
Look, look!
Here comes, here comes, the great hero {PlayerSurName} is back!
{PlayerName}, well done!
A true hero in his youth!
What are you doing?
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you and your companions drove away the besieging Yan army and saved Chuxiang City, you are truly amazing!
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อย{PlayerSurName} เจ้าและสหายของเจ้าขับไล่กองทัพเยี่ยนที่ปิดล้อมเมืองและกอบกู้เมืองฉู่เซียง มันน่าทึ่งจริงๆ!!

column2: When the people heard the news, they spontaneously came to welcome you, the young heroes!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, please follow me into the city.\nI have prepared a feast for you, today the whole city will celebrate, and we won't stop until we're drunk!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you and your companions drove away the besieging Yan army and saved Chuxiang City, I truly admire you!
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อย{PlayerSurName} เจ้าและสหายของเจ้าขับไล่กองทัพเยี่ยนที่ปิดล้อมเมืองและกอบกู้เมืองฉู่เซียง ข้าชื่นชมเจ้าจากใจจริง!

column2: When the people heard the news, they spontaneously came to welcome you, the young heroes!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, please follow me into the city.\nI have prepared a feast for you, today the whole city will celebrate, and we won't stop until we're drunk!
I didn't expect that I, {PlayerName}, can also become a great hero honored by everyone!
The atmosphere here is a bit off, it's filled with killing intent, and I can faintly hear the sound of war drums.
Can it be that the Yan army is launching a full-scale attack today?\nThe sound seems to be coming from the <color=#c44b0e>north open area</color>, let's go and see what's happening.
Today is the day our army fights against the stubborn Chuxiang City,\nwhy are you still wandering around here, hurry to the front line and wait for marshal's orders!
{yell} How dare you, spy, attack our camp before the army sets out!
The army is setting out... It seems that the survival of Chuxiang City is at stake today.
With weak soldiers and few generals, it's unwise to resist!
Resisting to the end will only cause your people to suffer and lose their wealth, this is unkind!
Enemies' army is pressing down. you hide behind city's walls and not daring to fight, this is not bravery!
What abilities do you have to compete with my Yan Yun Iron Cavalries with such stupidity, unkindness, and lack of courage!
{yell} Northern Yan barbarians, don't think you can shake the morale of our army by running your mouth!
column3: {yell} พวกป่าเถื่อนแห่งเยี่ยนเหนือ อย่าคิดว่าเจ้าจะสามารถสั่นคลอนขวัญกำลังใจของกองทัพของเราได้ด้วยคำพูดของเจ้า!

column2: I am afraid of death, but I am more afraid of becoming a slave from a fallen country, live to please others every day!
Even if the outcome of today's battle is already determined, I will make you barbarians taste the pain,\nknow how much price you have to pay for starting a war without reason!
Given the current situation, which side should I assist?
{PlayerName}, what do you mean by this!
Isn't this meaning clear enough?\nI choose to stand in this position, of course, to protect Chuxiang City behind me.
You fickle ingrate, have you forgotten how you pledge allegiance to me?\nDo you think the people you want to protect behind you will choose to trust you?
Whether they believe me or not is their business, my choice is in line with my conscience.
{PlayerGivenName} You finally come back, I thought you ran away.
Even you didn't abandoned the city and flee, how can I possibly do such a thing?
It sounds good, but why does it feel like you're mocking me?
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, General Lü is missing, so I am temporarily leading the armies.
Since young hero is willing to help, please take the lead.\nYou should disrupt the enemy's formation first, and I will lead the army closely behind you!
Heh, in front of my million iron cavalries, what can a mere {PlayerName} change?
Who said that only I, {PlayerName}, came?\nFriends who came to help, you have watched enough of excitement, please show up!
Ye Family Battalion is here!
Amitabha...
column3: อามิตาพุทธ...

column2: The way of nature...
How can such a lively scene be without Nine Factions Sect?
There was a beautiful woman named Gongsun, her sword dance moved all directions.
By the order of Duke Kang, fight to the death and never retreat!
column3: ตามคำสั่งของอ๋องคัง, สู้จนตัวตาย, ห้ามถอย!

column2: Hmph, a bunch of rabble!
Report to Marshal, our army's weapons suffered serious water damage, some equipments have rusted and are no longer sharp!
{yell} Bastard, why didn't you report earlier!
It seems that this is the masterpiece of the Shuizhai brothers.
Report to Marshal, army's food and grass for horses caught fire for some reason, and we won't last long with the remaining amount of food!
{yell} Imbecile, how did you guard the food and grass for horses!
Hehe, this is of course my masterpiece.
Take down Chuxiang City today, boys, charge with me!
The invincible Yan Yun Iron Army was actually defeated by you guys...
Hahahaha——
Judging from current situation, who is the mantis trying to stop a chariot? Who is the rabble?
{PlayerName}, don't celebrate too early!
You were once a member of the Yan Yun Iron Army, even if you saved Chuxiang City today,\nThe people behind you can only see you as a traitor!
Even upon death, you waste your breath!\nI will send you to afterlife with my own hands, and let's see who still thinks I am a traitor!
Hmph, that's all!
Hehe, {PlayerName}, stay here and be content as my insider!
You must keep the antidote for this Soul Taker Pill, I want to see you suffer alive!
Damn it, just one step away!
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, although I am grateful for your rescue of Chuxiang City,\nI have to ask, what did Wanyan Wuzhu mean by what he said?
column3: จอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} แม้ว่าข้าจะรู้สึกขอบคุณที่ท่านช่วยเหลือเมืองฉู่เซียง\nแต่ข้าขอถามว่า สิ่งที่หวันเหยียนอู๋จูพูดหมายความว่าอะไร?

column2: Can it be that you are really a lapdog of the Yan Kingdom?
column3: เป็นไปได้ไหมว่าเจ้าเป็นสุนัขขี้ข้าของพวกแคว้นเยี่ยนจริงๆ?

column2: Maybe this is their trick to gain sympathy!
So this kid is hypocritical all along...
We can't keep him, he's a disaster waiting to happen!
Get rid of him quickly!
We don't welcome traitors!
Can't you see this obvious attempt to sow discord?\nI went through great hardships to save Chuxiang City, why don't you believe me?
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, as you can see, public opinion is against you, it's hard for me to help you.
The world may be vast, but there wll hardly be a place for me...

Although the Yan Kingdom's army has temporarily withdrawn, they will surely return in the future. Please continue to fortify the city, train the soldiers, and unite people in the martial arts world...

Do you think I don't understand such simple logic?\nWhile I still am a little sentimental for our friendship, you should leave quickly. If you delay any further, I will have to arrest you as a remnant of the Yan Kingdom.
Everyone, take care of yourselves, this is goodbye.
A gentleman can be killed but not insulted, I will remember your words and actions today!
Even at the brink of death, you still have such a tough attitude!\nConsidering you as Marshal of the Yan Army, I, {PlayerName}, will personally send you to afterlife!
Hmph, that's all!
{PlayerName}, our duel is not over yet, hahaha...
Damn it, just one step away!
We won!
The great hero is mighty!
Well done, {PlayerSurName}!
I worship you, {PlayerName}!
A true hero in his youth!
What are you doing?
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you and your group helped to repel the besieging Yan army and solved the crisis of Chuxiang City, it's really amazing!
When the people heard the news, they spontaneously came to welcome you, the young heroes!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, please follow me into the city.\nI have prepared a feast for you, today the whole city will celebrate, and we won't stop until we're drunk!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you and your group helped to repel the besieging Yan army and relieved the crisis of Chuxiang City, I really admire you!
When the people heard the news, they spontaneously came to welcome you, young heroes!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, please follow me into the city.\nI have prepared a feast for you, today the whole city will celebrate, and we won't stop until we're drunk!
{PlayerName}, I never thought you would choose righteousness over family in the end!
You're wrong, Marshal. I merely choose to follow the path of righteousness!\nSince this temple and the martial arts world are already filthy, why don't we join forces to clean them up.

Exactly, your emperor is incompetent and ignorant, leaving a few dukes who only care about power struggles and not lives of the common people. Only our Yan Kingdom's ruler has the demeanor of a ruler.
Once our Yan Kingdom completes the unification of the north and south, our ruler will reign over the world. By then, everyone will enjoy prosperous and peace...
{PlayerName}, you're blinded by greed, you actually believe such nonsense!
{PlayerName}Do you know what you're doing?\nAre you going to openly oppose the Zhao Kingdom?
What are the consequences? I'd like to see!
Report to Marshal, our army's weapons suffered serious water damage, some equipments have rusted and are no longer sharp!
{yell} Bastard, why didn't you report earlier!
Those pirates really dare to do it...
Report to Marshal, army's food and grass for horses caught fire for some reason, and we will not last long with the remaining amount of food!
{yell} Imbecile, how did you guard the food and grass!
If I find out who burned our food and grass, I will make him wish he was dead!!!
Take down Chuxiang City today, boys, charge with me!
The invincible Yan Yun Iron Army actually lost, how is this possible...
{PlayerName}Look!\nChuxiang City is right in front of us, and now it belongs to my Yan Kingdom!
What are your thoughts at this moment?
I hope marshal can keep you word and treat the people in the city kindly.
Keep my word... That's for sure.\nAfter today, no one will be able to harm them.
Thank you, Marshal!
All troops, listen to my command!
<size=150%>Kill—everyone—in—the—city!</size>
Marshal, how can you——
Once they're dead, no one can harm them anymore.\nIsn't that right, {PlayerName}?
{yell} You beast, I'll fight you to the death!
Uh...
column3: อา..

column2: After fainting for a day and a night, you finally wake up...
It shouldn't be like this, it shouldn't be like this!
Wanyan Wuzhu, in this life, I, {PlayerName}, am your sworn enemy!
column3: หวันเหยียนอู๋จู ไม่ว่าจะเกิดอีกกี่ชาติ ข้า{PlayerName} คือศัตรูคู่อาฆาตของเจ้า!

column2: {PlayerName}, this is the antidote for the Soul Taker Pill. You choose to take the righteous path, this antidote is my reward to you.
Thank you, Marshal!
{PlayerName} Do you think we can win this battle?
We can only do our best and leave the rest to fate. They'll never expect us to take the initiative.\nWe're fighting for this slim chance of survival.
If we don't succeed, we'll die trying. That's all we can do!
General Lü, isn't it suffocating to hide in a turtle shell?\nAre you out to enjoy the good weather today?
The weather is indeed good today, we came out of the city specifically for hunting.\nWe heard that a lot of wild dogs and wolves have been around recently, we'll make a good meal after hunting them.
Big talk, today I want to see how long you can hold on.
The invincible Yan Yun Iron Army is actually defeated...
column3: กองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนที่ไร้เทียมทานได้พ่ายแพ้ไปแล้วจริงๆ...

column2: Hahahaha——
Judging from current situation, who is really the mantis trying to stop a chariot? Who is the self-concieted one?
A gentleman can be killed but not insulted, I will remember your words and actions today!
Even at the brink of death, you still have such a tough attitude!\nConsidering you as Grand marshal of the Yan army, I, {PlayerName}, will personally send you to afterlife!
Hmph, that's all!
{PlayerName}, our duel is not over yet, hahaha...
Damn it, just one step away!
We won!
The great hero is mighty!
Well done, great hero {PlayerSurName}!
I worship you, {PlayerName}!
A true hero in his youth!
What are you doing?
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you and your companions drove away the besieging Yan army and saved Chuxiang City, you are truly amazing!
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อย{PlayerSurName} เจ้าและสหายของเจ้าขับไล่กองทัพเยี่ยนที่ปิดล้อมเมืองและกอบกู้เมืองฉู่เซียง มันน่าทึ่งจริงๆ!!

column2: When the people heard the news, they spontaneously came to welcome you, young heroes!
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, please follow me into the city.\nI have prepared a feast for you, today the whole city will celebrate, and we won't stop until we're drunk!
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, you and your companions drove away the besieging Yan army and saved Chuxiang City, I truly admire you!
When the people heard the news, they spontaneously came to welcome you, young heroes!
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, please follow me into the city.\nI have prepared a feast for you, today the whole city will celebrate, and we won't stop until we're drunk!
This should be the Yan Army's granary.
column3: นี่ควรเป็นยุ้งฉางของกองทัพเยี่ยน

column2: What if there's a fire here...
Grains are very dry, if there's a <color=#c44b0e>Burning torch</color>, it should be easy to start a fire.
Should I set a fire here?
Mission accomplished!\nBurn these bastards' grains, and they'll have to leave.
It won't work if the torch isn't lit, where can I find something to light it?
The torch is lit!\nNow I can go and burn the granary.
I'm now a part of the Yan Army, should I really still burn it?
column3: ตอนนี้ข้าเข้าเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของกองทัพเยี่ยนแล้ว ข้าควรจะเผามันจริงๆ หรือ?

column2: Mission accomplished!\nThe fire is really blazing!
column3: ภารกิจเสร็จสมบูรณ์!\nไฟลุกโชนจริงๆ!

column2: Wait, why am I burning my own people's grains...\nI can't let marshal know about this...
{PlayerName}, is there anything else you need?
Well, you're thoughtful.\nBut if there's nothing else, you can go.
I'll take my leave.
column3: ข้าจะขอลาออก

column2: Marshal, the Chuxiang City's defense is now in disarray, now is the perfect time to attack the city.
Hmm, you make a good point.
Order the entire army, attack the city!
{PlayerGivenName}, hold on!
column3: {PlayerGivenName} ช้าก่อน!

column2: Oh, it's Brother Wanyan, what can I do for you?
Brother Wanyan seems to be different today, do you have something to say to me?
If you trust me, I will take you to a place where a big shot wants to meet you. If you win his favor, high ranking status and wealth are within your reach.
Ah, I know it would end up like this.
I am deeply grateful for {PlayerGivenName}'s repeated help.\nThis young master respects you as a good man, and I hope we will not become enemies in this life.
We will meet again.
I will not disappoint you.
Reporting to marshal, {PlayerName} has been brought here.
Hmm, you've worked hard, you may retreat for now.
{PlayerName}, I have heard of your fame and deeds.\nDo you know who I am?
After hearing Brother Yan call you marshal, I wonder which marshal you are?
The man before you is Grand Marshal of the Yan Kingdom's cavalries - Wanyan Wuzhu!
column3: ชายที่อยู่ตรงหน้าเจ้าคือจอมพลแห่งกองทัพม้าแห่งแคว้นเยี่ยน - หวันเหยียนอู๋จู!

column2: Is this place...
Yes, this is the Palace Camp where the Yan Kingdom is stationed in Zhongzhou.
column3: ใช่แล้ว นี่คือค่ายทัพหลวงที่แคว้นเยี่ยนประจำการอยู่ที่จงโจว

column2: I am eager to recruit talents. After hearing about your deeds from Wanyan Liang, I admire you very much. I wonder if a talent like you would be willing to serve me?

(Although I'm not sure about my own nationality, staying in the Central Plain for a long time makes me feel that serving the Yan Kingdom would somehow be a betrayal. This is probably due to preconceived notions...)
Have you considered the consequences of refusing my offer?
I can do anything, but I can't be a scum who betrays my country for glory!

I heard that you are not even from the Zhao Kingdom, and you're not sure about your place of origin. From this perspective, how can serving me be considered as betraying one's own country for personal gain?

I've been in the Central Plain for so long and made so many friends, why can't I consider myself a citizen of the Zhao Kingdom? Besides, you people of the Yan Kingdom are notorious for your brutality, and I don't want to get involved with you.
Fine, if you are willing to die for the Zhao Kingdom, I will grant your wish.
Wanyan Liang, send {PlayerName} away. I hope he can live until the day I unify the world.
The scene I least wanted to see still happened, Brother {PlayerGivenName} refused to serve Grand Marshal, I don't know if we will be friends or foes when we meet again.
It can't be helped, I'm a man of principle and I won't easily change my stance.
Please take care, Brother {PlayerGivenName}, we may never meet again.
You agreed so readily, which is somewhat surprising to me.\nDon't you care that you will be reviled by everyone?

Since I don't know which country I belong to, I don't need to bear the stigma of betrayal; besides, a real man should strive to achieve great things, following marshal will surely give me the opportunity to make my mark.
Good, I will give you this opportunity!
From today, {PlayerName} officially joins the Yan Yun Iron Army!
column3: ตั้งแต่วันนี้ {PlayerName}ได้เข้าร่วมกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนอย่างเป็นทางการ!

column2: {PlayerName}, the Yan Yun Iron Army values military achievements over seniority. As long as you achieve outstanding results, I will not hesitate to reward you!
column3: {PlayerName} กองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนให้ความสำคัญกับความสำเร็จทางทหารมากกว่าความอาวุโส ตราบใดที่เจ้าสร้างผลงานอย่างโดดเด่น ข้าก็ไม่ลังเลที่จะให้รางวัลตอบแทนแก่เจ้า!

column2: I will serve you with all my heart and soul until death.
{PlayerName}, you've just joined the Yan Yun Iron Army, and there are many tasks for you to undertake. This will assess your skills and help to elevate your status within the army.
column3: {PlayerName} เจ้าเพิ่งเข้าร่วมกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนและมีงานมากมายให้เจ้ารับผิดชอบ สิ่งนี้จะช่วยประเมินฝีมือของเจ้าและช่วยยกระดับสถานะของเจ้าภายในกองทัพ

column2: Please give your orders, Marshal. I will do my best to complete them.

Here is a secret letter that needs to be personally delivered to the Pacifying Envoy, Lü Wenhuan in Chuxiang City. Your every word and action on this journey represent our Yan Yun Iron Army, so don't tarnish our reputation and ruin our morale.
Yes!
Traitor {PlayerName}, I heard you've defected to Wanyan Wuzhu. How dare you show your face in General's mansion!
column3: คนทรยศ {PlayerName} ข้าได้ยินมาว่า เจ้าแปรพักตร์ไปเข้าพวกกับหวันเหยียนอู๋จู เจ้ากล้าดียังไงถึงมาโผล่หน้าในจวนท่านแม่ทัพ!

column2: I'm here on behalf of Marshal Wanyan to deliver a letter to General Lü. Don't stop me, otherwise you can interrupt real business.
Let's teach this traitor a lesson first, and vent our anger!
Hmph, even if you show mercy, we won't appreciate it, traitor!
You're such a coward, you're only fit to be a traitor. Get lost and serve your new master.
I must have been blind to waste my time nurturing you. Now you have the audacity to come see me, what's your purpose?
I'm very busy dealing with numerous matters every day. What important matter brings you to me?
I am {PlayerName}, currently serving under great Marshal of Yan, Wanyan Wuzhu. I'm here to deliver a secret letter to General Lü on Marhshal Wanyan's behalf.
column3: ข้าชื่อ{PlayerName} ซึ่งปัจจุบันอยู่ภายใต้การนำของแม่ทัพใหญ่แห่งเยี่ยน, หวันเหยียนอู๋จู, ข้ามาที่นี่เพื่อส่งจดหมายลับจากจอมพลหวันเหยียนอู๋จูถึงใต้เท้าลู่

column2: Oh? Where's the secret letter? Let me see it.
{yell} How dare Wan Yan insult me like this!
column3: {yell} หวันเหยียนเจ้ากล้าดียังไงมาดูถูกข้าแบบนี้!

column2: {PlayerName}, did your master send you here to die?
Marshal only asked me to deliver the letter, I know nothing else.
"Don't shoot the messengers" is an unwritten rule of war, but I will take your head to remind your Marshal that I'm not to be trifled with!
Hmph, you're indeed a good lapdog trained by Wanyan Wuzhu!
column3: ฮึ่ม เจ้าสุนัขรับใช้ที่ซื่อสัตย์ของหวันเหยียนอู๋จู!

column2: Tell your master that it's impossible for me to surrender. If necessary, I'll fight to the death!
Get out of Chuxiang City immediately. We don't welcome Yan dogs here!
column3: ออกไปจากเมืองฉู่เซียงทันที ที่นี่เราไม่ต้อนรับพวกสุนัขเยี่ยน!

column2: Marshal, the letter has been delivered. Lü Wenhuan refuses to surrender and vows to fight to the bitter death.
That fool still wants to intimidate you and undermine my authority. But you did well and didn't disgrace the Yan Yun Iron Army. Good job!
Wanyan sent a useless person like you to show off in front of me, he is humiliating himself.
Go back and tell your master that it's impossible for me to surrender. If necessary, I'll fight to the death!
Get out of Chuxiang City immediately. We don't welcome Yan dogs here!
column3: ออกไปจากเมืองฉู่เซียงทันที ที่นี่เราไม่ต้อนรับพวกสุนัขเยี่ยน!

column2: Marshal, the letter has been delivered. Lü Wenhuan refuses to surrender and vows to fight to the bitter death.
You made a fool of yourself in front of that baffoon Lü Wenhuan. He's trying to intimidate me. You've disappointed me with this mission. You'd better watch out for yourself.

Skills of the martial arts world are mostly fancy and not as practical as those on the battlefield. However, if we can learn from useful ones, we might be able to enhance our army's combat power and reduce unnecessary casualties.
{PlayerName}, you come from the martial arts world and should have some understanding of its skills. You should train our soldiers and let them experience some new combat skills.
Yes, sir!
I'm here by Marshal's order to train the Yan Yun Iron Army.
column3: ข้ามาที่นี่ตามคำสั่งของท่านแม่ทัพเพื่อฝึกกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุน

column2: You? A foreigner, who do you think you are? Thinking you have the right to train us?
It seems you don't quite accept Marshal's order.
I dare not disobey the order. I just want to test your abilities first. We don't want to train with a useless person.
You bunch of overconfident fools, I'll give you your first lesson.
You took down so many of us alone, you're way stronger than us.\nWe admire the strong, and we'll become stronger if we train with you. Please train us as soon as possible.
Many soldiers from Yan Kingdom have heard of your achievements and admire you greatly. They cooperated actively in today's training.
column3: ทหารจำนวนมากจากแคว้นเยี่ยน ต่างได้ยินเกี่ยวกับความสำเร็จของเจ้าและชื่นชมเจ้าอย่างมาก พวกเขาให้ความร่วมมืออย่างแข็งขันในการฝึกในวันนี้

column2: Marshal, today's training is completed with great results.

It seems that the soldiers highly recognize your skills, which makes me feel relieved.\nFrom now on, I'll leave the training of my Yan Yun Iron Army to you. Make sure they all become strong with martial arts training!
Yes, sir!
What qualifications do you, a scum, have to train us?\nIf you want us to recognize you, go back to your mother's womb and learn for another ten years.
Oh, you're itching for a fight again, want to get beaten up?
Hmph, how could marshal take in such a scum!
Anyway, it's boring to be idle. It's good to take you on!
Pah, you traitor!\nGet lost, or I won't be polite.
{PlayerName} sir, what kind of training are we going to do today?
{PlayerName} sir, you're worked hard. It's a great blessing for these brats to be trained by you.
You didn't just get lucky and beat us the other day, did you? You're so incompetent today.
These centurions are all expert archers. Lord {PlayerName}, you're unscathed. It's really admirable.
It's a good thing we're not on the battlefield. If we were, you'd probably be turned into a hedgehog with your skills.
Under the training of Sir {PlayerName}, we will definitely become the most invincible warriors in the world, and our Yan Yun Iron Army will definitely become the most invincible army in the world!
Even the God of War can be defeated. If that's the case, what's the use of our training?
You've already trained today. Both you and the soldiers need to rest. If you want to train, let's talk about it tomorrow.

Chuxiang City is a barrier for WuYue region, and it's a must-win place for our army to go south.\nKnowing one's enemy is the key to winning every battle. I order you to infiltrate Chuxiang City to investigate its conditions on food storage, military equipments, and war horse.
Yes, sir!
This must be where the food is stored. I need to quickly take notes on the amount of food here.
A moment later...
Condition on food storage has been investigated. Let's continue to investigate other things.
The investigation is complete. Let's go back to the Palace Camp and report to marshal.
column3: การสอบสวนเสร็จสิ้นแล้ว กลับไปที่ค่ายทัพหลวงและรายงานต่อท่านแม่ทัพกันเถอะ

column2: So many strong crossbow vehicles, once they enter the battlefield, they will definitely cause heavy casualties...
A moment later...
Condition on military equipments has been investigated. Let's continue to investigate other things.
There are quite a few war horses stored here, but I'm afraid they won't be of much use in defending the city once a war starts...
A moment later...
Condition on war horses has been investigated. Let's continue to investigate other things.
Why are you still here not doing your job when your task is not completed?
Marshal, conditions on food storage, military equipments, and war horses in Chuxiang City have all been investigated.
Very good. Now that we have a clear view of the military conditions in Chuxiang City, we have a better chance of winning the future battle!
Who's there!\nDare to break into the armory, you're looking for death!
You treacherous villain, die!

Chuxiang City has always been a strategic location since ancient times. Controlling Chuxiang City allows one to attack Wuyue region in the east and the southwest region in the west, thus truly unifying the world under Yan's rule.
column3: เมืองฉู่เซียงเป็นสถานที่ทางยุทธศาสตร์มาตั้งแต่สมัยโบราณ การควบคุมเมืองฉู่เซียงได้จะช่วยให้สามารถโจมตีเขตหวู่เยว่ทางทิศตะวันออกและทิศตะวันตกเฉียงใต้ทางทิศตะวันตก ดังนั้นจึงจะรับว่ารวมแผ่นดินให้เป็นหนึ่งเดียวอย่างแท้จริงภายใต้แคว้นเยี่ยนได้

column2: However, despite my numerous attempts to pull Chuxiang City's pacifying envoy, Lü Wenhuan, into our camp. This man remains noncommittal. If he resists and defends the city, it will not only cause heavy casualties to our army, but also indefinitely delay the opportunity to unify the world.
The best plan now is to eliminate Lü Wenhuan, this obstacle. With no one leading the troops in Chuxiang City, the army will be in chaos, making our siege a piece of cake!
{PlayerName}, I order you to infiltrate Chuxiang City and assassinate Lü Wenhuan when opportunity presents itself!
Yes, sir!
There will undoubtedly be strong guards around Lü Wenhuan. Once the assassination is completed, you must escape quickly to avoid being surrounded.
Marshal, Lü Wenhuan of Chuxiang City has been killed.
Good, very good! You did a great job, I will reward you handsomely! Today, I will teach you an unique skill that I recently mastered, hoping you can use it to defeat enemies!
Thank you, Marshal.
{PlayerName}, do you know why our army has been stationed in Zhongzhou and did not attack Chuxiang City?
I don't know.

In my eyes, most of the Zhao army are nothing but rabble, however, Ye Family Battalion is the only formidable opponent of our Yan Yun Iron Army. A rumor among people is that Ye Family Battalion is the last line of defense for the Zhao Kingdom.

When we attack Chuxiang City, Ye Family Battalion stationed in various places will continuously send reinforcements, cutting off our path of retreat. By then, our army will be in a dilemma, as neither advancing nor retreating will be a good option. Our deaths will be imminent after being surrounded.

I heard that Ye Family Battalion has a defense map, which records the defense situation of Ye Family Battalion in Xiangfan. I order you to get this defense map and eliminate all Ye Family Battalion recorded on the map.
column3: ข้าได้ยินมาว่ากองพันตระกูลเย่มีแผนป้องกัน ซึ่งบันทึกสถานการณ์การป้องกันของกองพันตระกูลเย่ในเขตเซียงฝาน ข้าขอสั่งให้เจ้ารับแผนที่ป้องกันนี้ และกำจัดกองพันตระกูลเย่ทั้งหมดที่บันทึกไว้บนแผนที่

column2: Where is this defense map now, and where should I start?
I have received news that this map is in Ye Family Battalion's camp, but I don't know exactly where it is.
I will infiltrate Ye Family Battalion's camp to investigate.
So Ye Family Battalion defense map is hidden here, let me see what is recorded on it...
Xuanfeng, Shengjie, Tabai... Are these names and locations of garrisons stationed in other places besides the main camp of Ye Family Battalion?
Let's go to these places first. If it is true, I will eliminate them all at once.
A military camp is found ahead. According to Ye Family Battalion defense map, this should be <color=#c44b0e>Ye Family Battalion's Xuanfeng Army</color>.
Several military camps of Ye Family Battalion recorded on the defense map have all been eliminated, and I can report back to marshal.
Xuanfeng Army has been completely eliminated, let's go to other military camps recorded on the map next.
A military camp is found ahead. According to Ye Family Battalion defense map, this should be <color=#c44b0e>Ye Family Battalion's Shengjie Army</color>.
Shengjie Army has been completely eliminated, Let's go to other military camps recorded on the map next.
A military camp is found ahead. According to Ye Family Battalion defense map, this should be <color=#c44b0e>Ye Family Battalion's Tabai Army</color>.
Taibai Army has been completely wiped out, it's time to move on to other camps marked on the map.
We need to quickly eliminate troops stationed by Ye Family Battalion in various locations, so that our army can move south without any worries.
Marshal, the three armies recorded on Ye Family Battalion defense map have all been completely wiped out.
Indeed, this is great news! \nWith capable subordinates like you, why worry about not achieving great things!
The perimeter guards of Ye Family Battalion have been wiped out by us, leaving only the main camp of Ye Family Battalion isolated and helpless, it's the perfect time to eradicate them.

This matter is of great importance, I can't trust anyone else with it.\n{PlayerName}, I'm afraid I have to trouble you again, you must completely eradicate Ye Family Battalion to eliminate future troubles!
Yes Sir!
Ye Family Battalion imposes a major threat to me. If you can completely eradicate them, it will be a great achievement, and I will reward you handsomely!
Marshal, Ye Family Battalion has been completely eradicated.\nYe Pengju, Ye Yun, Ye Yinping have all been killed by me!
{yell} Heaven is on our side! God bless the Yan Kingdom!
column3: {yell} สวรรค์เข้าข้างเรา! ขอพระเจ้าประทานพรแก่แคว้นเยี่ยน!

column2: Today, I will pass on to you my famous sabre technique, the <color=#c44b0e>Savage Primal Blade</color>, to commend your achievements!
column3: วันนี้ ข้าจะถ่ายทอดวิทยายุทธดาบอันเลื่องชื่อของข้า <color=#c44b0e>ดาบพิฆาตอำมหิต</color> ให้กับเจ้าเพื่อชมเชยความสำเร็จของเจ้า!

column2: Thank you, Marshal, for teaching me this unparalleled martial art!
{PlayerName}, you have made remarkable achievements in battle and hold a pivotal position in the army, I have an important matter and would like to hear your opinion.
What suggestions do you have on the timing of the attack on Chuxiang City?

The pacifying envoy of Chuxiang City has no firm stance on his allegiance. If he resists stubbornly, it will be extremely unfavorable for our army. If we want to attack Chuxiang City, we need to quickly need his pledge of allegiance or eliminate him, then everything else will fall into place.
Hmm, that makes sense. Then let's postpone the expedition for now, I need to think about how to deal with this cunning Lü Wenhuan.

Ye Family Battalion stationed outside Chuxiang City poses a great threat to our army. If Ye Family Battalion launches a pincer attack by join forces with the city's defenders during our siege, our army may face the risk of total annihilation.
Hmm, that's a possibility. Then let's postpone the expedition for now, I need to think about how to quickly eliminate Ye Family Battalion, this major concern.
I have some knowledge of divination, and the hexagram shows that it is not suitable to send troops in the near future. Those who violate this will fail.
Although I don't believe in superstitions, I have been feeling uneasy lately.\nIn that case, let's postpone the expedition for now and discuss it in a few days.
Now that the Zhao Kingdom is in internal chaos, and the regional lords are declaring independence, it's a great opportunity for our army to defeat them one by one.
The pacifying envoy of Chuxiang City still refuses to pledge his allegiance to us. If he chooses to resist stubbornly, it will be extremely unfavorable for our siege!

Lü Wenhuan doesn't want to pledge his allegiance to us, he just wants to raise his own leverage with a decent victory. he won't fight us to the death. Let's fight him as his wish, and then lure him out...
As you said, this battle is inevitable, and the sooner the better!

Ye Family Battalion stationed outside Chuxiang City poses a great threat to our army. If Ye Family Battalion launches a pincer attack by join forces with the city's defenders during our siege, our army may face the risk of total annihilation.

We can lure the snake out of the hole, enticing Ye Family Battalion to attack our army. The city's defenders will certainly not sit idly by. Once they come out to fight, they will lose the protection of the city walls.
In the open field, one cavalry of our Yan Yun Iron Army can fight a hundred enemies. Moreover, martial arts masters like us will charge into the battle, who in the world can be our opponent?
Indeed, you plan matches with mine!
Marshal has been restless recently, is it not the right time to send troops?

I have some knowledge of divination, the hexagram shows that our army has a great fortune, there is no limitation in our actions; I saw crows flying south, which is a sign of great disaster for the Zhao Kingdom, it is more advantageous for our army to send troops.
Since it is a blessing from heaven, I should follow the will of heaven!
My Yan Yun Iron Army is about to march south, keeping you will only waste food...
column3: กองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนของข้ากำลังเคลื่อนทัพลงใต้ เก็บเจ้าไว้ก็มีแต่จะสิ้นเปลืองอาหารไปเปล่าๆ...

column2: Don't kill me, Marshal, don't kill me, I can have people continue to pay ransom for me, with more gold, jewels, women and land.

Your remaining value has been squeezed out long ago, those dukes and ministers in your country are busy fighting for territory and valueables, who cares about your life and death? They even wish for your death sooner, so that the world would be in chaos.
These traitorous dukes, traitorous ministers!
Your only use now is to serve as a sacrifice for our army, to use the blood of a dignified king as a sacrifice for our army. This sincerity will surely touch gods and bless our army with victory!
No, no, you can't do this!
column3: ไม่ ไม่ ทำแบบนี้ไม่ได้!

column2: {yell} Come, serve the sacrifice to the flag!
The army is on the move! Head to Xiangfan region, prepare to attack Chuxiang City!
column3: เคลื่อนทัพ! มุ่งหน้าสู่เขตเซียงฝาน เตรียมโจมตีเมืองฉู่เซียง!

column2: The Yan Army will win!
column3: กองทัพเยี่ยนจะต้องชนะ!

column2: The Yan Army is invincible!
column3: กองทัพเยี่ยนไร้เทียมทาน!

column2: Long live the Marshal!
column3: ท่านแม่ทัพใหญ่จงเจริญ!

column2: My Yan Yun Iron Army is about to march south, keeping you Ye Family Battalion prisoners just for today.
column3: กองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนของข้าจะเคลื่อนทัพลงใต้ และจะขังเจ้าเป็นเชลยของกองพันตระกูลเย่ไว้เพียงแค่วันนี้เท่านั้น

column2: If you want to kill, just kill, why waste words!
At this point, you're still acting tough, let him kneel for me!
I thought Ye Family Battalion are really made of steel, but it turns out you're just flesh and blood.
Such a dignified Marshal of Yan Yun Iron Army. I never imagined that you are foolishly sentimental like a girl, indecisive in doing things.
{yell} Shut up!
column3: {yell}หุบปาก!

column2: {yell} Sacrifice him to the flag!!!!!
The army is on the move! Head to Xiangfan region, prepare to attack Chuxiang City!
column3: เคลื่อนทัพ! มุ่งหน้าสู่เขตเซียงฝาน เตรียมโจมตีเมืองฉู่เซียง!

column2: The Yan Army will win!

column3: กองทัพเยี่ยนไร้เทียมทาน!

column2: Long live the Marshal!
column3: ท่านแม่ทัพใหญ่จงเจริญ!

column2: {PlayerName}, you came just in time, I am about to attack Chuxiang City. I hereby appoint you as the vanguard officer, you must win this battle for me!
Yes Sir!
Chuxiang City is just ahead, shall we start attacking Chuxiang City?
With just a few you people, you still want to attack a stronghold like Chuxiang City? it's a big joke!
column3: มีคนไม่กี่คน แต่พวกเจ้าอยากจะโจมตีของแข็งอย่างป้อมปราการเมืองฉู่เซียงเนี่ยนะ, น่าหัวร่อนัก!

column2: With just a few you people, you still want to attack a stronghold like Chuxiang City? it's a big joke!
column3: มีคนไม่กี่คน แต่พวกเจ้าอยากจะโจมตีของแข็งอย่างป้อมปราการเมืองฉู่เซียงเนี่ยนะ, น่าหัวร่อนัก!

column2: Dealing with you weaklings, we don't need Marshal Wanyan to come out in person!\nAs the current vanguard officer of Yan Yun Iron Army, let me personally break open this gate!
column3: เพื่อจัดการกับสวะเช่นเจ้า คงไม่ต้องถึงมือของท่านจอมพลหวันเหยียนลงมือจัดการด้วยตนเองหรอก!\nในฐานะนายกองแนวหน้าคนปัจจุบันของกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุน ข้าจะพังประตูเมืองนี้ด้วยตนเอง!

column2: Although I don't like the way Zhao administration does things, working with them to beat you traitors is a great pleasure in life!
Traitors seeking glory, everyone can punish them!!!
If you have ill intention towards Chuxiang City, you have to ask for my permission first!
LIke a mantis trying to stop a horse carriage, can't even take a hit!
{PlayerName}, do you want to enter the city before the Marshal?
Marshal, I have defeated the city's soldiers, please enter the city.
You have made great contributions in this battle, I always reward those with high achievements!
Thank you, Marshal!\nI will devote myself to following Marshal to death!

There's nothing for you here now, when I decide on the next plan, I will send a pigeon to inform you, during this time you should strengthen yourself, there will be more tough battles to fight in the future.
Yes!
The battle is not over, it's too early to say!
The battle is not over, it's too early to say!
Ye Family Battalion... seems a bit tricky.
I caught a big fish today!\nYe Family Battalion is all out, it seems to be your fate to be destroyed here today!
{PlayerName}, this battle must annihilate Ye Family Battalion in one fell swoop, and you are the only one to blame if anyone escapes!
{yell} Ye Pengju, my Yan Yun Iron Army has finally defeated your Ye Family Battalion!
{yell} Hahaha!!!
column3: {yell}ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า!!!

column2: Ye Family Battalion, Ye Family Battalion has become history. From now on, my Yan Yun Iron Army is the truly invincible army!
column3: กองพันตระกูลเย่ กองพันตระกูลเย่ได้กลายเป็นประวัติศาสตร์แล้ว จากนี้ไปกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนของข้าคือกองทัพที่ไร้เทียมทานอย่างแท้จริง!

column2: {PlayerName}, you have made great contributions in this battle, I always reward those with high achievements!
Thank you, Marshal!\nI will devote myself to following Marshal to death!

You are no longer needed here, after I determine the next plan, I will send a message to you by carrier pigeon. During this time, you should focus on strengthening yourself, there will be more tough battles in the future.
Yes!
Grand marshal of cavalries has fallen...
I just joined Yan Yun Iron Army not long ago, and now my master is gone, what the hell am I still doing here!
column3: ข้าเพิ่งเข้าร่วมกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนเมื่อไม่นานมานี้ และตอนนี้อาจารย์ของข้าก็จากไปแล้ว แล้วข้ายังมัวมาทำอะไรอยู่ที่นี่!

column2: I might as well continue to wander around the martial arts world, looking for other places to settle down.
I just joined Yan Yun Iron Army not long ago, and now my master is gone, what's the point of taking this Chuxiang City.
column3: ข้าเพิ่งเข้าร่วมกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนเมื่อไม่นานมานี้ และตอนนี้อาจารย์ของข้าก็จากไปแล้ว การยึดเมืองฉู่เซียงนี้ทำไปเพื่ออะไร!

column2: I might as well continue to wander around the martial arts world, looking for other places to settle down.
"Return to Southern Camp immediately!"
column3: "รีบกลับไปที่ค่ายทิศใต้ทันที"

column2: I wonder what marshal wants me for at this time...
Greetings, Marshal, may I ask why did you urgently summon me?
{PlayerName}, I have an important task for you.
Please give your orders, Marshal.
column3: ท่านแม่ทัพใหญ่ โปรดสั่งการ

column2: The newly rising Nine Factions Sect in the martial arts world has formed an offensive and defensive alliance with our army. Now Nine Factions Sect has an important matter that needs our army's assistance. After the matter is completed, Nine Factions Sect will help our army to attack Lin'an City.
I order you to go to <color=#c44b0e>Buddha Temple</color> immediately to assist the master of Nine Factions Sect, Tie Mianren!
Yes!
It's my incompetence. I messed up the task of cooperating with Nine Factions Sect that marshal entrusted to me.

Choosing to cooperate with Nine Factions Sect is like making a deal with the devil. Fortunately, our Yan Yun Iron Army is strong and powerful, and we can take Lin'an City even without Nine Factions Sect.
column3: การเลือกที่จะร่วมมือกับนิกายเก้าฝ่ายก็เหมือนกับการทำข้อตกลงกับปีศาจ โชคดีที่กองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนของเราแข็งแกร่งและทรงพลังและเราก็สามารถยึดเมืองหลินอันได้แม้ว่าจะไม่มีนิกายเก้าฝ่ายก็ตาม

column2: {PlayerName}, I want you to make amends for your mistakes and personally lead a large team to attack Lin'an City, and you must succeed in one fell swoop!
Yes, sir!
I have fulfilled my duty and have successfully cooperated with Nine Factions Sect. Master of Nine Factions Sect has personally promised to assist our army in attacking Lin'an City.
Since it's a golden opportunity, if we don't send troops now, when will we!
{PlayerName}, I order you to personally lead a large team to attack Lin'an City, and you must succeed in one fell swoop. There will be no shortage of wealth and honor for you by then!
Yes, sir!
It turns out to be young hero {PlayerSurName}, long time no see, it seems that your martial arts have improved a lot.
I am {PlayerName}, under the command of Marshal Wanyan Wuzhu, I am here to assist Nine Factions Sect. May I ask which faction you belong to in Nine Factions Sect?
column3: ข้า {PlayerName} ภายใต้การบังคับบัญชาของแม่ทัพใหญ่หวันเหยียนอู๋จู ข้ามาที่นี่เพื่อช่วยเหลือนิกายเก้าฝ่าย. ข้าขอถามหน่อยได้ไหมว่าเจ้าสังกดอยู่หน่วยไหนในกลุ่มนิกายเก้าฝ่าย?

column2: I am master of Nine Factions Sect - Tie Mianren!
May I ask you, why are so many people from the martial arts world detained here?
Since you are sent by Marshal Wan Yan to assist me, there is no need to say more, just stand aside for a while, you will know soon.
column3: ในเมื่อแม่ทัพหวันเหยียนส่งเจ้ามาเพื่อช่วยเหลือข้า จึงไม่จำเป็นต้องพูดอะไร เพียงถอยออกไป แล้วเจ้าจะรู้เองในภายหลัง

column2: I didn't expect you to be one of them!
You are forced, aren't you?
I can't believe I was blind again!
Traitor, lapdog!
There's not a single good man!
I can't believe I was wrong!
Making a deal with the devil, you're not human!
A long road tests a horse's strength, time reveals a person's intention!
I hate traitors the most!
How could you collude with them!
Spit!
You selfish dog!
You're worse than dog shit.
Tsk tsk, never judge a book by its cover.
What a grand gesture from the leader of Nine Factions Sect!
The master has finally arrived!
Tie Mianren, I have arrived as promised. Show me what you've got.

My demand is simple. Nine Factions Sect and your righteous sects will compete in three rounds in a bet. The one with the most wins will be the victor. If Nine Factions Sect wins, the three sects must release the people they imprisoned years ago. If Nine Factions Sect loses, all imprisoned martial artists must be released.
The leaders of the three sects are not all here. I will personally participate in this fight. No matter how many of you there are, we will decide the winner in one round!
Alright, let's decide the winner in one round!
Your Nine Factions Sect have lost, please release everyone here!
{PlayerName}, go back and tell your marshal that Nine Factions Sect won't cooperate with the useless. The cooperation between Nine Factions Sect and Yan Yun Iron Army ends here!
column3: {PlayerName} กลับไปบอกแม่ทัพของเจ้าว่า นิกายเก้าฝ่ายจะไม่ร่วมมือกับพวกไร้ประโยชน์ ความร่วมมือระหว่างนิกายเก้าฝ่ายกับกองทัพเหล็กเยี่ยนหยุนสิ้นสุดลงตรงนี้!

column2: Let's go!
Fu Yaozi doesn't make things difficult for you, who is already isolated and helpless. You flee from Buddha Temple in panic.
Nine Factions Sect has the upper hand in this battle. Please fulfill your promise.
Is Fu Yaozi, who is known for his fairness and impartiality, going back on his words?
Since no one is upholding fairness, I don't need to keep my promise of not killing these martial artists.
{yell} Wait!
That person is locked in Ice Prison under Yunlin Temple in Lin'an City...
column3: บุคคลผู้นั้นถูกขังอยู่ในคุกน้ำแข็งใต้วัดป่าเมฆาในเมืองหลินอัน...

column2: (They couldn't be referring to the old demon locked in the ice prison, could they?)
Thank you, Elder Fu Yaozi, for upholding fairness.
Hmph!
How long do you plan to imprison these martial artists?
Now that the goal has been achieved. Of course, these people don't need to be imprisoned anymore. Elder, please take them all away.
Go back and tell your marshal that Nine Factions Sect agrees to assist the Yan Army in attacking Lin'an City. Lin'an City will surely be in marshal's possession.
column3: กลับไปบอกแม่ทัพของเจ้าว่า นิกายเก้าฝ่ายตกลงที่จะช่วยกองทัพเยี่ยนในการโจมตีเมืองหลินอัน เมืองหลินอันจะตกเป็นของแม่ทัพอย่างแน่นอน

In the third round, no one from Nine Factions Sect came forward to fight, so Zhong Yangzi wins!

column2: Evil can't overcome righteousness, a group of people who collude for evil purposes will never be accepted by the mainstream.
Please shut up, your mouth full of righteousness really makes me sick!
In the third round, no one from Nine Factions Sect came forward to fight, so Hui Yuan wins!
column3: ในรอบที่สาม, ไม่มีคนจากนิกายเก้าฝ่ายออกมาต่อสู้, ดังนั้น ฮุ่ยหยวน จึงชนะ!

column2: Amitabha, I didn't expect Nine Factions Sect to be so depleted of talents.
Time heals all wounds, it won't be long before our sect will grow strong again!

{PlayerName}, you dare to add fuel to the fire, you are unworthy of being a member of Confucius Temple. From today going forward, I will expel you, and your words and deeds will no longer be related to Confucius Temple!

Amitabha, {PlayerName}, you have lost your sense of right and wrong, good and evil. It is not suitable for you to practice in Shifa Temple anymore. From today going forward, you are no longer a disciple of the Shifa Temple.
I didn't expect my Taoist Sect to produce such a scum! {PlayerName}, Taoist Sect cannot tolerate people like you who are blinded by greed!

{PlayerName}, from today onwards, you can no longer be in Langya Sword Pavilion. You are a disgrace of Langya Sword Pavilion, and there will be fellow disciples in the future to clean up this mess for me!
You really did it!\nYou personally killed the notorious bandit Kong Yidao?!
What a great deed of immeasurable merit, now the small village will no longer be harassed.\nNow you are famous, a nobody no more!
You are really capable!\nYou actually managed to persuade this notorious bandit.
From now on, Blue Wind Camp will be leaderless. Presumably, they will no longer commit crimes.\nYou have done a great good deed.
You are wrong.
If it weren't for my strong restraint of these unruly subordinates, this Nameless village would have been ruined long ago.
Now that Blue Wind Camp is without my restraint, I'm afraid it will only get worse from now on.\nAt that time, Nameless village will have to fend for itself.
Brother Kong, why don't you go back and continue to be their boss.\nJust don't let those guys commit crimes.
Since I chose to wander the world with you, how can I go back on my word.\nBesides, I've had enough of being a bandit, that's not the life I want.
Well, it seems we can only leave it to fate.
Do you feel that this is really a tricky matter?
Although those soldiers are good-for-nothings, they have advantage in numbers, Is it wrong that we still can't overcome them?\nI advise you to give up, this is too risky for you.
Although I am just a nobody now, one day, I will become a person who is admired by everyone, and be well known all over the world!
column3: แม้ว่าตอนนี้ข้าจะเป็นเพียงใครก็ตาม แต่วันหนึ่ง ข้าจะกลายเป็นคนที่ทุกคนชื่นชม และเป็นที่รู้จักไปทั่วโลก!

column2: The current plan is to learn advanced martial arts to improve my own strength. Also, I need to raise my own reputation, to stand out as soon as possible, and let more people recognize me.
column3: แผนปัจจุบันคือการเรียนรู้วรยุทธขั้นสูงเพื่อพัฒนาความแข็งแกร่งของตัวเอง นอกจากนี้ ข้ายังต้องสร้างชื่อเสียงของตัวเองให้โดดเด่นโดยเร็วที่สุด และให้ผู้คนจำข้าได้มากขึ้น

column2: Young hero, please stop!
Pets are not allowed in Lin'an City, please leave your pet outside the city.
column3: สัตว์เลี้ยงห้ามนำเข้ามาในเมืองหลินอัน! กรุณาเอามันไว้ข้างนอกด้วย

column2: (Pets are not allowed in Lin'an City, if I can provide a guarantee with a certain amount of <color=#097a76>fame</color>, they should not stop me, what should I do now?)
Wow, so much money!
Uh... this... isn't very good...
You say it's not good, but you still take the money.
column3: เจ้าบอกว่ามันไม่ดีแต่เจ้าก็ยังเอาเงินไป

column2: Cough, I'll let you in this time,\nBe careful after you go in, don't let those government officials bump into you.
Don't worry, I know what I'm doing!
Well, forget it, who made us brothers?\nI'll pretend I didn't see anything, you go in.
Okay, thank you, big brother!
column3: ได้ ขอบคุณนะพี่ใหญ่!

column2: Be careful after you go in, don't let government officials bump into you.\nIf something really happens, I can't protect you, brother.
Understood, understood! Don't worry, big brother!
This seems a bit troublesome...
Big brother, what should we do?
How would I know what to do!
Big brother, I have a plan!
Oh, my stomach hurts, I need to go to the toilet...
Wait for me, my stomach also hurts, I'm going too!
These soldiers, they only know how to bully the weak.\nI don't believe there's anything wrong with me bringing my pet into the city!
Pets are not allowed in Lin'an City, please leave your pet outside the city.
column3: สัตว์เลี้ยงห้ามนำเข้ามาในเมืองหลินอัน! กรุณาเอามันไว้ข้างนอกด้วย

column2: Wait a minute, aren't you the great hero {PlayerName}! Please forgive my ignorance.
column3: เดี๋ยวนะ ท่านคือยอดยุทธ{PlayerName}! ขอภัยที่ข้าไม่ดูให้ดี

column2: Hahaha, it's okay, it's your duty, just be more careful next time.
column3: ฮ่าฮ่าฮ่า ไม่เป็นไร เป็นหน้าที่ของเจ้า เพียงแค่ต้องระวังในคราวหน้า

column2: Can I bring my pet into the city now?
column3: งั้นข้าเอาสัตว์เลี้ยงเข้าไปได้ใช่ไหม

column2: If it's the great hero {PlayerName}, you must be able to take care of your pet, please come in.
column3: ถ้าเป็นยอดยุทธ์{PlayerSurName} ก็ไม่มีปัญหา แต่กรุณาดูแลดีๆ อย่าให้มันไปทำร้ายใครเข้าล่ะ เชิญ

column2: Hey you! Stop right there!
column3: เฮ้ เจ้าน่ะ! หยุดตรงนั้น!

column2: Pets are not allowed in Lin'an City!
column3: สัตว์เลี้ยงห้ามนำเข้ามาในเมืองหลินอัน!

column2: Damn, they found out, run!
column3: บ้าเอ้ย โดนเจอเข้าแล้ว วิ่ง!

column2: Where do you think you're going!
column3: เจ้าคิดจะไปไหน!

column2: Pets are strictly prohibited in Lin'an City,\nI hope you can behave yourself, this will not be tolerated again!
Ah, such bad luck...\nI should be more careful next time.
What, you don't recognize me?
column3: อะไรเนี่ย เจ้าไม่รู้จักข้ารึ?

column2: Uh! It turns out to be great hero {PlayerSurName}!
column3: อึก นั่นมันยอดจอมยุทธ{PlayerSurName}!

column2: Then you can bring your pet, but please take care of it and don't let them hurt people!
column3: ถ้าอย่างนั้นเชิญท่านนำมันเข้ามาได้ แต่กรุณาดูแลดีๆ อย่าให้มันไปทำร้ายใครเข้าล่ะ

column2: Hmm, you can go now!
column3: ฮึ่ม เจ้าไปได้!

column2: Young man, wait a moment!
column3: พ่อหนุ่ม รอสักครู่!

column2: Although Chuxiang City is not big, anyone who comes here for the first time can easily get lost.
column3: แม้ว่าเมืองฉู่เซียงจะไม่ใหญ่ แต่ใครก็ตามที่มาที่นี่เป็นครั้งแรกอาจหลงทางได้ง่าย

column2: I have a <color=#c44b0e>Map - Chuxiang City</color> here, with clear markings of shops and streets, guaranteeing you not to get lost.\nThe price is clearly marked at <color=#c44b0e>500 Wen</color>, would you like to consider it?
column3: ข้ามี <color=#c44b0e>แผนที่ - เมืองฉู่เซียง</color> บอกตำแหน่งร้านค้าและถนนชัดเจน รับรองท่านไม่หลงทาง\nราคาอยู่ที่ <color=#c44b0e>500 อีแปะ</color> ท่านสนใจหรือไม่?

column2: Thank you for your patronage!
column3: ขอบคุณสำหรับการการอุดหนุนของท่าน!

column2: I guess you'll need this map sooner or later, I'll keep it for you, if you change your mind, just come and find me.
I still have the map of Chuxiang City here, would you like one?
Young hero, wait! I see that your tongue is thick and white, and your eyes are dull,\nThis is a sign of cold dampness invading the body, if not treated in time, it might...
Is it that serious?!\nAm I poisoned? Is there a cure?
Don't panic, young hero, I have a <color=#c44b0e>Cold medicinal pill</color> here that can cure this disease.
column3: จอมยุทธ์น้อยอย่าตื่นตระหนกไป ข้ามี<color=#c44b0e>ยาขจัดความชื้น</color>อยู่ที่นี่ มันสามารถรักษาโรคเช่นนี้ได้

column2: I have a predestined relationship with you, so I will give you this medicine.\nIf you want to cure the disease, you need to take the medicine as soon as possible to avoid losing its efficacy.
What kind of medicine is this, it smells weird...\nIs it really effective?
Of course, I am a disciple of <color=#c44b0e>White Cloud Temple</color>!\nMaking medicine is my specialty, please don't worry.
So you are a Taoist from <color=#c44b0e>White Cloud Temple</color>, I'm sorry for my rudeness.\nI was doubting you just now, I apologize.
By the grace of heavenly lords, it's my duty to save people.\nI hope you are healthy, we will meet again in the future.
I feel dizzy after taking the medicine...
Something seems... off...
You feel dizzy and lose consciousness without realizing it, until 6 hours later...
column3: เจ้ารู้สึกวิงเวียนศีรษะและหมดสติโดยไม่รู้ตัว จนกระทั่งสามชั่วยามต่อมา...

column2: Ah... I had a good sleep...
Eh? Why did I sleep here?
Who can tell me what just happened...
Why do I feel a bit strange, as if I'm missing something.
Where is my Money bag? How did it disappear?!
column3: ถุงเงินของข้าอยู่ที่ไหน? มันหายไปได้ยังไง!

column2: Today's yield is really good...
I didn't expect there would be fools who would eat that thing without thinking.
I'll ask the boss to make me some more tonight, and continue to distribute it tomorrow~
Isn't that the Taoist who gave me the Cold medicinal pill?\nHe must have taken my money, I have to get it back from him!
column3: นั่นคือนักพรตเต๋าที่ให้ยาแก้หวัดแก่ข้าไม่ใช่หรือ?\nเขาคงเอาเงินของข้าไป ข้าจะต้องเอามันกลับมาจากเขา!

column2: Where did this stinky brat come from? Coming to smash old monster's place, are you tired of living?
Cut the crap, did you guys make the Cold medicinal pill?
