Well, there's nothing for you here anymore, you can leave.
Since you are stubborn, don't blame me for being ruthless under my knife!
Well, no wonder you are fearless.\nToday, I, the leader, admit defeat, {PlayerName}, you have made an enemy with Jiujiang Fotress, from today on, you'd better not let me see your face!
I can't believe they would kick me out for a mere 20 guan.\nI don't need this Shuizhai!

If you don't drink the toast, you have to drink the penalty.\nConsidering your past contributions to Shuizhai, I, the leader, will spare your life today, but from today on, you are no longer a brother of this stronghold.
Get out, I don't want to see you again.
Alas, I can't believe they would kick me out for a mere 20 guan.\nI knew I shouldn't have been greedy for this small benefit.
This 20 guan silver ticket...
Innkeeper, can I exchange this silver ticket here?
Well, this is indeed our silver ticket, do you want to exchange it now, young hero?
Come and find me when you want to exchange it, young hero.
Alright, please wait a moment, young hero.
A moment later...
Here is 20 guan, not a single coin less, please keep it well, young hero.
Do you want to exchange the silver ticket, young hero?

{PlayerName}, you didn't ask too much about the letter to Prefect earlier, good. I have a secret letter here, I need you to deliver it to the Pier of Lin'an City at <color=#c44b0e>Zi Shi</color>, there will be a big reward after the task is completed.
Zi Shi? Sounds suspicious...\nWho is the recipient?
You don't need to ask too much, there will be someone to receive the letter.\nDon't talk too much about this to others, just help me deliver it.

Young Lady, Zhuge Shenji asked me to deliver a secret letter, he asked me to deliver it to the Pier of Lin'an City at Zi Shi, and he didn't tell me who the recipient is, I think there is something fishy about this.
It is indeed suspicious, I don't know what this Zhuge is up to.\nNever mind, let me see what's written in the letter first.
Young Lady, here is the letter.
What the hell is this Zhuge up to, every single word in the letter looks like a ghost symbol, I can't understand it at all!
Is it a case of realizing the importance of knowledge only when it's needed? So the dignified Young Lady of Jiujiang Fotress can't read?
Stop the smart talk, if you can, read it yourself!
Let me see, what's the big deal!
This... every word is twisted like a tadpole, I can't understand what it says either.
Yo, who would have thought that our well-read {PlayerName} has become a Coin blind?
Wait for me, Young Lady, I'm sure I can find someone who knows this Coin character!
Forget it, that would take too much time and might arouse suspicion from that Zhuge guy.\nI'll just copy this letter down for now, and if I get the chance, I'll deal with it later.
The Coin characters on the letter are twisted and turned, like tadpoles.\nDing Haitang spent half a shichen copying the letter with a furrowed brow before she finally finished.
Phew... Finally finished copying. You go on and deliver the letter, don't let that Zhuge guy notice anything.
...No one is following you, right?
Shouldn't be...
Good, just hand the letter to me.
...I've received the item. You can go back now, don't talk about this with others.
Counselor, your letter has been delivered successfully.
Well done, here's your reward. You're a smart one, don't mention this to anyone.
Was that person just now from Dragonfly City?\nWhy does Counselor Zhuge still have contact with people from Dragonfly City?
Forget it, it's no use thinking about it here, I'd better go and tell Counselor Zhuge that the letter has been delivered.
That guy looked suspicious, I wonder why Counselor Zhuge has contact with such a person?
Forget it, it's no use thinking about it here, I'd better go and tell Counselor Zhuge that the letter has been delivered.

{PlayerName}, you did a good job with the letter delivery task I gave you earlier.\nToday, I have another letter that needs to be delivered to Duke Kang. There will be a generous reward once the task is completed.
Deliver a letter to Duke Kang? Didn't we just have a falling out with him?\nWhat's the purpose of sending him a letter at this time?
It's about the future of the Water Village, you don't need to ask too many questions, just do as you're told.
To Duke Kang? Is it to explain the previous Special Envoy incident to the Duke?
It's about the future of the Water Village, you don't need to ask too many questions, just do as you're told.
To Duke Kang? Does our Water Village still have contact with Duke Kang's manor?
Our Water Village owes its current state to Duke Kang's help in many ways, so naturally, our relations are close.
I see, don't worry, I'll make sure the letter is delivered.
Young Lady, Zhuge Shenji gave me another letter, this time it's to be delivered to Duke Kang.
Duke Kang? What does that guy want to say to Duke Kang?\nGive it to me, let me see!
Young Lady, what's wrong? Is it another one of those incomprehensible Coin characters?
Young Lady, what's wrong? Is there something you don't understand?
No, it's not that I don't understand...\nI just really can't figure out what this Zhuge guy is trying to do...
What does the letter say?

"Take meat... something about two taels placed in the center of the dough, fold the dough in two directions... something about combining, wait for the water... should mean boiling, then you can put the dumplings into... the water..."
What is Young Lady talking about?
I'm illiterate, got a problem with that!
No, no problem at all...
Hmph, you can read it yourself!

"Take two taels of meat filling, place it in the center of the dough, fold the dough in two directions to seal it, wait for the water to boil, then you can put the dumplings into the boiling water..."
Isn't this the steps to make dumplings? Why would Zhuge Shenji discuss this with Duke Kang?
I really don't understand what this Zhuge guy is trying to do.
Young Lady, should I copy this letter down?
Hmm, just to be safe, let's copy it down.
A moment later...
Alright, it's copied.\nYou go on and deliver the letter, don't let that Zhuge guy become suspicious.
What a bold {PlayerName}, daring to come to my mansion.\nWhat brings you here this time?
{PlayerName}, what brings you to my mansion?
Our strategist has a letter for your highness, please have a look.
Zhuge Shenji? Alright, bring it up.
Hahaha, this Zhuge Shenji still remembers my casual remark.\n{PlayerName}, tell him for me, tell him I appreciate his recipe, I will try this Jiujiang Fotress style dumplings!
Yes, sir.
Report to the strategist, the letter to Duke Kang has been delivered.
Good, what did Duke Kang say?
Duke Kang said he appreciates the recipe from the strategist, and he wants to try the Jiujiang Fotress style dumplings.
Haha, good, it's great that Duke Kang is interested in dumplings.\n{PlayerName}, you did a good job this time, here is your reward.
There are many affairs in the water village, I need to advise the village chief, I can't run away from here.
column3: ยังมีธุระอีกมากมายในค่ายน้ำแห่งนี้ ข้าต้องการคำแนะนำจากท่านหัวหน้าค่ายก่อน ข้าไปทั้งอย่างนี้มิได้

column2: We have an old score to settle, how can we turn the page?
With my strategy, I can definitely help you!
If you want me to go with you, make room for me first.
Zhuge Shenji, the dumplings of Jiujiang Fotress are indeed delicious, you did a good job, I have to reward you.
It's all thanks to Duke Kang's good cultivation.
And {PlayerName}, you are indeed my brother-in-law, you did a good job too.
Your highness is too kind.
And {PlayerName}, you are indeed my confidant, you did quite well, I hope you keep it up.
I will definitely live up to your trust, your highness.
And {PlayerName}, you did a good job, work for me more in the future, I won't treat you badly.
Thank you for your promotion, your highness.
You two are my left and right arms, my great cause still needs your help. As long as you are loyal to me, I will never treat you badly!
Thank you, your highness!
Jiujiang Fotress chief, Zhuge Shenji, receive the decree!
(I happened to meet the decree, although I am no longer a member of Jiujiang Fotress, but according to propriety, I should kneel down together...)

The emperor's decree says:\nJiujiang Fotress has committed numerous crimes, disregarding the law. They rob and kill officials and merchants, and the chief, Zhuge Shenji, never restrains them, leading to more and more crimes.

Since I ascended the throne, these crimes have not been curbed, but have become more and more rampant.\nI should have sent troops to eradicate the water village, but I am kind-hearted and soft, I can't bear to cause such a waste of resources and increase the killing.

After thinking it over, the crimes of Jiujiang Fotress are all due to the chief not restraining the thieves in the village, allowing them to commit crimes. Therefore, all the crimes are on the chief, Zhuge Shenji.

Today, I specially grant Zhuge Shenji three feet of white silk. After your death, all the members of Jiujiang Fotress will be dismissed and return home, and all past crimes will be forgiven.\nThis is my decree.
Chief Zhuge, please receive the decree.
What does the emperor mean by this?
The emperor is merciful and pardons your Jiujiang Fotress, forgiving all past crimes. You, Chief Zhuge, should gladly accept such a good thing.
Should Master Zhuge accept this imperial edict and white silk or not?
Thank you for your kindness, Your Majesty, but we of Jiujiang Fortress are all outlaws who can't enter the court. We truly don't have the fortune to accept this imperial edict.
Master Zhuge, that's what you think, but do your subordinates think the same?
Only the leader needs to be punished?|We can all be pardoned?|I don't want to die with the leader...|I want to go home and get married...|Sorry, leader...|Survival is more important...
Live and die with the leader!
Master Zhuge, I'll give you one last chance to choose. Will you accept this imperial edict or not?
I just became the leader, and before I could even warm my seat, he wants to get rid of me? Today, I must fight to the death!
Very well, Your Majesty knew you would resist. Give the order, anyone in Jiujiang Fortress who doesn't help capture Zhuge Shenji will be killed without mercy!
{PlayerName} brother, will you help me?
{PlayerName}, His Majesty said, if you are here, he has a word of advice for you. Don't meddle in other people's business!
(What should I do now...)

(This is a tough choice. Either resist the edict and face the emperor's troops, or commit suicide and let the whole fortress be disbanded. The Jian Yan Emperor's move is really ruthless. I wonder what Brother Zhuge will do...)
You are my true brother!
Well, it seems that {PlayerName}, you are going to be an enemy of His Majesty! Capture them all!
Zhuge Shenji has been executed. Those who stop resisting will be pardoned, those who continue to resist will be killed without mercy!

With the death of Zhuge Shenji, the fortress filled with the sounds of fighting gradually returned to peace. Under the arrangement of the Eunuch, you and the other survivors were sent to the Ferry outside the fortress.
Alas, I couldn't save Brother Zhuge...
{PlayerName}, His Majesty, considering old times, ordered me not to take your life. I hope you will take care of yourself and serve His Majesty faithfully from now on.
You ultimately failed to save Zhuge Shenji. The Eunuch, seeing that you still have use for the Jian Yan Emperor, did not make things difficult for you and sent you to the Ferry outside the fortress.
column3: ในที่สุดเจ้าก็ล้มเหลวในการช่วยจูเก๋อเฉินจี ขันทีที่รับมอบคำสั่ง เห็นว่าเจ้ายังพอมีประโยชน์กับฮ่องเต้เจี้ยนเหยียน จึงไม่ได้ทำให้เจ้าอับอายและส่งเจ้าไปที่ท่าเรือข้ามฟากนอกหมู่บ้าน

column2: Alas, I couldn't save Brother Zhuge...
You dare to defy the emperor, Zhuge Shenji, you and your Jiujiang Fortress can wait for death!
And you, {PlayerName}, you helped the tyrant, His Majesty will remember this!
Whether he is Duke Kang or Jian Yan Emperor, I won't be afraid!
column3: ไม่ว่าเขาจะเป็นอ๋องคังหรือฮ่องเต้เจี้ยนเหยียน ข้าก็ไม่กลัวทั้งนั้น!

column2: You--you! {PlayerName}, His Majesty has been good to you, why--
Don't worry, sir, listen to me.

Sir, I have a deep connection with Jiujiang Fortress. Please tell His Majesty that from today on, I will take care of Jiujiang Fortress. If they commit any crimes in the future, I will personally destroy Jiujiang Fortress.
This guy is after all a trusted aide of His Majesty...
Alright, {PlayerSurName} sir, I will convey your words to His Majesty. As for His Majesty's decision, I can't guarantee.
Thank you, sir.
Brother Zhuge, why have you been silent since just now?
...Brother {PlayerSurName}, tell me, what's the point of me struggling to get to where I am now?
You're talking about the point...
Yes, what's the point!
I've made so many arrangements, even staked my own life, just to barely climb to the position of Lord of Water Camp and gain the favor of His Majesty.
But in the end, what's the result!\nIn the end, I'm still a pawn in someone else's hand, summoned and dismissed at will, worth less than a Coin!
Today you're here and you saved me, but what about next time? And the time after that!\nAm I really just waiting to die here, like that Eunuch said!
Brother Zhuge...
You go, let me calm down...
Alright...
Ding Fengbo... if you were still alive, what would you do...
My uncle actually let someone like you join the Water Camp? Really, even if we need to recruit more soldiers and horses, not just any Tom, Dick, or Harry can join the Water Camp...
Young Lady, your words are a bit hurtful, I'm not just any Tom, Dick, or Harry...
Oh? You think I'm wrong? Then let's talk with our fists.\nIf you can beat me at 50% strength, I'll acknowledge you.
Alright, it's a deal!
You're quite ambitious, are you ready?
I thought you were ambitious.\nNever mind, let's wait until you're ready.
So, are you ready this time?
Alright, watch out!
Sigh, it seems you're only good at talking.
It's just that I was careless, wait for me to prepare well and I can definitely beat you!
Alright, then you go and prepare.
So, Young Lady, I'm not just any Tom, Dick, or Harry, right?
I didn't expect you to have some strength, I underestimated you.
Wait, you have such strength to come to the Water Camp, are you planning something else?
Young Lady, you can't block both ends of the conversation...
Anyway, you work hard in the camp, don't have any crooked thoughts, I'll be watching you, understand?
I, I understand, Young Lady...
Alright, I'll give you some more time to prepare.
Although I acknowledge your strength, don't be too happy, I haven't trusted you yet.
Young Lady, what are you going to do...
"Again"? What do you mean? You're a new brother in the Water Camp, isn't it normal for me to assess you for the future of the Water Camp?
Yes, yes, Young Lady, you're right...
So, Young Lady, how can I earn your trust?
Hmm, I haven't thought about that...
What do you mean by that look? Do you have an opinion?!
No, no, how dare I...
Let me think... how about this, I'll ask you a few questions, and you have to answer me truthfully!
Hmm, if my uncle needs you for something, there's nothing I can do, come find me after you're done.
{PlayerName}, do you have time to answer my questions this time?
Strange, why does my uncle always need you...\nYou're not lying to me, are you?
Hmm, okay, then...
Listen up, first question, are you willing to give everything, even your HP, for the development of Shuizhai?
The second question, let me think...\nHmm, what would you do if someone offered you a large sum of money to buy information about Shuizhai?
The third one...\nWhat would you do if your uncle ordered you to do something you didn't want to do?
Well, the fourth question.\nWhat would you do if Shuizhai faced a catastrophe?
The last question, um...\nNever mind, let's just ask why you want to join Jiujiang Fotress.
To learn martial arts?\nAlthough there are a few martial arts in Shuizhai, there's nothing particularly noteworthy...
But if your goal is to learn martial arts, maybe one day you'll switch to another family for the same reason.
If you keep talking nonsense, I'll have my uncle feed you to the crocodiles!
What do you mean by that?\nNever mind, there are people like that sometimes.
I've asked all my questions, let me think...
As I thought, I can't trust you at all. But since my uncle allowed you to join Shuizhai, I'll treat you as one of us.
But if you do anything harmful to Shuizhai, I'll kill you myself, understand?
I, I understand...
Well, although there are some flaws, you should be a trustworthy person.
Alright, I'll trust you for now, I hope you'll do your best for Shuizhai in the future, and not go against your answers to my questions.
...You didn't research my preferences and deliberately say what I wanted to hear, did you?
Of course not, these are all my true thoughts.
Hmph, I'll trust you for now.\nFrom today on, I'll treat you as my own brother, I hope you won't betray my trust.
Is this... a pigeon message?
"Miss has something to discuss with you, please come to my room after Xu Shi and before Hai Shi."
It seems that Young Lady has something to discuss with me, but she wants me to go to her room at night, I wonder what it is...
Young Lady, it's me, {PlayerName}, may I come in?
Yes, come in.
How dare you come in without knocking!\nThank God I wasn't changing, or I would have poked your eyes out!
Young Lady, I'm sorry, I'll knock next time...
Alright, remember this!\nIf you dare to do this again, I'll skin you alive!
Alright, let's save some time and get down to business.
I wonder what Young Lady wants to discuss with me late at night?
You should have met the military adviser of Shuizhai, Zhuge Shenji.
I haven't dealt with him yet, what's up?
I've had some dealings with him, what does Young Lady want to do?
He's been acting strangely lately, I suspect he has ill intentions towards Shuizhai and my uncle.
This... Young Lady, do you have any evidence?
That's why I called you here, because I don't have any evidence.
Could it be that Young Lady wants me to investigate Zhuge Shenji?
Yes, I want you to get close to him, gain his trust, and report any clues to me.
Young Lady, this...
I know it's difficult for you, I won't force you to agree, but I'll only give you this one chance to choose. Think carefully and tell me, will you help me investigate Zhuge Shenji?
(Should I help Young Lady investigate Zhuge Military Advisor?)
Alright, there's nothing for you here, you can leave now.
If Young Lady needs me, I will naturally go to Soup and face the fire without hesitation!
I knew you would agree!\nThen I will wait for your good news.
Another pigeon letter, I wonder if it's from Young Lady.

"{PlayerName} is hereby informed that I have made a new discovery regarding the matter we discussed earlier. As it is of great importance, I cannot decide on my own. Please come to Haitang Habitat between Xu Shi and Hai Shi to discuss."
The signature at the bottom is: Ding Haitang.
Could it be that Young Lady has found something from the previous letter?\nBut something seems strange...
Young Lady, it's me, {PlayerName}, may I come in?
Young Lady didn't respond, the light in the room is still on, she should not be asleep, did she go out for something?
Never mind, let's go in and check.
Young Lady? Young Lady, are you there?
There's no movement at all, it seems that Young Lady is really not in the room.
Young Lady!
Sorry, Young Lady, I didn't mean to peek at you sleeping...\nYou didn't make a sound, I thought there was no one in the room...
Young Lady?
Great, it seems that Young Lady didn't wake up...
That's not right, if Young Lady was sleeping, why would the light still be on...\nI've never heard of Young Lady having the habit of sleeping with the light on...
And with such a big noise, Young Lady still didn't wake up.\nSomething feels wrong, let's go check...
Young Lady, I didn't mean to offend you, please forgive me...
Young Lady's face is purple, she's unconscious and not dressed...\nWhat on earth happened...
Young Lady, forgive my rudeness, I brought the things you wanted.
Why does it have to be now...
{PlayerName}, why are you in Young Lady's room?! Where is Young Lady?
Young Lady!\nI can't believe {PlayerName} you would do such a thing to Young Lady--!
No no no, Military Advisor, let me explain...
Alright, considering our past relationship, I'll listen to your explanation.
Young Lady asked me to meet her tonight, when I came in she was already lying on the bed with a purple face, seems to be poisoned and unconscious...
Is there anyone who can testify for you?
Sigh, it's not that I don't want to believe you, but your words are not convincing...
Then, what should I do...\nIs my reputation going to be ruined here...
Zhuge Military Advisor, considering our past relationship, can you help me...
Considering our relationship, I can let you go and run away from here.\nBut from now on, don't come near Jiujiang Fotress again.

(Should I accept Zhuge Military Advisor's proposal to run away from the water village? But if I just run away from the water village, I'm afraid this crime will be confirmed, and I will never be able to return to the water village.)
Alright, before a third person finds out, you better leave and never come back.
Thank you, Military Advisor.

You dare not stay for a moment, taking advantage of the night to row a boat and run away from Jiujiang Fortress.\nSoon, the rumor that you raped Ding Haitang and killed her spread throughout the camp, and Ding Fengbo swore to tear you apart in his rage.\nAs for the truth, it may never see the light of day.
No, if I run away like this, wouldn't it confirm that I am the murderer who harmed the Young Lady? I can't take the blame for this without knowing the truth!
If that's the case, there's nothing more to say.
{PlayerName}, brother, it was personal just now, but now it's official business.\nGiven the current situation, I can only take you to see the camp leader, I hope you don't mind my heavy hand!
What can you argue against in this situation?\nToday, I will rid the water camp of you, a traitor!
{PlayerName}, you dare to resist...
I heard you guys making a fuss in the Hall of Righteousness, what happened?
Haitang, what's wrong with you—
Can either of you explain what happened here?

The Young Lady asked me for a chess manual earlier, I found it tonight and wanted to give it to her, and I happened to bump into {PlayerName} alone in front of the Young Lady's bed, and by then the Young Lady was already like this...
Leader, listen to my explanation...
...Alright, I'll listen to your explanation.\nBut if you can't explain it clearly, I swear I'll tear you apart and feed you to the crocodiles!
Young Lady asked me to meet her tonight, when I came in she was already lying on the bed with a purple face, seems to be poisoned and unconscious...
...That's it?
That's... that's all...
Your explanation doesn't sound true at all.
Leader, even if I had great abilities, I wouldn't dare to lie to you!\nThat's how it happened, I really didn't do anything, you must believe me, leader!
...Although I trust your character, there is currently no evidence to exonerate you.
Here's the deal, since you claim that you didn't harm Haitang, I'll give you a chance. You said Haitang was severely poisoned, so I'll assign you the task of treating Haitang!
I'll give you ten days. If Haitang doesn't improve after ten days, even if you hide at the ends of the earth, I'll capture you alive and tear you apart!
Please rest assured, leader, I will definitely cure the Young Lady!
What can you explain in this situation!\nHow dare you hurt Haitang, I'll break your legs!
This kid is so powerful...
Leader, please calm down and listen to me...
...Alright, I'll listen to your explanation.\nBut if you can't explain it clearly, I swear I'll tear you apart and feed you to the crocodiles!
Young Lady asked me to meet her tonight, when I came in she was already lying on the bed with a purple face, seems to be poisoned and unconscious...
...That's it?
That's... that's all...
Your explanation doesn't sound true at all.
Leader, even if I had great abilities, I wouldn't dare to lie to you!\nThat's how it happened, I really didn't do anything, you must believe me, leader!
With your abilities, if you really wanted to harm Haitang, you wouldn't need to use poison.\nBut this doesn't mean I fully trust you, after all, there is no evidence to prove your innocence.
Here's the deal, since you claim that you didn't harm Haitang, I'll give you a chance. You said Haitang was severely poisoned, so I'll assign you the task of treating Haitang!
I'll give you ten days. If Haitang doesn't improve after ten days, even if you hide at the ends of the earth, I'll capture you alive and tear you apart!
Please rest assured, leader, I will definitely cure the Young Lady!
The Young Lady has no external injuries, she should just be poisoned.

Her face is purple, her tongue is black, and her eyes are bloodshot...\nThis should be the Black Lotus poison from Dongying, the dose of poison the Young Lady took should not be large, if it were a little larger, it would be difficult to cure.

As for the antidote... it requires one portion of Cordyceps sinensis, one portion of Dragon's blood, one portion of Atractylodes, supplemented with a Dogen as a drug guide, taken with warm water, it should be able to detoxify.
They are not particularly expensive drugs, they should all be available.
Her face is purple, her tongue is black, and her eyes are bloodshot... the person who poisoned her is really sinister.
Miss Qu, do you have any idea about this poison?
Hmm, this is not the Poison from the Central Plains, it should be the Black Lotus Poison from Dongying. My master once accidentally obtained a dose and left some records.
Is there a way to detoxify this poison?

The poison itself is not difficult to detoxify. You only need one portion of Cordyceps sinensis, one portion of Dragon's blood, one portion of Atractylodes, and a Dogen as a medicine guide. Take it with warm water and you can detoxify this poison.
They are not particularly expensive drugs, they should all be available.
Young Lady's face is ashen, I don't know what kind of poison she has been poisoned with... It would be great if there was a partner who is proficient in Medical to take a look.
The Herb needed to treat Young Lady has been gathered, I must hurry back, I hope it's not too late.
Finally made it back, Young Lady, I will prepare the antidote for you right away...
You prepare the antidote for Ding Haitang and feed it to her.\nAfter taking the antidote, Ding Haitang's complexion gradually improved, and she quickly regained consciousness.
{PlayerSurName} son, I will prepare the antidote for Miss Ding, please step aside.
Qu Wangyou prepares the antidote for Ding Haitang and feeds it to her.\nAfter taking the antidote, Ding Haitang's complexion gradually improved, and she quickly regained consciousness.
Although I brought back the Herb, how to decoct the medicine... It seems that Miss Qu still needs to take action.
This is...
Young Lady, you finally woke up!
Why does it sound like something happened from what you said...
Hey, {PlayerName}, why are you talking behind the screen?
Young Lady, take a look down...
Hmm? Look down--?
Ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah ah——!
Generate Ding Haitang, disappearance on the bed
{PlayerName}, tell me honestly, who dared to insult this lady so much!
Young Lady, I was hoping you could tell me...\nWhat happened before you lost consciousness? Think carefully.
Um... I remember having dinner that day, I didn't have anything planned for the night, I dealt with some trivial matters and then went back to my room, and then somehow I fell asleep...
You didn't have anything planned for the night... Young Lady, you clearly had an appointment with me...
I had an appointment with you? I don't remember.
Young Lady, I still have this letter you sent me, take a look?

"{PlayerName}... Regarding the matter we discussed earlier, I have made a new discovery. As it is of great importance, I cannot decide on my own. Please come to Haitang Habitat between Xu Shi and Hai Shi to discuss."

This is not a letter I wrote. I can't write such a pretentious letter, and the handwriting is completely different from mine, and there are words I don't even recognize. This letter must be a forgery.
Yes, this letter must have been forged by that Zhuge guy, only he could write such pretentious stuff!
Isn't it a bit too quick to make such a decision...
Then can you think of anyone else?
This...
Oh, Haitang, you're awake!
Haitang, you're finally awake, do you know how worried your uncle was...\nHow are you feeling now? Any discomfort? Still feeling dizzy?
Um... Uncle, I'm fine...
Good, good, as long as you're fine. I'll order the brothers in the kitchen to prepare a feast to celebrate!
Uncle... {PlayerName} is still watching...
Cough, cough, {PlayerName}, so you're here too. When did you come in?
Chief, I've been here from the start. I found the antidote and saved the Young Lady...
Hahaha, good, I knew you could do it! You must come to the banquet today, we won't stop until we're drunk!
Hahahaha——
Is the Chief a bit abnormal...
When my uncle is particularly happy, he behaves like this. Don't take it personally.
Alright, but now that the Young Lady has recovered, the Chief should no longer doubt me, right?
Right, where were we...
Young Lady, you said this must have been done by the military advisor...
Yes, it must be that Zhuge guy! I'm going to confront him right now!
Young Lady, even if it was him, we don't have any evidence.
Then let's go find some! When he's not in his room, let's go in and look for it together. No matter how cunning he is, he must have left some evidence!
Alright, let's do as the Young Lady says.
Good, {PlayerName}, when the time is right, invite me to go with you. Don't go by yourself!
Alright, it's a deal.
Damn, I couldn't save the Young Lady within ten days. This is bad, the Chief will definitely think I'm the one who hurt the Young Lady. He won't let me go, I can't go back to the water stronghold...
Young Lady, please wait a little longer, I'll gather the herbs soon.
Young Lady, a lot has happened while you were unconscious...\nZhuge, the military advisor, is dead...
Really... Then there's no need to investigate him...
Right, I haven't thanked you yet.\nThank you for saving my life.
We're all part of the water stronghold family. It's my duty, Young Lady, you don't need to be so formal.
With Zhuge dead, there's no point in investigating further.
Next, I need to handle the mess that guy left behind for my uncle. I can't accompany you anymore.
The military advisor is dead, there's no need to continue the investigation.
{PlayerName}, you killed my uncle, I swear I'll avenge him!
Given the current situation, it seems pointless to continue the investigation.
Since {PlayerName} doesn't want to stay in the water stronghold, I won't force him. I'll investigate Zhuge's case myself, so as not to waste your time.
{PlayerName}, please don't touch other people's things.
The Young Lady told me not to act alone. To prevent her from getting angry later, I should invite her to come with me.
This is... a dark powder...
The smell and characteristics of this powder...
There's no mistake, this must be the poison of the black lotus!
{PlayerSurName}, young hero, can I take a look at this powder?
Of course, no problem.
This... There's no mistake, this is the powder of the black lotus poison.
Miss Forgetful, are you sure?
Yes, the color and smell are exactly the same as the records left by my master. It should be correct.
No, my medical skills are not enough, I can't figure out what this is...
Anyway, it's definitely not something ordinary.\n{PlayerName}, let's go find someone who knows about medicine to figure out what this is.
This medicinal powder...
So, do you have any clues, senior?
This medicinal powder should be some kind of Poison, but I'm not knowledgeable enough. If it were someone from the Herbology Sect, they should be able to recognize it...
Someone from the Herbology Sect...
Let's go, we'll go find someone from the Herbology Sect and ask them!
The medicinal powder I got before, I should be able to recognize what it is now.
The smell and characteristics of this powder...
There's no mistake, this must be the poison of the black lotus!
Miss Forgetful, I previously obtained a medicinal powder, but I don't know what it is. I would like to ask for your help...
Can I take a look at the medicinal powder?
Of course, no problem.
This... can't be wrong, this is the powder of Black Lotus Poison.
Miss Forgetful, are you sure?
Yes, the color and smell are exactly the same as the records left by my master. It should be correct.
I previously obtained a medicinal powder by chance, and I would like to ask you to help me identify it.
This medicinal powder...
So, do you have any clues, senior?
This medicinal powder should be some kind of Poison, but I'm not knowledgeable enough. If it were someone from the Herbology Sect, they should be able to recognize it...
Someone from the Herbology Sect...
It seems that the incident of Young Lady being poisoned is indeed related to Zhuge Military Advisor.
Let's go tell Young Lady about this first.
Young Lady, we now know what the medicinal powder found in Zhuge Military Advisor's room is.
I knew you could figure it out! What is it?
It's the powder of Black Lotus Poison.
Black Lotus Poison? What is that?
It's the poison you were previously poisoned with...
It must be that Zhuge guy's doing!\n{PlayerName}Let's go, let's go find that Zhuge guy and settle the score!
Wait, Young Lady, are you going to confront him directly?
Yeah, what else?
That guy is full of tricks. If you go to him without any preparation, you might fall into his trap. I think we should report this to the leader first...
...You smart people really don't mind the trouble. I think it's faster to just stab him a couple of times.
Fine, I'll follow you. You decide what to do. It's easier for me, as long as I can vent my anger.
Don't worry, I'll definitely give you the chance to stab him a couple of times.
Deal.
A spoken word is past recalling.
(I need to think about this carefully. Should I confront Zhuge Shenji directly, or should I report to the leader first?)
(Now that Young Lady is not with me, I should invite Young Lady to join me before confronting Zhuge Shenji.)
Zhuge, you must give me a reasonable explanation for this medicinal powder today!
What medicinal powder? What are you talking about, Young Lady?
It's the powder of Black Lotus Poison!
What Black Lotus Poison? I really don't understand what you're talking about.
Are you still denying it at this point!
It's not that I want to deny it, but I really don't know what you're talking about, Young Lady.
Zhuge, you won't turn back until you hit the wall!\nHere's the evidence, this was found in your room, don't say you've never seen it!
I didn't expect it to be discovered by Young Lady...
Young Lady, {PlayerName}, this is not the place to talk. Please follow me to Shenji Pavillion, where I will definitely give a satisfactory explanation.
Fine, if you can't explain, I'll definitely stab you a couple of times!
We've arrived at Shenji Pavillion, I want to hear what you have to say!
Zhuge, you must give me a reasonable explanation for this medicinal powder today!
What medicinal powder? What are you talking about, Young Lady?
It's the powder of Black Lotus Poison!
What Black Lotus Poison? I really don't understand what you're talking about.
Are you still denying it at this point!
It's not that I want to deny it, but I really don't know what you're talking about, Young Lady.
Zhuge, you won't turn back until you hit the wall!\nHere's the evidence, this was found in your room, don't say you've never seen it!
I didn't expect it to be discovered by Young Lady...
What do you mean by this, Zhuge?
I was about to go to bed and turned off the lights. The room is too dark now, please allow me to light the lamp before we talk.
Fine, go ahead.
To be honest, I obtained this medicine by chance. I know nothing about its properties or name. If Young Lady knows, I hope you can enlighten me.
Do you think I'm a fool, Zhuge? Such lies might fool a three-year-old child.
Zhuge Shenji, don't deny it. That day, you poisoned Young Lady first, then forged her letter to lure me to her room, trying to frame me for everything!
These are all your speculations. What benefits would I gain from doing this?
You could use the fortress master to get rid of Young Lady who has been investigating you, and me who has been helping her. It's like killing two birds with one stone.
But unfortunately, you didn't expect that I could cure Young Lady's poison and trace it back to you!
...It seems there's no point in denying it anymore.
You're right. My plan was flawless, but I didn't expect you to be so capable, which led to its failure!
Zhuge, you actually——!
Zhuge Shenji, what benefits do you gain from doing this?
It's simple. Once you two are dead, Ding Fengbo's power will be greatly weakened, and I will have the opportunity to replace him.
Zhuge, my uncle has treated you well, and you actually!
Treated me well? So what, the Jiujiang Fortress is wasted in his hands. Only in my hands can it be used to its fullest potential.
This is outrageous! Today, I will get rid of you, the traitor, for my uncle!
Damn it, why can't I exert my strength...
As expected of Young Lady, you still have such skills even after taking the Enfeeble pill.
Young Lady, there's poison in that lamp!
No wonder he insisted on us coming to his room. He had set up a trap long ago.
That's right, but it's too late for you to realize it now!
Zhuge, you actually have connections with Dragonfly City!
They're just business partners.\nDon't worry, Young Lady. I will tell the fortress master that Dragonfly City attacked me, and you and {PlayerName} sacrificed yourselves to protect me.
Zhuge Shenji——!
Take action!
Damn it, my plan was just a little bit off...
Damn {PlayerName}, if it weren't for you, I would have taken over the water fortress...
I can't accept this...
What happened? It was noisy just now.
Hmm? What happened here? What's wrong with the strategist?
Uncle, the strategist, no, this Zhuge...
Ding Haitang tells Ding Fengbo the whole story.
I can't believe this happened!\nWhy didn't you discuss it with me earlier? If anything happened to you, how would I explain it to my brother...
As for you. You ungrateful wretch, coveting the fortress master's position is one thing, but you even tried to assassinate Haitang!
You're lucky to die at their hands. Otherwise, I would have torn you to pieces!
{PlayerName}, you did well. If it weren't for you, Haitang might not have escaped this disaster, and I would have been kept in the dark by that Zhuge.
It's my duty to serve the water fortress.
Good, as long as you continue to serve the water fortress with all your heart, I will definitely not treat you unfairly!
Yes!
Thank you so much this time. If it weren't for your help, I might have died without knowing why, and I wouldn't have been able to expose Zhuge Shenji.

Now that Zhuge Shenji is dead, there must be many things waiting to be dealt with at my uncle's place. I have to help my uncle deal with those trivial matters for the time being. Once things are settled here, if you need help, I will definitely not refuse.

(Now that Young Lady is not traveling with me, I'm afraid I won't be able to convince the leader on my own. It's better to invite Young Lady to join the team and then explain the situation to the leader.)
Uncle, look at this thing.
Hmm? What is this, it's pitch black and has a slight bitter taste?
This is the powder of the poison that Young Lady was poisoned with before - the poison of the black lotus.
Pah, pah, pah, you're saying this is—?
Yes, this is the ironclad proof that someone poisoned Young Lady! The leader would never guess where I found it.
Where?
Right in the strategist's - Zhuge Shenji's room!
Haitang, is this true?
Absolutely true, {PlayerName} and I found it together, I can testify.
Someone, call the strategist.
Yes.
Strategist Zhuge, Haitang and {PlayerName} found the powder of the poison that Haitang was poisoned with in your room. Do you have anything to say?
Strategist Zhuge, do you have anything to say?

Reporting to the leader, when Young Lady was poisoned and unconscious before, I asked my relations to find the poison that Young Lady was poisoned with, intending to develop an antidote for Young Lady.
Later, when Young Lady recovered, I no longer needed to develop an antidote. To prevent someone from being accidentally poisoned, I hid the poison powder in a box.
So that's how it is, the strategist really has good intentions.
Of course, I regard Young Lady as my own sister, naturally—
Nonsense!
Strategist Zhuge, you said you got the poison through your relations, where did you get it from?
I have my own friends, it's not convenient to disclose.
I'm afraid the strategist doesn't want to say it, but dares not to.
{PlayerName}, what do you mean by this?

Reporting to the leader, this poison is unique to Dongying and is rarely seen in the Central Plains. The strategist was able to get such a rare poison so casually, don't you find it suspicious, leader?
I just happen to know a merchant from Dongying, leader, please understand.
Indeed, it's a bit arbitrary to determine the strategist's guilt based solely on the poison. Haitang, {PlayerName}, do you have any other evidence?
{PlayerName}……
There is another piece of evidence... At that time, I received a letter signed by Young Lady.
What letter, let me see?
Here it is.

"{PlayerName}... Regarding the matter we discussed earlier, I have made a new discovery. As it is of great importance, I cannot decide on my own. Please come to Haitang Habitat between Xu Shi and Hai Shi to discuss."
(In terms of literacy, Young Lady and the leader are really of the same lineage.)
{PlayerName}, is there a problem with this letter?
There is a problem. At first, I thought this letter was written by Young Lady, but Young Lady seems to have no memory of it.
...And I don't recognize that character.
Haha...
{yell} Hahahaha—!
Zhuge, what are you laughing at!
I laugh, I laugh at you two uncle and nephew are really alike, not young but know few characters, not even ashamed!
I laugh even more. My Flawless Plan, in the end, was defeated by an unknown brat and a mere word "caution"!
Are you admitting it!?
I can't believe that I, who have been smart all my life, would be confused for a moment... \nWell, luckily I was prepared!
Zhuge, you actually have connections with Dragonfly City!
Although it's a little earlier than planned, as long as I can catch you all here, the position of the leader is still mine!
You bastard-- \nDamn, why can't I raise my MP...
Uncle, what's wrong with you!
Could it be because the leader just licked that poison powder...
Hahaha, God helps me too, do it!
Damn it, my plan was just a little bit off...
Damn {PlayerName}, if it weren't for you, I would have taken over the water fortress...
I can't accept this...
{PlayerName}, you did well. If it weren't for you, Haitang might not have escaped this disaster, and I would have been kept in the dark by that Zhuge.
It's my duty to serve the water fortress.
Good, as long as you continue to serve the water fortress with all your heart, I will definitely not treat you unfairly!
Yes!
Thank you so much this time. If it weren't for your help, I might have died without knowing why, and I wouldn't have been able to expose Zhuge Shenji.

Now that Zhuge Shenji is dead, there must be many things waiting to be dealt with at my uncle's place. I have to help my uncle deal with those trivial matters for the time being. Once things are settled here, if you need help, I will definitely not refuse.
Earlier, Duke Kang gave us a big gift, we people in the martial arts world value reciprocity, {PlayerSurName} brother, I want you to help return them a big gift!
Please instruct me, leader, what should I do?
I want you to represent Shui Village and make a big fuss at his Duke Kang's manor, the more chaotic the better! I hope that Duke Kang will never dare to target Shui Village again!
If we make a big fuss at Duke Kang's manor and succeed, will Duke Kang let it go?
I've said that we value reciprocity. If he doesn't want to let it go, we can just make a few more trips to Duke Kang's manor, anyway, Shui Village has enough manpower!
Yes, sir!
Such a good thing, how can our family not participate? \nUncle, I will go with {PlayerName} too!
Young Lady, there are masters everywhere in Duke Kang's manor, it's not child's play...
Are you looking down on my abilities?
No, I dare not...
Okay, Haitang, you go with {PlayerName}. \n{PlayerName}, you must protect Haitang.
Don't worry, leader, I will protect the Young Lady even if it costs my life.
{PlayerName}, when are we leaving?
Okay, then I'll go ahead and wait for you at the gate of Duke Kang's manor. \nDon't rush in by yourself.
{PlayerName}, are you ready?
Okay, then let's make a big fuss!
Okay, let's go!
There's no time to lose, you and Ding Haitang go to Duke Kang's manor...
Hey, this is Duke Kang's manor, no outsiders allowed!
It's me, can I come in?
It turns out to be the son-in-law, but the prince has ordered not to let you in.
It's me, can I come in?
The prince has specifically ordered that {PlayerSurName} is not allowed in.
Why waste words with them, don't forget what we're here for, just break in!
How dare you break into the palace!
Stop, how dare you break into Duke Kang's manor, die!
You're still alive, those rabble are really useless! \nWhat are you doing making a fuss in my house?
Following the leader's orders, Duke Kang sent a big gift to Shui Village before, if we don't return the gift, wouldn't it seem that Jiujiang Fotress doesn't know the rules?
Since you want to return the gift, why didn't the one named Ding come in person, are all the Dings in Shui Village cowards?
Are you Duke Kang? Are your eyes for breathing? Can't you see me, a big living person, standing here?
Oh? You must be Ding Fengbo's niece, Ding Haitang, right?\nYou are quite interesting, but there aren't many who dare to speak to me like this. Do you know why?
We in the water stronghold are all rough people, we don't understand your rules, how would I know why?
You don't understand the rules, then I will teach you.\nBecause those who dare to speak to me like this are all dead!
Killing those who are displeasing to the eye, I quite like this rule. I just don't know if Duke Kang has the ability to take my life?
Good, I also want to see how long you can keep your tough talk!
{PlayerName}, you are my brother-in-law, I have been patient with you, how can you be so ungrateful and make a fuss in my mansion?
Indeed, I am your brother-in-law, and I admit that I was inappropriate today. But I want to ask you, when you ordered the attack on Jiujiang Fotress, did you consider our family relationship?
Did you know that {PlayerName} was in the water stronghold when you ordered the attack?
Jiujiang Fotress is ungrateful and insists on opposing me. {PlayerName}, as my brother-in-law, you should have helped me attack the water stronghold, not turn against me!
If you are still stubborn today, don't blame me for being ruthless!
Sister, listen to me, come back, I will find you a better husband.
You used to teach me to be loyal and unswerving, how can you persuade me to remarry today?\nSince I am already {PlayerName}'s woman, of course I will accompany him to the end!
Good, good, good, then I will teach you a lesson today!
Is this all the ability of Duke Kang's manor?
Duke Kang, are you satisfied with this return gift from Jiujiang Fotress?
Good, good, good, I am very satisfied!\nTell Ding Fengbo, I will definitely have a big gift for him in the future!

The leader said, Vagabond believes in reciprocity.\nIf Duke Kang's manor has a big gift for the water stronghold in the future, the water stronghold will definitely have a corresponding return gift. I wonder if Duke Kang's manor can accept it?
You made such a mess in my mansion, what do you want!
We have previously accepted a big gift from you, and this "favor" has now been returned. From now on, Jiujiang Fotress and Duke Kang's manor have no grudges, we will not interfere with each other.

A good "not interfering with each other"!\nGood, I am not a petty person, you go back and tell Ding Fengbo, as long as he does not hinder my affairs in the future, I will not blame him for what has happened!
That's what I wanted to hear from you.\nI'll take my leave.
No need to see you out!
Phew... That was a satisfying fight!\nIt's a pity that such an opportunity will be hard to find again.
Would you like to wander the world with me, Young Lady? The world is much more interesting than Jiujiang Fotress.
It's a good suggestion, but the water stronghold is in ruins now, how can I leave my uncle alone?
I see...
I'll go back to the water stronghold first, {PlayerName}, you should come back as soon as possible, don't let uncle worry.
Okay, Young Lady, you also take care.
{PlayerSurName}, brother, you're back. I heard about what happened from Haitang. You did a good job this time, and Haitang also praised you.
The credit goes to the leader's teachings.
You are now one of the most capable brothers in the Water Village, but I always feel that you have greater ambitions and should not be buried in this small Water Village.
I have a presumptuous request. If you want to venture into the world again in the future, can you take Begonia with you?
I would be happy to, but I don't know what the Young Lady thinks?
Uncle, the current situation of the Water Village...
I can handle the current situation of the Water Village by myself.\nHaven't you always wanted to venture into the world? I think {PlayerName} should be the best partner.
But uncle...
You don't have to worry about me, my bones are not weaker than you young people!\nOr do you not want to travel with {PlayerName}?
That's not the case...
In that case, just go ahead and do it.
Thank you, uncle.
{PlayerName}, I'll have to trouble you a lot.
No trouble, no trouble.
{PlayerName}, you must protect Begonia well. If I find out that she has been wronged, even if you hide at the ends of the earth, I will catch you back and feed you to the crocodiles!
Leader, I dare not...
Hmph, that's good.
You dare to wander around in front of me, be careful I poke you full of holes!
There are many affairs in the Water Village, I can't run away from here.
column3: ยังมีธุระอีกมากมายในค่ายน้ำแห่งนี้ ข้าไปทั้งอย่างนี้มิได้

column2: Let's go, we must catch the handle of that Zhuge guy!
There are too many people around you, make a place for me first.
You dare to wander around in front of me, be careful I poke you full of holes!
There are many affairs in the Water Village, I can't run away from here.
column3: ยังมีธุระอีกมากมายในค่ายน้ำแห่งนี้ ข้าไปทั้งอย่างนี้มิได้

column2: Let's go, let's venture into the world together!
There are too many people around you, make a place for me first.
{PlayerName}, what place is this?
This is the Shrine of the God of Marriage, where men and women make promises and seek blessings from the old moon.
There is such a place...
Wait, you brought me here...
{PlayerName}, I treat you as a brother, what do you treat me as?!
Young Lady, don't misunderstand, I...
Okay, I won't misunderstand, you enjoy the scenery here, I'll wait for you outside.
It seems I've outsmarted myself...
Young Lady, wait for me.
A place for men and women to make promises...
Now is not the time to consider these things.\nLet's wait until the affairs of the Water Village are finished.
Young Lady is right, I didn't prioritize.\nLet's run away from here.
{PlayerName} You will come here to make a promise with other girls sooner or later, I wonder what kind of girl you will like, gentle and virtuous or smart and cute?
I just want to venture into the world hand in hand with Young Lady, I don't know what Young Lady thinks?
What, what did you say? Are you making fun of me?\nI'm clumsy, neither smart nor virtuous, I grew up in the Water Village, there's nothing about me that's like a girl...
Ah, ah, ah, I feel so bothered just thinking about it, how could I possibly be your type...
Doesn't Young Lady believe what I said? Then let's test my sincerity with the Wedding Stone!
Wedding Stone... I seem to have forgotten to bring it.
...I knew it, you just wanted to make fun of me.
I didn't expect this kind of mistake...
Young Lady, wait for me.
Do you want to place the <color=#c44b0e>Wedding Stone</color> on the shrine?
...I knew it, you just wanted to make fun of me.
It seems a bit childish...
Young Lady, wait for me.
You place the Wedding Stone on the shrine, and the two of you begin to pray devoutly.
No, how could anyone like a woman like me?\n{PlayerName}, you must have ulterior motives, trying to deceive me to take over the water stronghold!
I am truly in love with Young Lady, how could I have such intentions?
No, no...\nImpossible! I don't believe you!
{PlayerName}, how dare you bully Haitang!\nI'll tear you apart and feed you to the crocodiles!
Young Lady, please believe me...
I can't believe you, as my brother-in-law, would be interested in such a commoner like Ding.
My lord, is that what you like?\nIs there something I did wrong, or do you not like me anymore?
Princess, no, I...
{PlayerName}, I give you a choice.\nChoose my sister and serve me, or choose this Ding guy and live a commoner's life forever?
My lord, I didn't know you were like this...
Since you are stubborn, don't blame me!
This is a death sentence...
It exploded, the Wedding Stone actually exploded!
Indeed, someone like me will never be truly loved...
Damn, just a little bit more, I must succeed next time!
Young Lady, wait for me.
Mission accomplished!
Young Lady~
What a surprise... you weren't joking...
Of course I'm serious, this Wedding Stone and the blessing of the matchmaker are proof!
Alright, I'll believe you.\nBut I'm clumsy and not very smart, I have to relearn a lot of things, you can't dislike me.
Is my voice too low for you to hear, miss?
{yell} I am {PlayerName}, may I ask for your name?
Hey, wait, I don't want to fight, I just want to ask for your name...
This girl doesn't look easy to mess with, let's go quickly.
Miss Ya Qin, please come with me to Melody House, I will find a way to get the innkeeper to heal your internal injury!
(Nodded slightly, as if accepting your invite)
You're really something...\nI just wanted to ask for your name, why did we have to fight?
(Pale face, painful expression)
Wait, your face doesn't look right...\nYou're sweating a lot... I didn't hit you that hard...
I know a little about medicine, please allow me to take your pulse.
(Nods slightly)
Miss, your pulse is quite rapid but weak, I'm afraid it's caused by internal injury.\nJudging by the current stability of your pulse, I'm afraid it's been injured for several years...
There is a certain degree of damage to all her organs, her white hair and inability to speak may also be related to this... I wonder who she offended, to be so cruel...

I have temporarily regulated the lady's heart pulse, but this is just a temporary measure. To cure the lady's injury, I'm afraid we can only find the person who hurt her. I wonder where and who caused the lady's injury?
{PlayerName}, let me check her.
Miss Wangyou, how is she?

Her pulse is quite rapid but weak, I'm afraid it's caused by internal injury.\nJudging by the current stability of her pulse, I'm afraid it's been injured for several years, her white hair and inability to speak are also due to this...
Her internal organs have suffered a certain degree of damage, the person who hurt her has profound MP.\n{PlayerName}, she just used her MP against you, which led to the recurrence of Internal Injury.
Is there a way to heal her?
The one who tied the bell must untie it, I'm afraid only the person who hurt her can know the cure.
Do you know where and who caused the girl's injury?
You are at a loss looking at the white-haired woman in pain.\nFortunately, three quarters of an hour later, her complexion gradually returned to normal...
Do you feel better now, miss?\nYou scared me to death just now, did I hurt you by being too heavy-handed?
(Gently shakes her head)
So it wasn't me who hurt you, that's good.\nDo you know who hurt you, miss?
(Turns her head away and ignores you)
It seems she doesn't want to answer this question...
Why not invite a highly skilled doctor to treat her, she should not refuse the kindness of others.
I have made some progress in medicine, may I take your pulse?
(Shakes her head)
Please trust me, I just want to heal you, so you can avoid the previous suffering.
(Nodding slightly)
Could you please extend your right hand, miss?
Her pulse is quite rapid but weak, I'm afraid it's caused by Internal Injury.\nJudging by the current stability of her pulse, I'm afraid she has been injured for several years...

Her internal organs have suffered a certain degree of damage, even her white hair and inability to speak seem to be related... I don't know who the girl has offended, the person who hurt her was so ruthless...

I can temporarily adjust your condition, but the girl's Internal Injury has been for a long time, if you want to fully recover, I'm afraid you still need to find the person who hurt you, and use his MP to heal you.
Are you willing to reveal who hurt you, miss?
I have invited the head of the Herbology Sect for you, she will definitely be able to diagnose your injury.
Hello, may I take your pulse?
(Nodding slightly)
Okay, please extend your right hand...
A moment later.

Her pulse is quite rapid but weak, I'm afraid it's caused by internal injury.\nJudging by the current stability of her pulse, I'm afraid it's been injured for several years, her white hair and inability to speak are also due to this...
Her internal organs have suffered a certain degree of damage, such profound MP...
Is there a way to heal her?
The one who tied the bell must untie it, I'm afraid only the person who hurt her can know the cure.
Do you know where and who caused the girl's injury?
I haven't found a highly skilled doctor yet, please wait a little longer, miss!
No need to look, the person who hurt her is me.
I had a feeling you looked familiar, I didn't expect it to be you.
Master Fu, you mean...

Yes, she used to be from the Melody House, responsible for guarding the attic where the music scores were kept, but she was negligent and lost the precious music scores in the attic, so I personally punished her and expelled her from the Melody House.
I can't believe this...
Master Fu, could you put aside your past grievances for my sake and heal her?
Ha, for your sake?\nFine, as long as you can find the <color=#c44b0e>Guangling Melody score</color> she lost, I will heal her.
Coincidentally, I happened to find a Guangling Melody score by chance, Master Fu, is this the one?
This... this is indeed the Guangling Melody score that was stolen, you actually found it by chance...
In that case, I will return it to its original owner, please keep your promise and heal her, Master Fu.
Since you have found this Guangling Melody score, I will naturally keep my promise and heal her.

Let it be clear in advance, although I will heal you, you have been expelled from Melody House and you can't return to Melody House from now on. Moreover, your white hair and speechlessness are caused by the damage to your internal organs over the years, even if the Internal Injury is healed, it probably won't recover.
(Nods)
{PlayerName}, you will be my guardian later, and you don't need to return this music score to me, consider it as your reward for being my guardian.
Yes.
Fu Yaoqin kept her promise and healed the cold and silent woman's Internal Injury.
Fu Yaoqin kept her promise and healed Ya Qin's Internal Injury.
One shichen later.
Alright, her Internal Injury has been healed, and I have also adjusted some places where the qi is not smooth for you, do you feel any discomfort?
(Shakes her head)
(Writes "Thank you" in the air with her hand.)
The one you should thank is not me, but {PlayerName}. If he hadn't found the lost music score, I wouldn't have forgiven you so easily.
(Smiles slightly at you and bows in thanks.)
No need to thank me if we have no relations, just don't always put on a cold face in the future.
Looking for the Guangling Melody score, right? Alright, I'll go find it!

You are so enthusiastic, it's not bad. Then I will give you another piece of news.\nThe Guangling Melody score was stolen by a man named Li Leya. If you can find him, you may know the whereabouts of the score.
Brother Li, what do you say?
...I did take the score out of Melody House. Later, when the people of Melody House were chasing me, I hurriedly buried it in a Mass Burial Ground.
Where is that Mass Burial Ground?
I was in a hurry at the time, I don't remember where it is, but I drew a treasure map and divided it into three parts and buried them in Chuxiang City, Daliang City, and Lin'an City.

In order to prevent myself from not being able to find it later, I also posted a treasure hunt notice on the bulletin boards in these three cities. Brother {PlayerSurName} can go to the bulletin board to have a look.
I really don't know whether to say you are calm or...
Alright, I'll go and have a look.
Master, I have found the score of Guangling Melody.
Hmm, this is indeed the score of Guangling Melody. Since you have found it, I will keep my promise. Take me to see that girl.
Master, I have found the score of Guangling Melody.
Hmm, this is indeed the score of Guangling Melody. Since you have found it, I will keep my promise and heal her Internal Injury.
Miss, Master Fu has agreed to heal your Internal Injury.

Let it be clear in advance, although I will heal you, you have been expelled from Melody House and you can't return to Melody House from now on. Moreover, your white hair and speechlessness are caused by the damage to your internal organs over the years, even if the Internal Injury is healed, it probably won't recover.
(Nods)
{PlayerName}, you will be my guardian later, and you don't need to return this music score to me, consider it as your reward for being my guardian.
Yes.
I have found the score of Guangling Melody, I hope Master Fu will keep his promise.
Master, I have found the score of Guangling Melody.
Hmm, this is indeed the score of Guangling Melody. Since you have found it, I will keep my promise. Let me see that girl.
I have found the score of Guangling Melody, I hope Master Fu will keep his promise.

Alright, let it be clear in advance, although I will heal you, you have been expelled from Melody House and you can't return to Melody House from now on. Moreover, your white hair and speechlessness are caused by the damage to your internal organs over the years, even if the Internal Injury is healed, it probably won't recover.
(Nods)
{PlayerName}, you will be my guardian later, and you don't need to return this music score to me, consider it as your reward for being my guardian.
Yes.
Miss, Master Fu has agreed to heal your Internal Injury.

Let it be clear in advance, although I will heal you, you have been expelled from Melody House and you can't return to Melody House from now on. Moreover, your white hair and speechlessness are caused by the damage to your internal organs over the years, even if the Internal Injury is healed, it probably won't recover.
(Nods)
{PlayerName}, you will be my guardian later, and you don't need to return this music score to me, consider it as your reward for being my guardian.
Yes.
This kind of Internal Injury should be caused by infusing MP into the Musical...\nThe only one with such power is probably Master Fu...
Miss Qingcheng, are you saying that the person who hurt her is Master Fu...

I'm afraid so. I wasn't in the house before, but I heard from the sisters in the house that the sister who was guarding the attic was expelled from Melody House because the attic was stolen and she was hit by Sister Fu...
Sister, could it be that you are...
(Nodding slightly)
Since it was Master Fu who hurt you, it seems that you have to go to Melody House to ask Master Fu for help.
(Shaking his head)
(It seems she doesn't want to talk, why not ask other seniors in Confucius Temple, if I can get along well with them, maybe they will give me some clues.)
Don't worry, miss, I will definitely find a way to cure your Internal Injury!
It seems that Miss Ya Qin's past has a lot of relations with Melody House, if I want to continue to investigate, I have to go to Melody House.

(However, Miss Ya Qin should have changed her name to Ya Qin after coming to Confucius Temple, and her appearance has also changed a lot. For safety, should I consider inviting Miss Ya Qin to Melody House?)
Master Fu, do you know Ya Qin from Confucius Temple?
Ya Qin from Confucius Temple? I haven't heard of it.
I should have brought Miss Ya Qin together...
Li Leya is dead now, I don't know where to find the whereabouts of the music score...
That guy won't destroy the music score, if he doesn't have it on him, he must have hidden it somewhere, as long as he didn't destroy it, he can definitely find it.
Alright, but it's like finding a needle in a haystack, where should I go to find it...
Li Leya is now missing, where should I go to find him...
column3: หลี่เล่อหยาหายตัวไป ข้าควรไปตามหาเขาใด...

column2: That guy definitely doesn't have the guts to destroy the music score, he must have hidden it somewhere, as long as he didn't destroy it, he can definitely find it.
Alright, but it's like finding a needle in a haystack, where should I go to find it...
Master Fu, do you know Ya Qin from Confucius Temple?
Ya Qin from Confucius Temple? I haven't heard of it.
Wait, you are...
I remember you, you were the one who guarded the attic at that time...
Did the master recognize her?

Yes, she used to be from the Melody House, responsible for guarding the attic where the music scores were kept, but she was negligent and lost the precious music scores in the attic, so I personally punished her and expelled her from the Melody House.
You have been expelled from Melody House, why are you coming back?
I dare to ask the master to Heal her Internal Injury for her.
Heal her Internal Injury? What's the benefit for me?
This...\nMaster said before that she lost the music score, so if I find the music score she lost, can the master save her Internal Injury?
If you can really find the <color=#c44b0e>Guangling Melody</color> music score she lost, I will help her heal.
Okay, let's make a deal!
Now that Master Fu is dead, I'm afraid there is no solution to the matter of Heal Internal Injury...
It's a bit too much to always call you "miss", can you tell me your name?
(Gestures "Ya Qin" in the air)
Miss Ya Qin, I will definitely cure your Internal Injury!
Brother Li, I heard that you took a music score when you escaped from Melody House?
This is not the place to discuss this matter, let's talk about it after I get out of here.
...I did take the score out of Melody House. Later, when the people of Melody House were chasing me, I hurriedly buried it in a Mass Burial Ground.
Where is that Mass Burial Ground?
I was in a hurry at the time, I don't remember where it is, but I drew a treasure map and divided it into three parts and buried them in Chuxiang City, Daliang City, and Lin'an City.

In order to prevent myself from not being able to find it later, I also posted a treasure hunt notice on the bulletin boards in these three cities. Brother {PlayerSurName} can go to the bulletin board to have a look.
I really don't know whether to say you are calm or...
Does Senior Shu Kuang know about the past of the silent white-haired girl?
White hair and silent... you are talking about Ya Qin.
Does Senior Shu Kuang know about Miss Ya Qin's past?
I only know that she came here to find Dojokeeper to Heal Internal Injury, I'm not interested in the rest, you go ask others.
(It seems that Senior Shu Kuang really doesn't know more about Miss Ya Qin, go ask others.)
I'm not interested in other people's past, you go ask others.
Does Senior Hua Chi know about the past of the silent white-haired girl?
Oh, you're talking about Ya Qin.
Does Elder Hua Chi know about Miss Ya Qin's past?
Her zither playing is unparalleled, and painting with her music feels like divine assistance~
Elder, what I want to ask is about her past...

The past... I'm not very clear about that, but I think the only place in the world today that could teach her such performance skills is probably Melody House. I heard that the scenery there is picturesque and there are many beautiful women. I really want to go there to paint...
The past... I'm not very clear about that.\nAlright, if there's nothing else, don't delay my painting.
Does Elder Can Qi know about the past of the white-haired silent girl?
White hair... Ya Qin?
Does Elder Can Qi know about Miss Ya Qin's past?
She seems to be ill like me, but what she suffered seems to be Internal Injury.\nAs for other things, I'm not clear either.
(It seems that Elder Can Qi really doesn't know more about Miss Ya Qin, let's ask someone else.)
She has always been indifferent to playing chess with me, so I'm naturally not interested in her.
Does Brother Cai know about the past of the white-haired silent girl?
Are you talking about Miss Ya Qin?
Does Brother Cai know about Miss Ya Qin's past?
I heard from my father that she seemed to have learned at Melody House before coming to Confucius Temple, but I don't know why she came to Confucius Temple.
I see, thank you Brother Cai.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, it seems inappropriate to casually inquire about others' past.
Can Dojokeeper tell me about the past of the white-haired silent girl?
You're talking about Ya Qin, right? You want to inquire about her past?
Can Dojokeeper tell me about Miss Ya Qin's past?

Since we are fellow disciples, it's okay to tell you.\nYa Qin was originally from Melody House, but after some incidents, she was expelled by the master of Melody House, and then she came to Confucius Temple after some twists and turns.
I see, thank you Dojokeeper for telling me.
As a disciple of this hall, you should focus on learning and not inquire about others' past.

You're not an outsider, it should be okay for me to tell you.\nYa Qin was originally from Melody House, but after some incidents, she was expelled by the master of Melody House, and then she came to Confucius Temple after some twists and turns.
I see, thank you Dojokeeper for telling me.
As the Dojokeeper of Confucius Temple, how can I casually tell outsiders about the past of the disciples?

The education in the Southwest region has not been opened, and the Jiuli Tribe has repeatedly violated the border. In order to prevent accidents, the court has ordered the closure of the pass. Without the hand decree of <color=#c44b0e>Duke Kang and Duke Qi</color>, no one is allowed to leave the pass! All irrelevant people, please leave quickly!
(It seems that I can only leave the pass if I get the hand decree, let's leave here for now.)
Hey, how come the old woman from Melody House is here...\nStay away from me, I don't want to die yet!

If Brother {PlayerSurName} wants to go to Melody House, it's better to let me leave the team first.\nIf the women in the house recognize me, I'm afraid it will cause unnecessary trouble for Brother {PlayerSurName}.
{PlayerGivenName}Brother, my brother told me that he doesn't trust you yet, and asked me to keep my distance from you.
{PlayerGivenName}Brother, my illness is not serious, but I don't want to see you and my brother in conflict. I hope you can get along with my brother in a friendly manner.
{PlayerGivenName}Brother, can you get along well with my brother first, and then come to heal my illness?
(It seems that I need to gain Ling Hongxuan's trust before I can treat Miss Mengdie.)
Alright, since Miss Mengdie said so, I'll try to get along with that guy who always has a sour face.
I didn't expect there to be a real Goddess Temple...
Mengdie, what is this Goddess Temple?

I read about it in a book before. It is said that in the ancient times, the tribes in the southwest were not yet civilized and were constantly at war. Later, a goddess was sent by the heavens to stop the wars.

After the goddess descended, she displayed her divine power and defeated all the tribes with her own strength. The leaders of the tribes were awed by the power of the goddess and no longer invaded other tribes, thus bringing peace to the southwest.

There are rumors that the goddess left behind five orbs. When the world is in chaos, the orbs will appear. If someone can gather these five orbs, they can inherit the legacy of the goddess and eliminate the disasters of the world.
Since the Goddess Temple is real, could the five orbs be...
Does Mengdie know about the legend of the Goddess Temple?
Hmm... I read about it in a book before.
Does the book record where these five orbs are?
There are some scattered rumors. It is said that the location of the five orbs changes each time they appear, but there are always some signs to follow.
It is rumored that the green orb contains the power of HP and will appear in the place with the highest medical knowledge in the world.
It is rumored that the blue orb is rich in spiritual energy and can nourish people, so it always appears in places where there are many beautiful women.
It is rumored that the red orb will accompany a person in the world, and the person it accompanies often has Herculean strength.
As for the purple and yellow orbs, each rumor is different, and the interpretations are quite contradictory, so I won't mislead you by saying them.
I didn't expect there to be so many rumors. Thank you, Mengdie.
Ah, my savior! I didn't expect to see you here!
Hmm? Who are you?
Don't you remember? You once saved a group of songstresses who were being transported. One of them insisted on returning to her hometown to visit her relatives...
You were worried about her going alone, so you taught her some self-defense techniques and some musical knowledge...
I seem to have some impression now. You were the songstress who wanted to return to her hometown, right?
Indeed, if it weren't for the benefactor's rescue at that time, I don't know what would have happened to me...
I've been trying to find the benefactor ever since, wanting to repay him properly.\nHeaven does not disappoint those who try, and today I finally see the benefactor again.
It was just a helping hand, and we women should help each other, you don't have to thank me. Just help any suffering women you see in the future.
I will remember the benefactor's teachings.
My friend, you look weary, where are you going?
Alright, stop that, it's me.
It's actually Boss Zhuge! I didn't know the Boss was coming, I couldn't welcome you from afar, please forgive me, Boss.
Alright, alright, no need to be so polite.
Brother Zhuge, what's going on?
This is a business I have outside, I'll explain it to you later.
Boss Zhuge, who is he?
{PlayerSurName} is my good brother, you guys better not mess with him.
Yes, yes, since he is the Boss's good brother, he is naturally our honored guest. I've met the great hero {PlayerSurName}.
Alright, let's stop the formalities here, please take us across the river.
Alright!
A man dressed as a Rich Merchant respectfully escorts you onto the boat.\nHalf a day later, you arrive at a secret place...
column3: ชายสวมชุดพ่อค้าท่าท่างร่ำรวยพาคุณขึ้นเรืออย่างเคารพ\nครึ่งชั่ววันถัดมา เจ้าก็มาถึงยังที่ลึกลับ

column2: Welcome, Boss Zhuge!
How's business lately?
Business has been good recently, those guys who fled from the north still hold dreams of getting rich, they come here at the slightest hint.
That's good, you've worked hard.
Brother Zhuge, this is...

{PlayerSurName} is one of us, I won't hide it.\nThis is the Sea Serpent Gang, which I created behind Ding Fengbo's back, tricking some ignorant guys to sell to Dragonfly City in exchange for their support.
Dragonfly City...
What do those guys need manpower for, what are they planning?
I don't care about those things, they can't stir up any trouble anyway.
Dragonfly City no longer exists, is your business also unable to continue?
Without Relations, there will always be other ways.
Who are those guys, what do they need people for?
They are a group of people living on the eastern island, as for what they want to do, I don't care, they can't stir up any trouble anyway.
{PlayerSurName}, I have some instructions for them, could you wait a moment?
Okay.
There is a place in the back where our people rest, {PlayerSurName} can rest there for a while. It's a bit simple, I hope {PlayerSurName} won't mind.
That's no problem.
A moment later...
Master, about the previous commission...
Ah, Zhuge Sang, you're here too, long time no see.
This voice is...
It's her...
Why is there a woman here?
I didn't expect the princess of Dragonfly City to come here, is there anything I can help with?
The city lord has entrusted me with the task of finding the seal stone, but I'm not sure where it is.
I heard that the Sea Serpent Gang has found out about this seal stone, I came to inquire.
What seal stone? Do you know?
The princess is talking about the whereabouts of the Imperial Seal, right? Our Sea Serpent Gang is absolutely reliable, we have collected most of the clues about this Imperial Seal.
The Imperial Seal has been through wars and is said to have been split into three pieces, called the Seal of the Sky Dome, the Seal of the People, and the Seal of the State.
The Seal of the Sky Dome was carried by the old emperor. Since the old emperor went hunting in Yan country and never returned, the whereabouts of the Seal of the Sky Dome is unknown.
column3: ตราประทับแห่งสวรรค์ อดีตฮ่องเต้ได้พกติดตัวไว้ เนื่องจากอดีตฮ่องเต้ไปล่าสัตว์ในแคว้นเยี่ยน และไม่ได้กลับมาอีกเลย ตราประทับแห่งสวรรค์ก็เลยหายสาปสูญไป

column2: Someone once saw the Seal of the State in a certain place in the southwest region, but this person was delirious when he revealed the news, and he died not long after.
What about the Seal of the Common People?
I only heard that the Mark of the Common People was guarded by the Imperial City Department back then, I don't know the other details.
...I see.\nYou've worked hard, if there's any further news, please let me know.
You can trust the Sea Serpent Gang!
Zhuge Sang, the city lord told me that the revival of Dragonfly City cannot be done without Zhuge Sang's help. If Zhuge Sang needs anything, Dragonfly City will definitely help.
Please thank the city lord for me.
I still have a mission, I can't stay long, Zhuge Sang, we'll meet again.
Hey, you, I haven't been here for a few days, and you're becoming Dragonfly City's dog?
Boss Zhuge, this... they just gave too much...
You money-grubbing guy, you dare to covet the jade seal, aren't you afraid of losing your head?
Let's end this matter here, I won't pursue the previous matters.
Thank you, Boss Zhuge, thank you, Boss Zhuge...
Brother Zhuge, who was that person just now?
That person is the adopted daughter of the city lord of Dragonfly City, the princess of Dragonfly City. Her name seems to be Yue something Yu...
Alright, don't worry about the guys from Dragonfly City.\n{PlayerSurName}, I've finished my business here, let's run away from here.
I'm looking for someone, {PlayerName}, do you know this person?
What does the princess want to do with him?
He and I have some scores to settle, I must find him!
Seems like there's a story, but...
Far in the horizon, yet close at hand, Miss Yueyong, we meet again. What brings you to me?
