Given the current situation, I should prioritize the overall situation, please forgive me for not being able to run away from the manor.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, we must stop Liu Fuming and his men at all costs!
Since {PlayerSurName} brother needs help, I will do my best!
It seems there is no place for me in {PlayerSurName} brother's team.
Miss Wan, I have a request.
column3: แม่นางหว่าน ข้ามีเรื่องขอให้ช่วย

column2: Young hero, please speak, I will tell you everything I know.
column3: ท่านจอมยุทธน้อย เชิญกล่าวได้เลยเจ้าค่ะ ข้าจะบอกทุกอย่างที่ท่านอยากรู้

column2: What was Liu Fuming trying to do when he visited earlier?
column3: หลิวฝูหมิง ต้องการอะไรกันแน่ตอนที่เขามาเยือนก่อนหน้านี้?

column2: ...That day, my aunt first caught up with the old times with that Liu, but then he showed his true colors, demanding the beast taming technique hidden in the manor, saying he wanted to tame some wild beasts for the visitors of the Tower of Prosperity to play with.
column3: ...ในวันนั้นตอนแรกท่านป้าก็ถามไถ่สารทุกข์สุขดิบกันทั่วไปกับไอ้หลิวนั่นเจ้าค่ะ แต่ไม่นานมันก็เริ่มออกลาย สั่งให้มอบตำราฝึกสัตว์ลับของหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรให้มัน เพราะมันอยากจะเอาเหล่าสัตว์ป่าไปไว้ใน หอเจิดจรัส เล่นๆเจ้าค่ะ

column2: If that's all, was it necessary to make such a big fuss?
column3: ถ้าเรื่องแค่นั้นทำไมมันถึงบานปลายใหญ่โตได้ถึงเพียงนี้เล่า?

column2: I don't want to hide it from you, young hero, I thought the same.\nBut my aunt said that Liu was working for someone surnamed "Chai", so she directly refused.
column3: ข้าก็ไม่อยากปิดบังท่านแต่ข้าก็คิดเหมือนกันเจ้าค่ะ\nแต่ท่านป้าบอกว่าเจ้าหลิวนี่มันทำงานให้คนสกุลไช่ นางเลยปฎิเสธเสียงแข็งเจ้าค่ะ

column2: Someone surnamed Chai...
column3: บางคนที่สกุลไช่...

column2: Could it be that Liu Fuming is working for King Chai?
No, I can't think of who is surnamed Chai...
column3: ข้าไม่รู้จักคนสกุลไช่เลยแฮะ...

column2: ...What happened after the refusal, young hero, you know all about it.
column3: ...หลังจากท่านป้าปฎิเสธไป อย่างที่ท่านจอมยุทธน้อยเห็น เรื่องทั้งหมดก็เป็นเช่นนั้นเจ้าค่ะ

column2: Speaking of which, I haven't properly thanked you, young hero. I don't have anything valuable on me... I only have some weapons for beasts, which I researched myself. I'll give them to you.
column3: พูดถึงเรื่องนี้ ข้ายังไม่ได้ขอบคุณท่านเลย ข้าเองนั้นไม่มีของมีค่าอันใดมาก... มีเพียงอาวุธสำหรับสัตว์ที่ข้าสร้างขึ้นเอง หวังว่าท่านจะรับไว้

column2: Miss Wan, you're too polite. Beast Manor has given me a lot of things during this time...
column3: แม่นางหว่าน ท่านใจดีไปแล้ว หมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรเองก็ให้ของข้ามามากมายแล้ว....

column2: Young hero, you saved the manor from disaster. No matter how many gifts we give you, it's not too much. Please don't refuse.
column3: ท่านจอมยุทธน้อย ท่านได้ช่วยหมู่ตึกเราไว้จากหายนะ ต่อให้มอบข้าวของมากเพียงใดก็ไม่นับว่ามากมายเกินไปหรอกเจ้าค่ะ อย่าได้เกรงใจเลยนะเจ้าคะ

column2: Since you've said so, alright, I'll accept it.
column3: ในเมื่อแม่นางว่าอย่างนั้น ข้าจะรับไว้แล้วกัน

column2: Report, there are visitors.
column3: ขอรายงาน มีผู้มาเยี่ยมเยียน

column2: Wait, Uncle Jie, mother is still...
column3: แต่ลุงเจี่ย ท่านแม่ยัง...

column2: The situation is special, please prepare, young master of the manor.
column3: สถานการณ์ไม่สู้ดีนัก กรุณาเตรียมตัวต้อนรับด้วย นายน้อยแห่งหมู่ตึก

column2: ...Understood, let him in.
column3: ...เข้าใจแล้ว ให้เข้ามาได้

column2: ...Should I step aside?
column3: ...ข้าควรหลบไปก่อนไหม?

column2: {PlayerSurName} brother, you are not an outsider, just stay.
column3: พี่{PlayerSurName} ท่านไม่ใช่คนอื่นคนไกล เชิญฟังด้วยกันเถิด

column2: Alright.
column3: ก็ได้

column2: The manor owner is currently unavailable, and this young master is temporarily in charge of the manor affairs. What brings you here?
Young master, I am a villager from the foot of the Western Holy Mountain, please save our mountain god!
What do you mean, what happened to the Holy Mountain?

A few days ago, a man from the Central Plains dressed in white, along with a group of evil men, went up the Holy Mountain. I was terrified and hid in the bushes, not daring to breathe, but I overheard their conversation...
column3: หลายวันก่อนมีชายจากจงหยวนแต่งกายชุดขาว มากับพวกท่าทางชั่วร้าย ขึ้นไปยังภูเขาศักดิ์สิทธิ์ขอรับ ข้ากลัวมากเลยแอบอยู่ในพุ่มไม่กล้าแม้แต่จะหายใจ แต่บังเอิญได้ยินพวกมันคุยกันขอรับ...

column2: (This man in white must be Liu Fuming, and those evil men must be from the Cloud Camp...)
column3: (หมอนี่ต้องเป็นหลิวฝูหมิงแน่เลย ไอ้พวกท่าทางชั่วร้ายน่าจะเป็นโจรจากค่ายเมฆา...)

column2: What did they say?
column3: พวกมันคุยอะไรกัน?

column2: They said... they said they were going to, to kidnap the mountain god!
column3: พวกมันพูดว่า... พูดมันพูดว่ามันจะไปลักพาตัวท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาไปขอรับ!

column2: Understood, you go back first, we will organize manpower to go to the Holy Mountain as soon as possible.
Alright, alright! Please stop them, young master!
What did he mean by "Holy Mountain" and "Mountain God"?
column3: ที่หมอนั่นพูดถึง "ภูเขาศักดิ์สิทธิ์" และ "ท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขา" มันหมายความว่าอะไรล่ะนั่น?

column2: {PlayerSurName} brother, you are from the Central Plains and may not be familiar with the situation here. To the west of here is a large snow mountain, which is regarded as a holy mountain by the local villagers.

It is rumored that a white tiger lives in the mountains, and the locals regard it as a mountain god. Every year during festivals, they arrange for villagers to go up the mountain to offer tributes, praying for peace and good weather.
I see, so Liu Fuming and his men are after this white tiger in the snow mountain?
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว งั้นแปลว่าหลิวฝูหมิงและคนของมัน จ้องจะจับพยัคฆ์ขาวในภูเขาหิมะลูกนี้สินะ?

column2: Yes, it seems so.
What are you going to do?
Of course we have to stop them. Beast Manor's foothold in the southwest is also thanks to the support of the locals. Isn't that right, cousin?
Yes, Wan'er is right. Both emotionally and rationally, we should go.
...That's true, but we are currently short of manpower in the manor. {PlayerSurName} brother, I'm afraid we need your help this time.
Help to the end, send Buddha to the west, I will help you to the end!
Thank you, {PlayerSurName} brother. If {PlayerSurName} brother is ready, please invite me to go with you!
Cousin, {PlayerSurName} young hero, I will go with you.
Cousin, you stay in the manor to take care of mother. Leave the fighting to us men.
...Alright, {PlayerSurName} young hero, this is the supreme mental method of Beast Manor, I give it to you, I hope you can return safely.
Don't worry, we will definitely return safely!
But auntie...
column3: แต่ว่าท่านป้ายัง...

column2: The situation is special, you should temporarily take over the manor.
column3: สถานการณ์ไม่สู้ดีนัก เจ้าควรรับหน้าที่เจ้าแห่งหมู่ตึกชั่วคราว

column2: Understood, let him in, Uncle Jie.
column3: เข้าใจแล้วเจ้าค่ะ เชิญเขาเข้ามาเลย ลุงเจี่ย

column2: ...Should I step aside?
column3: ...ข้าควรหลบไปก่อนไหม?

column2: No need, {PlayerSurName} young hero is not an outsider, and with you here, I feel more at ease.
column3: ไม่ต้องเจ้าค่ะ ท่านจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} ไม่ใช่คนอื่นคนไกล หากท่านอยู่ข้าคงวางใจมากขึ้นเจ้าค่ะ

column2: Alright, then I will help Miss Wan'er.
column3: ก็ได้ เช่นนั้นข้าจะอยู่ช่วยแม่นางหว่านเอ๋อเอง

column2: The manor owner is currently unavailable, and I am temporarily in charge of the manor affairs. What brings you here?
column3: ท่านเจ้าตึกมิสะดวกรับแขก ขณะนี้ข้าเป็นผู้รักษาการณ์แทนเท่าเจ้าตึก ท่านมาที่นี่ต้องการอะไร?

column2: I am a villager at the foot of the holy mountain in the west, please help save our mountain god!
column3: ข้าเป็นชาวบ้านที่ตีนเขาศักดิ์สิทธิ์ทางตะวันตกขอรับ ได้โปรดช่วยท่านเทพขุนเขาด้วยขอรับ!

column2: Holy mountain... Mountain god... What happened?
column3: ภูเขาศักดิ์สิทธิ์... ท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขา... เกิดอะไรขึ้นกัน?

column2: A few days ago, a man from the Central Plains dressed in white, along with a group of evil men, went up the Holy Mountain. I was terrified and hid in the bushes, not daring to breathe, but I overheard their conversation...
column3: หลายวันก่อนมีชายจากจงหยวนแต่งกายชุดขาว มากับพวกท่าทางชั่วร้าย ขึ้นไปยังภูเขาศักดิ์สิทธิ์ขอรับ ข้ากลัวมากเลยแอบอยู่ในพุ่มไม่กล้าแม้แต่จะหายใจ แต่บังเอิญได้ยินพวกมันคุยกันขอรับ...

column2: (This man in white must be Liu Fuming, and those evil men must be from the Cloud Camp...)
column3: (หมอนี่ต้องเป็นหลิวฝูหมิงแน่เลย ไอ้พวกท่าทางชั่วร้ายน่าจะเป็นโจรจากค่ายเมฆา...)

column2: What did they say?
column3: พวกมันคุยอะไรกัน?

column2: They said... they said they were going to, to kidnap the mountain god!
column3: พวกมันพูดว่า... พูดมันพูดว่ามันจะไปลักพาตัวท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาไปขอรับ!

column2: I understand the situation, you go back first, we will organize people to help you as soon as possible.
column3: ข้าเข้าใจสถานการณ์แล้ว เจ้ากลับไปก่อน ข้าจะจัดสรรคนไปช่วยเจ้าให้เร็วที่สุด

column2: Good, good! Please, you must stop those people!
column3: ขอบคุณขอรับ ขอบคุณขอรับ ได้โปรดพวกท่านต้องหยุดพวกมันให้ได้นะขอรับ!

column2: What did he mean by "Holy Mountain" and "Mountain God"?
column3: ที่หมอนั่นพูดถึง "ภูเขาศักดิ์สิทธิ์" และ "ท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขา" มันหมายความว่าอะไรล่ะนั่น?

column2: {PlayerSurName} is a martial artist from the Central Plains, it's understandable if you're not familiar with the situation here. To the west of here is a large snow mountain, which the local villagers regard as a holy mountain.
column3: {PlayerSurName} ท่านเป็นจอมยุทธจากจงหยวน เลยอาจจะยังไม่เข้าใจสินะเจ้าคะ ในทางตะวันตกจากที่นี่นั้นมีภูเขาหิมะอยู่ลูกหนึ่ง ชาวบ้านแถวนั้นเรียกภูเขานี้ว่าภูเขาศักดิ์สิทธิ์เจ้าค่ะ

column2: It is rumored that a white tiger lives in the mountains, and the locals regard it as a mountain god. Every year during festivals, they arrange for villagers to go up the mountain to offer tributes, praying for peace and good weather.
column3: มีข่าวลือว่าบนภูเขาอาศัยพยัคฆ์ขาวตัวหนึ่ง ชาวบ้านในท้องถิ่นเคารพบูชาพยัคฆ์ขาวตัวนี้เสมือนเทพเจ้าแห่งขุนเขา ในทุกๆ เทศกาลสำคัญ ชาวบ้านจะจัดเตรียมเครื่องเซ่นไหว้และขึ้นเขาเพื่อบูชาพยัคฆ์ขาว เพื่อขอพรให้แคล้วคลาดปลอดภัยและฝนฟ้าตกตามฤดูกาลเจ้าค่ะ

column2: I see, so Liu Fuming and his men are after this white tiger in the snow mountain?
column3: เข้าใจแล้ว งั้นแปลว่าหลิวฝูหมิงและคนของมัน จ้องจะจับพยัคฆ์ขาวในภูเขาหิมะลูกนี้สินะ?

column2: Hmm, it seems so...
column3: ดูเหมือนจะเป็นอย่างนั้นเจ้าค่ะ...

column2: What are you going to do?
column3: แล้วเจ้าจะทำยังไงต่อไป?

column2: Of course we have to stop them. Beast Manor's foothold in the southwest is also thanks to the support of the locals.
column3: แน่นอนเจ้าค่ะ ว่าเราต้องหยุดพวกมัน หมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรยืนหยัดได้ในแดนตะวันตกเฉียงใต้ได้ก็ต้องขอบคุณเหล่าชาวบ้านทั้งหลายเจ้าค่ะ

column2: But...
Now that my aunt is unconscious and there is a serious shortage of manpower in the manor...
column3: ตอนนี้ท่านป้ายังไม่ได้สติ แถมกำลังคนยังขาดแคลนหนักมากเจ้าค่ะ...

column2: I'll help you to the end, I'll go help!
column3: ในเมื่อช่วยก็ต้องช่วยให้ถึงที่สุด ข้าจะไปช่วยเอง!

column2: If {PlayerSurName} is willing to help, that would be great, but this is after all a matter within the manor...
column3: หากท่าน{PlayerSurName} ประสงค์อยากไปช่วยเหลือ นั่นคงยอดเยี่ยมมากเลยเจ้าค่ะ แต่ว่านี่ก็เป็นเรื่องธุระของหมู่ตึกแท้ๆ...

column2: So much has happened, although I am not a disciple of Beast Manor, I have long considered myself part of the family. Please don't be a stranger, Miss Wan'er.
column3: เกิดเรื่องมากมายขนาดนี้ ถึงแม้ว่าข้าจะไม่ใช่ศิษย์ของหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูร แต่ข้านั้นก็นับว่าตัวเองนั้นเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของตระกูลพวกเจ้าแล้ว มิต้องทำเป็นคนอื่นคนไกลไปได้หรอก แม่นางหว่านเอ๋อ

column2: ...In that case, it seems I was the one being a stranger. This is the highest level of martial arts in Beast Manor, I give it to you, hoping you can return safely.
column3: ...ดูเหมือนจะเป็นข้าเองที่ทำตัวเป็นคนอื่นคนไกลเสียได้ นี่เป็นตำราวรยุทธขั้นสูงสุดของหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรเจ้าค่ะ ข้าจะขอมอบให้ท่าน หวังว่าท่านจะกลับมาอย่างปลอดภัยนะเจ้าคะ

column2: Don't worry, I will definitely come back safely!
column3: ไม่ต้องห่วง ข้าจะกลับมาครบ 32 แน่!

column2: You are from Beast Manor, right? You're finally here! ...But are you alone?
column3: เจ้ามาจากหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรใช่ไหม เจ้ามาสักที! ...แต่เจ้ามาคนเดียวเองรึ?

column2: I'm enough.
column3: แค่ข้าก็พอแล้ว

column2: It seems that you are quite confident in your own skills, then I won't say anything more. I have set up a simple camp here, you can rest here before going up the mountain. If you need emergency medicine, you can also buy it from me.
column3: ดูเหมือนว่าท่านจอมยุทธน้อยจะมั่นใจในฝีมือของตัวเองมากสินะ งั้นข้าก็ไม่พูดมากแล้ว ข้าได้ตั้งค่ายพักแรมแบบง่ายๆ ไว้ที่นี่ ท่านจอมยุทธน้อยสามารถพักผ่อนที่นี่ก่อนขึ้นเขาได้ หากท่านน้อยต้องการยาสามัญประจำบ้านก็สามารถซื้อจากข้าได้

column2: Very thoughtful, then I'll leave everything to you.
column3: เจ้าวางแผนได้ดีมาก ข้าขอฝากเจ้าด้วย

column2: You're too polite, we are the ones asking for your help. We hope you can return victorious and save the mountain god!
column3: มิต้องเกรงใจ พวกเราเป็นฝ่ายร้องขอความช่วยเหลือของท่าน ขอให้ท่านได้รับชัยชนะและช่วยท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาสำเร็จ!

column2: In addition, the mountain terrain is complex and there are many paths. You may get lost on your first visit, so I have drawn a map for you to help.
column3: นอกจากนี้เส้นทางในหุบเขานั้นคดเคี้ยวซับซ้อนนัก ข้าได้ตระเตรียมแผนที่ไว้ให้ท่านแล้ว

column2: Also, there is no food on the mountain, only a pack of wild wolves. Our villagers have developed a recipe for roasted wolf meat. Although it's not delicious, it can be used as an emergency supplement for stamina. I'll teach it to the young hero.
column3: นอกจากนี้ บนภูเขาไม่มีอาหารอะไรเลย มีเพียงฝูงหมาป่า ชาวบ้านอย่างเราๆจึงได้คิดค้นสูตรอาหารสำหรับย่างเนื้อหมาป่า ถึงแม้จะไม่อร่อยมากนัก แต่สามารถช่วยประทังชีวิตและฟื้นฟูพลังงานได้ ข้าจะสอนให้ท่านจอมยุทธน้อยด้วย

column2: This person... seems to be from Cloud Camp...
column3: ดูเหมือนหมอนี่... จะมาจากค่ายเมฆา...

column2: Such a heavy injury, such a large tear wound, coupled with a lot of blood loss... If he doesn't get immediate treatment, he will...
This open wound and blood loss, it's too late to save him...
The open wounds on his body, no mistake, are tiger claw marks!
Have they already found the mountain god!?
The size of this open wound, it's not something ordinary animals can cause.
Could this open wound have been caused by the white tiger here? Could they have already found the mountain god?
This size of a Tear wound... it's not something an ordinary weapon could cause... \nCould it be a tiger... Have they found the Mountain God?
column3: แผลเปิดกว้างขนาดนี้... ไม่น่าใช่แผลจากอาวุธ...\nหรือจะเป็นเสือ... พวกมันเจอกับเทพแห่งขุนเขาหรอกหรือนี่?

column2: The arrangement here... It seems they wanted to rest in this Mountain cave, but were attacked by the White Tiger...
column3: ดูจากข้าวของรอบๆ... ดูเหมือนพวกมันจะพักผ่อนอยู่ในถ้ำแห่งนี้ ก่อนจะถูกเสือขาวนั่นโจมตีสินะ...

column2: Damn it, did I arrive a step too late after all...
column3: บ้าเอ๊ย ข้าช้าไปก้าวหนึ่งหรือนี่...

column2: Roar--
column3: โฮก--

column2: That roar, could it be--!
column3: เสียงคำรามนี่ หรือว่า—!

column2: Tsk, this beast is really powerful, it actually injured so many of my brothers.
column3: ชิ ไอ้สัตว์ตัวนี้นี่มันแรงดีจริงๆ ทำพี่น้องข้าเจ็บไปหมดแล้ว

column2: Hey, Boss Liu, you'll have to pay more for this.
column3: เฮ้ย ท่านหลิว ท่านต้องจ่ายเพิ่มแล้วนะแบบนี้

column2: The price is negotiable, just tie this guy up first.
column3: ราคาต่อรองได้แน่นอน เพียงมัดไอ้เจ้านี่เสียก่อน

column2: Alright!
column3: ตามนั้น!

column2: Roar...
column3: โฮก...

column2: Alright, mission accomplished!
column3: เรียบร้อย ภารกิจเสร็จสิ้น!

column2: Good, let's call it a day.
column3: ดี งั้นรีบกลับ

column2: No, someone's coming.
column3: ไม่ มีใครบางคนกำลังมา

column2: No, it's not over yet.
column3: ไม่ ยังไม่จบหรอกนะ

column2: You can leave, but let the White Tiger go!
column3: พวกเจ้าจะไปไหนก็ไป แต่ปล่อยเสือขาวตัวนี้ซะ!

column2: Tsk, you're really persistent!
column3: ชิ แกนี่ขี้ตื๊อจริงๆ!

column2: Want this White Tiger? Let's see if you have the ability!
column3: อยากได้งั้นรึ ? ขอข้าดูฝีมือเจ้าหน่อยแล้วกัน!

column2: {PlayerName}, we have no past grudges, and my master has asked to spare your life, why do you keep ruining our plans!
column3: {PlayerName} เราไม่เคยบาดหมางกันมาก่อน นายท่านเองก็ขอให้ข้าไว้ชีวิตเจ้า ไยต้องมาพังแผนข้าด้วย!

column2: You're right, but it's our duty to help when we see injustice. \nBlame your bad luck for running into me.
column3: ถูกต้องเรามิเคยบาดหมาง แต่มันเป็นหน้าที่ของข้าหากข้าเห็นความอยุติธรรมก็ต้องปราบปราม\nโทษดวงของเจ้าเองแล้วกันที่โชคร้ายมาเจอข้า

column2: Heh, bad luck, is it bad luck...\nGod, you're really biased!
column3: เฮอะ โชคร้าย ชะตาลิขิตรึ...\nสวรรค์ ไยท่านจึงเกลียดข้าเพียงนี้!

column2: Liu Fuming, {PlayerSurName} may have no grudge against you, but you attacked my mother, everyone in Beast Manor wants to kill you!
Heh, Beast Manor is now just a bunch of dependants, if it wasn't for {PlayerName}'s interference, you wouldn't have a say today!
Liu Fuming, you--!
column3: หลิว ฝูหมิง เจ้า—!

column2: You're not as skilled, I'll give this Mountain God to you!
column3: วันนี้ฝีมือข้าสู้เจ้าไม่ได้ เชิญเจ้าเอาท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขานี่ไปได้เลย!

column2: Hey, don't think about running--!
column3: เฮ้ย อย่าคิดหนีนะ—!

column2: {yell} roars!
column3: {yell} โฮก!

column2: Hey, wait, you're not going to fight me, are you? I just saved you...
column3: เฮ้ย เดี๋ยวๆ เจ้าไม่ได้จะมาสู้กับข้าใช่ไหม? ข้าพึ่งช่วยเจ้าไปนะ...

column2: {yell} roars--!!
column3: {yell} โฮก--!!

column2: You're really unreasonable, ungrateful, what kind of Mountain God are you!
column3: แกนี่ไร้เหตุผลเสียจริง เป็นท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาพรรค์ไหนของแกกันเนี่ย!

column2: {yell} roars--!!
column3: {yell} โฮก--!!

column2: You still have stamina... No choice, I have to fight!
column3: เจ้ายังดูมีแรงอยู่เลย... ไม่มีทางเลือก งั้นข้าก็ต้องสู้!

column2: This White Tiger seems to have endless strength, you subdue it time and time again, but it keeps getting up and pouncing on you...
column3: เจ้าเสือขาวตัวนี้ดูเหมือนจะมีกำลังวังชาไม่สิ้นสุด เจ้าปราบมันลงได้ครั้งแล้วครั้งเล่า แต่มันก็ลุกขึ้นสู้ใหม่ และพุ่งเข้าโจมตีเจ้าอีกครั้ง...

column2: So, you and this White Tiger repeat the fight over and over again, until two shichen later, you both are exhausted...
column3: หลังจากเจ้าและเสือขาวตัวนี้สู้รบปรบมือกันมาอย่างยาวนาน ผ่านไปถึงสองชั่วยามให้หลังพวกเจ้าทั้งคู่ต่างเหนื่อยล้า...

column2: Meanwhile...
column3: ในขณะเดียวกัน...

column2: Damn {PlayerName}, always ruining my plans...
column3: บ้าเอ๊ย {PlayerName} มาขัดแผนข้าอยู่เรื่อย...

column2: If it wasn't for the master's order not to kill him...
column3: ถ้าไม่ใช่เพราะนายท่านสั่งไว้ไม่ให้ฆ่ามันแล้วละก็...

column2: Roar!
column3: โฮก!

column2: Is this... a lynx?
column3: นี่มัน... แมวป่ารึ?

column2: Why is Young Master Liu in such a hurry?
column3: คุณชายหลิวจะรีบไปไหนกันเล่า?

column2: Who? Stop playing tricks, come out if you dare!
column3: ใครกัน? อย่ามาเล่นลูกไม้ แน่จริงก็ออกมา!

column2: Fine, I'll come out.
column3: ได้ ข้าจะออกไปเดี๋ยวนี้

column2: Young Master Liu, it's been a while.
column3: คุณชายหลิว ไม่เจอกันนานนะ

column2: Tang... you actually--!
column3: ถึง... นี่เจ้ายัง--!

column2: Thanks to Young Master Liu, I'm still in good health.\nYou gave me a big gift before, how can I not return the favor?
column3: ขอบคุณคุณชายหลิวมาก ข้ายังสบายดี\nท่านให้ของขวัญชิ้นใหญ่ข้าขนาดนี้ มีหรือข้าจะไม่ตอบแทน?

column2: {yell} Damn it--!
column3: {yell} บ้าเอ๊ย--!

column2: Huff... Huff...
column3: แฮ่ก...แฮ่ก...

column2: Huff...
It seems like you've finally calmed down.\nMaybe it's because those guys were too rough, and you went into a berserk state.
column3: ในที่สุดเจ้าก็ใจเย็นลงสักที\nบางทีเจ้าพวกนั้นอาจจะต้อนเจ้าเสือนี่จนมุมเกินไป มันเลยคลั่งไม่เลือกหน้า

column2: But in the end, it's because of you that those guys got away, so why don't you become my pet and make up for this mistake with your own strength~
Liu Fuming, you shall not——
column3: หลิว ฝูหมิง เจ้าจะไม่——

column2: Hmm, why is there no one here? Did I go to the wrong place?
This Mountain cave... seems to be a place where people live. Can people actually live in such a ghostly place...
Forget it, the current priority is not to investigate here, but to hurry up and stop Liu Fuming!
Mountain, Mountain God! You are actually working with the Mountain God!\nYou, are you——
column3: ท..ท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขา! เจ้าสามารถอยู่กับท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาได้!\nเจ้า.. เจ้า——

column2: (Oh no, I forgot that it is the Mountain God in the eyes of the locals. They won't regard me as someone from the Cloud Camp, will they...)
column3: (โอ๊ยตายแล้ว ข้าลืมไปเลยว่าเจ้าเสือเป็นเทพเจ้าแห่งขุนเขาในสายตาชางบ้าน พวกเขาคงไม่มองว่าข้าเป็นพวกเดียวกับค่ายเมฆาใช่ไหมนี่...)

column2: ——Could it be the messenger of the god?!
column3: ——ต้องเป็นผู้ส่งสารแห่งเทพเจ้าแน่ๆ?!

column2: Huh?
column3: หะ?

column2: Great messenger, please accept the offerings to the Mountain God, and let the Mountain God bless us with good weather and peace this year...
column3: ท่านผู้ส่งสารผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ ท่านโปรดรับของถวายแด่ท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาด้วยเทอญ ขอให้ท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาทรงดลบันดาลให้แคล้วคลาดปลอดภัยและฝนฟ้าตกตามฤดูกาลด้วยเทอญ

column2: (I didn't expect such a development... Forget it, let's just go with the flow...)
column3: (ข้าไม่คิดว่าจะไปกันใหญ่ขนาดนี้... ช่างมันแล้วเล่นตามน้ำไปแล้วกัน)

column2: Don't worry, I will definitely let the Mountain God bless you~
column3: มิต้องห่วงอันใด ข้าจะให้ท่านเทพแห่งขุนเขาอวยพรให้เจ้าแน่นอน~

column2: Miss Wan, you seem to be a bit troubled recently. Did you encounter any difficulties?
...You're making fun of me, it's just some trivial matters.
Since Miss Wan doesn't want to talk about it, I won't ask more.\nHowever, if Miss Wan is willing to confide in me, I would be happy to think of a solution for Miss Wan.
If it's you, maybe...
Miss Wan?
Since you said so, I will take a moment of your time.
Don't just say a moment, no matter how long, I am willing to accompany~
...If you keep talking like this, I won't discuss it with you.
No, no, no, Miss Wan, I was wrong, I will change.
Actually, it's like this... My parents passed away when I was very young. After that, my aunt adopted me, and my cousin and I have been very close since we were young.
But... I have a marriage contract with my cousin...\nEver since my cousin knew about the marriage contract, he has been avoiding me...
Even this time when my cousin came back, every time I looked for him, he seemed to avoid me...
Miss Wan, do you want to confirm Lu's thoughts?
You have a close relationship with my cousin. If you could help me ask my cousin, it would be great.
Okay, I'll ask for you.\nBut let me ask first, how does Miss Wan view Lu?
I see, I'll go ask Lu now.
Lu, I have something to ask you.
What does {PlayerSurName} want to ask me? I will answer whatever I know.
Actually, it's about Miss Wan...
You tell Lu Jian Nan about Tang Wan Er's troubles.
...I didn't expect {PlayerSurName} to care about this.
If you don't want to talk about such private matters, it's okay.
No, I also want to confide in {PlayerSurName}.
You already know about the marriage contract between me and my cousin, right?
I know a little.

At that time, my cousin and I were still in our infancy. My father was not in good health, so my mother and uncle decided to use this matter to bring some joy to my father, hoping that his health would improve as a result.

...But later, my father remained seriously ill, and my uncle and aunt met with misfortune in the battle with the southwestern Jiuli. So, my mother brought my cousin to our home and raised her as her own, and I've always treated her as my real sister.
Later, my mother told me about the marriage arrangement, but I've always treated my cousin as my real sister, how could I...

As for recently... I haven't been in the manor for several years, and these years it's been my cousin taking care of my mother and managing the affairs of the manor, I don't even know how to face her...
So that's how it is...
{PlayerSurName} brother, if you were me, what would you do?
If I were you, I would...\n(This question seems to concern their future, I need to think carefully about how to answer.)
I can't think of a good solution for the moment, Brother Lu, allow me to think about it more.
{PlayerSurName} brother, have you thought it through? If you were me, what would you do?
If I were you, I would...\n(This question seems to concern their future, I need to think carefully about how to answer.)
As the saying goes, one must not disobey the orders of one's parents. Since you have a prior marriage arrangement, you should fulfill it.
But...
Brother Lu, do you like Miss Wan?
I see her as my real sister...
What if Miss Wan marries someone else, can Brother Lu accept it?
If Brother Lu can't accept Miss Wan marrying someone else, then why ignore Miss Wan?
...I know what to do now, thank you {PlayerSurName} brother.\nI'm going to find my cousin and make things clear! Could {PlayerSurName} brother help me out again...
What a beautiful place... {PlayerSurName} young hero, why did you call me here?
It's not me who wanted to see you, it's...
Cousin...
Cousin... is it you who asked {PlayerSurName} young hero to call me here?
Yes, cousin...
Cousin, do you remember? When you first came to our house, you were always unhappy. You ignored everyone except Snow Spirit, always burying your head in your knees...
At that time, I wanted to see your smile, always trying to make you happy... but I was never very successful, either making you angry or scaring you to tears...
Later, I accidentally found this place, I don't know why, but I always felt that as long as I could bring you here, you would be happy... It was not easy to trick you to come here at that time.

...Later, you couldn't find the way home, and it was Depp Whisker who found us. After we got back, my aunt punished you to stand in Horse stance for three shichen, you couldn't walk that night, it was me and Depp Whisker who carried you back.
But... I'm very grateful to you, cousin.\nAt that time, my parents had passed away, if it wasn't for you, I might have been in sorrow forever...
From that day on, every day I spent with you was the happiest time for me.
But then...
I was very scared...\nI could never meet my mother's expectations, always accidentally making you angry, always messing things up...
I was afraid that I was not good enough for you, that I would lose you...
...Cousin... you coward.
(That's about it, it would be impolite to keep watching.)
It seems that Miss Wan is very happy, isn't she?

Yes, my cousin has never shared his feelings with me, I'm very happy...\nThank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, if it weren't for you, I'm afraid my cousin and I wouldn't have had the chance to express our feelings...
If you two can be happy, then my role as a matchmaker is not in vain.

I really don't know how to thank you, young hero. Here is a pet armor as a token of my gratitude.\nIn addition, there are not many affairs in the villa at the moment, if the young hero needs help, I will definitely draw my sword to assist.
I will count on Miss Wan then.
If you consider her as your own sister and have no intention of fulfilling the marriage contract with her, you should clarify it to her as soon as possible, so as not to waste her prime years.
Brother {PlayerSurName} is right, I will explain it to my cousin.
Cousin...
Why is my cousin so serious, what happened?
Your thoughts, brother {PlayerSurName} told me...
Then, what do you think, cousin?
...Cousin, you have been raised by mother since you were a child, and I have always treated you as my own sister...
Although we have a marriage contract, I really can't see you as a marriage partner...
I'm sorry for making you wait for me for so many years...
...I should have known it would be like this.
Cousin...
It's okay, cousin. I've been alone since I was a child, and I've always treated you and aunt as my own brother and mother. Now that the marriage contract is cancelled, I feel very relieved.
I suddenly remembered that I have some things to do. If there's nothing else, cousin, please allow me to run away now.
Hmm... okay.
{PlayerSurName}, did I hurt my cousin's feelings...
Since Brother Lu has already decided, there's no need for regret.
You're right... Thank you, {PlayerSurName}. If it weren't for you, I wouldn't have been able to make up my mind...
You're too polite, Brother Lu.
(Miss Wan seems very upset. To prevent her from doing anything foolish, I'd better go find her.)
Miss Wan, I didn't expect to find you here.
Young Master {PlayerSurName}, how did you get here...
I was worried about Miss Wan, so I came to check on her.
I'm sorry for making you worry, I'm fine...
(Miss Wan's voice is still choked with sobs, she doesn't look fine at all. She must be trying to put on a brave face. I need to be careful with my words at this time. What should I say?)
You're right, thank you, Young Master {PlayerSurName}.
Miss Wan, what do you think of me?

Young Master {PlayerSurName} is a great benefactor of the Manor, with high martial arts skills and reliable character, naturally a hero among us. In the future, Beast Manor will inevitably have dealings with you, and I hope that we can always maintain a friendly relationship.
Uh, that's not what I meant...

As for Young Master {PlayerSurName}'s character, we all know it very well. Young Master {PlayerSurName} is not afraid of danger and is willing to risk his life for his friends. He is a rare good person in the martial arts world today.
Having a friend like young hero {PlayerSurName} is my fortune.\nIf young hero {PlayerSurName} needs my help in the future, I will definitely draw my sword to assist.
I was a bit rude today, I hope young hero {PlayerSurName} won't mind.\nThere are still matters waiting for me to deal with in the manor, I will take my leave first.
This is not the development I wanted, did I say something wrong...
Eh? Why did young hero {PlayerSurName} suddenly ask this?
When I'm in a bad mood, I would also find a meaningful place for myself and stay there quietly for a while.
Young hero {PlayerSurName} is right, this place is indeed meaningful to me...
Would Miss Wan'er like to talk to me about it?
It's not an interesting story, I won't waste your time.
No relations, if Miss Wan'er really doesn't want to talk about it, it's fine.\nBut if you are willing to talk, I always have time to listen.
Miss Wan?
Since young hero {PlayerSurName} said so...\nBut it's really not an interesting story, young hero {PlayerSurName}, you can just think of me as talking to myself.
Okay, I promise you.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, could you turn around and not look at me?
Like this?
Yes, that's good.
My father is auntie's younger brother. When auntie came to the southwest to establish Beast Manor to prevent Jiuli Tribe from invading the Central Plains again, my parents also followed auntie here.
Later, my cousin and I were born one after another. In order to bring joy to my sick uncle, they arranged a marriage for us when we were both not aware of it.
...Then, when I was about 5 years old, I sneaked out of the manor because I wanted to play, and accidentally discovered this place.
As a child, I was so captivated by the beautiful scenery here that I lost track of time...\nAt that time, it was the most intense conflict between the manor and the Jiuli Tribe...
And the final result was that my parents and the people of the Jiuli Tribe found me almost at the same time...

My parents were seriously injured in front of me...\nThe people of the Jiuli Tribe had poisoned their blades, and by the time we returned to the manor, the poison had already spread, and it was too late to save them...
Later, my aunt adopted me, but I have always blamed myself, thinking, "If I hadn't been so playful, my parents wouldn't have died..."
My cousin must have noticed my depression, and he always tried to make me laugh...\nOne day, he tricked me into leaving the manor, and finally brought me here...
He brought you back here, you must have been very sad, right?
...At first, I cried a lot, but seeing my cousin making various poses with flowers to make me happy, I somehow burst into laughter.

So, I've always been grateful to my cousin who saved me from sorrow and self-blame.\nPerhaps that's why I was so happy when I found out that my cousin and I were engaged, feeling that I could be with him forever...

I seem to have digressed... Young hero {PlayerSurName}, this is what this place means to me.\nI'm sorry, I'm not very good at telling stories, especially boring ones. Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you must be tired of listening, right?
No, I just didn't expect Miss Wan'er to have such a past...
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, please don't turn around...
I'm sorry, Miss Wan'er, I didn't mean to...\n(Miss Wan'er's body is trembling, is she crying?)
It's okay, young hero {PlayerSurName}, my story is over...\nThank you for listening to my story, I feel much better.
It's nothing, as long as Miss Wan'er needs, I'm always here~
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you should know that I don't like flattery...\nBut, thank you...
Yes, I'm sorry!\nHuh? Did you just...
I've been out for a long time, I shouldn't let everyone worry. I'll go back to the villa first. If young hero {PlayerSurName} needs my help, I will definitely draw my sword to help.
I didn't expect Miss Wan'er to have such a past...
Later, I thought, maybe it was my parents who didn't want me to be too sad, so they guided my cousin to find this place in the dark.
Indeed, it's a very boring story, crying and whining, it's disgusting!
Jiuli Tribe...what are you doing here!
{PlayerName}, we are here to avenge our chieftain!\nI didn't expect to run into the Young Lady of Beast Manor, it's like killing two birds with one stone!

Beast Manor has been obstructing us for so many years. This time, a brother who was scouting reported that the Young Lady of Beast Manor was out alone, how could we miss the opportunity to avenge our grudge?
As for {PlayerName}, if you get in the way, we'll kill you too!
Hey, didn't you see me here too?\nI order you to go back now!
You are no longer the saintess of Jiuli Tribe, just a traitor who helps the people of the Central Plains, why would we listen to your orders?
This is the decision of the tribe, we cannot obey the orders of the saintess, we hope the saintess will not make trouble, we will not hurt the saintess.
This situation...is the same as that time...
Miss Wan, how are you, can you fight?
Father...Mother...
Don't...
(It seems that the current situation reminds Miss Wan of what happened here when she was a child. In this situation, it's impossible to expect her to have the power to protect herself.)
Don't worry, Miss Wan, with me here, I won't let them touch a hair on your head!
Miss Wan, the bad guys have been driven away, are you okay?!
It's all Wan's fault...it's all Wan's fault...
It's okay, Miss Wan, they've all been driven away by me, you're safe now.
{PlayerSurName} young hero...?
{PlayerSurName} young hero, how are you, are you hurt? The Jiuli people have poison on their blades, if you're Poisoned then...
Don't worry, look, I'm fine, I'm not hurt.
That's good...that's great...\nIf you were hurt, I really wouldn't know what to do...
Miss Wan'er, what's wrong? Are you injured?
No, I'm not injured... Thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}.\nThis place is dangerous, we should not stay here for long.
It's okay, as long as you like it here, you can stay as long as you want, I will always be by your side to protect you.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, you should know that I don't like flattery...\nBut, thank you...
Yes, I'm sorry!\nHuh? Did you just say...
We should go back first, if we don't, Aunt will worry.
Alright, let's go back.
Miss Wan'er, what's wrong?
It seems that I relaxed all at once, my legs can't exert strength, I can't stand up...
In that case, I'll carry Miss Wan'er back.
This, men and women should not touch each other, how can...\nPlease go back first, young hero {PlayerSurName}, I'll go back when I can exert strength...
How can that be, I promised to always protect you. If you want to go back, I'll carry you back. If you want to wait here until you recover, I'll wait with you.
Then... thank you, young hero {PlayerSurName}...
You carry Tang Wan Er and run away from the Sea of Flowers, back to the Beast Manor.
column3: คุณอุ้มถังหว่านเอ๋อหนีมาจากทะเลบุปผา กลับมายังหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูร

column2: I really owe it to young hero {PlayerSurName} for this trip, I was able to return safely. If there's anything you need my help with in the future, I will definitely draw my sword to assist you.
There are many things to be dealt with in the villa, I'm sorry I can't leave.
column3: ยังมีธุระอีกมากที่ข้าต้องจัดการในหมู่ตึกนี้เจ้าค่ะ ข้าขออภัยด้วยข้ายังไปไม่ได้เจ้าค่ะ

column2: My aunt hasn't woken up yet, I need to take care of her, I can't leave, please understand, young hero.
I'm not the same kind of person as you, young hero, I'm sorry I can't comply.
There doesn't seem to be a place for me by your side.
No matter what happens, my sword will always be by your side.
Since young hero {PlayerSurName} needs, I will comply.
Young hero {PlayerSurName}, what is this place?
This is the Shrine of the God of Marriage, where men and women in the Central Plains make marriage vows and seek blessings from the old moon...
I see...\nI wonder if my parents also made their marriage vows here...
Miss Wan'er, I hope to be with you too...
...So young hero {PlayerSurName} has such thoughts about me.
Yes, I want to be by your side, Miss Wan'er, and grow old with you!
I wonder when young hero {PlayerSurName} started to have these thoughts?
Uh, well...
I'm very happy that young hero {PlayerSurName} thinks this way.\nBut... for such an important matter, I still want to go to a place that means more to me.
Okay, as you wish.
Thank you for your kindness, young hero {PlayerSurName}, but I already have someone in my heart, please understand, young hero {PlayerSurName}.
Well, okay...
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, why have you brought me here again today?
This place holds great significance for Miss Wan'er, doesn't it?\nToday, I want to add more significance to this place and make it meaningful to me as well.
I don't understand what you mean, {PlayerSurName}young hero.
I {PlayerName}wish to spend my life by Miss Wan'er's side, growing old together!
I'm very happy to hear that {PlayerSurName}young hero has such intentions.\nBut I want to know, are you serious, {PlayerSurName}young hero, or are you just being slick as usual?
Of course I'm serious, how could I joke about such a serious matter?
...It seems that {PlayerSurName}young hero is serious.\nHowever...
However?
I do have a prior engagement with my cousin. If {PlayerSurName}young hero is serious, my aunt must agree first.
But, Tang Tai Jun has already...
Yes, it's a pity, {PlayerSurName}young hero, you should let go of this idea.
Alright, I'll go to Tang Tai Jun for approval right away!
Damn, with Tang Tai Jun's death, there's no one left to decide on my marriage with Wan'er.
Junior pays respects to Tang Tai Jun, I have a favor to ask.
Young hero, there's no need for such formalities. If there's anything I can help with, just say it.
I hope Tang Tai Jun can decide to betroth Tang Wan Er to me.
Such a big matter, and Wan'er is not here, let's wait until she's here to discuss it.
Wan'er, what do you think?
Aunt...
column3: ท่านป้า...

column2: I know you feel indebted to young hero {PlayerSurName} for his kindness to the manor and find it hard to refuse. I ask you, if you don't consider this kindness, would you agree?
I'll follow Aunt's arrangements.
I see.
Jian Nan, what do you think about this?
...My cousin is my closest relative, {PlayerSurName}brother and I are like brothers, if they can be happy, I'll be happy...
...Since that's the case, I won't say anything more.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, I approve of your marriage with Wan'er.\nAnd, I will host the wedding for you.
In addition, this weapon was used by me. I will give it to {PlayerSurName}young hero as Wan'er's dowry, hoping that you will treat Wan'er well in the future.
Thank you, Tang Tai Jun, for your approval. I will definitely treat Wan'er with all my heart!
Tang Tai Jun used all the resources of the villa to hold a grand wedding for you and Tang Wan Er.
At the wedding, all the birds and beasts in the mountains offered their blessings to you.
Holding the fairy-like Tang Wan Er in your arms, you feel like you have the whole world.
At this moment, you are the happiest person.
But no one noticed, in the corner, someone was silently getting drunk...

{PlayerSurName}Young hero, this maiden has lived in the southwest all her life, only seeing the birds and beasts of the southwest, never tasting the fireworks of the Central Plains. If {PlayerSurName}young hero is willing, Wanner hopes to hold {PlayerSurName}young hero's hand and see the beautiful scenery of the world.
The future is a long way off, please {PlayerSurName}young hero for more advice.
This is the Bamboo Forest that Mr. Liu mentioned...
column3: นี่คือป่าไผ่ที่ท่านหลิวพูดถึงสินะ...

column2: There seem to be quite a few Bamboo shoots here, let's see which one is the sweet dragon bamboo shoot.

column2: This Bamboo shoot has a faint sweet aroma, it should be this one, right?

column2: Don't be fooled by its cute appearance, Miss Wanner said this guy is a real beast, it's better to strike first, or suffer later, sorry Iron-eating Beast!

column2: No, it doesn't seem to be targeting me, it seems to be afraid of something...

column2: Found it, it's here!
column3: เจอแล้ว มันอยู่นี่!

column3: ไอ้หนู ข้าไม่ปล่อยแกไปแน่ ในเมื่อเจ้าหาเรื่องค่ายเมฆาก่อน เจ้าก็ต้องตายที่นี่ซะ!

column2: Want to kill me? I'm afraid it's not that easy!
column3: อยากจะฆ่าข้ารึ? ข้าว่าไม่ง่ายขนาดนั้นหรอกนะ!

column3: เฮ้ย ไอ้นี่มันใจกล้านัก เด็กๆ สับมันให้เละ!

column2: Damn, this guy is really strong...
column3: หนอย ไอ้หมอนี่แข็งแกร่งชะมัด...

column2: What's wrong? Weren't you very arrogant just now?
column3: อะไรกันเล่า? ไม่อวดดีแล้วรึไงฮะ?

column2: Tell me, how did you get mixed up with Mr. Liu, and what are you trying to do by causing a ruckus in Beast Manor and kidnapping Mr. Liu?
column3: บอกมาว่าพวกเจ้าไปร่วมมือกับเจ้าหลิวนั่นได้ยังไง แล้วพวกเจ้าไปก่อปัญหาในหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรแถมยังหลักพาตัวหมอหลิวไปอีกทำไมกัน?

column2: Heh, I didn't expect you to have relations with Beast Manor, do you think I'll tell you honestly?
column3: เฮอะ ข้าไม่คิดว่าแกจะรู้จักกับพวกหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูร แกคิดว่าข้าจะเล่าให้แกฟังซื่อๆรึยังไง?

column2: Aren't you afraid I'll kill you?
column3: งั้นเจ้าก็ไม่กลัวตายใช่ไหม?

column2: Hehehehehe...
Woman, how long are you going to watch!
column3: ท่านหญิง ท่านจะดูอยู่อีกนานไหม!

column3: เฮ้ย พวกกลุ่มเสื้อคลุมดำ เจ้าจะดูเฉยๆอีกนานไหม!

column2: Hmm~
column3: หงี้ด~

column2: This guy was probably just hiding from those Cloud Camp people and ran here.

column2: Now it has no hostility towards me, and it looks quite cute. If my Beast Taming Level is high enough, I should be able to tame it as a pet.

column2: Master Tang, have you recovered?

column2: I'm fine now, all thanks to {PlayerSurName}young hero.

column2: Thank you, Master!
column3: ขอบคุณท่านเจ้าตึก!

column2: {PlayerSurName}Young hero, you have extraordinary abilities. You crushed Liu Fuming's plot and saved the Mountain God. I truly admire you.
Senior, you flatter me. I still have a lot to learn.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, there's no need to be modest. When I was your age, I couldn't achieve what you have.
By the way, do you still remember the guys from Cloud Camp?
Of course, what happened to them?
Cloud Camp was severely damaged after returning from the snow mountain, but recently they seem to be regrouping. I don't know when they will make a comeback.
Those people usually poach rare animals and trade in fur. They also attack the disciples of the manor, causing casualties. In my opinion, they deserve to die.
I hope to ask {PlayerSurName} young hero to take action and wipe out these remnants. I will be very grateful.
So that's what happened. Don't worry, elder. I have already executed the leader of Cloud Camp on the spot.
Is this true?
Absolutely true. I was worried that they would cause trouble for Beast Manor, so I made a detour to Cloud Camp.
I didn't expect {PlayerSurName} young hero to be so thoughtful at such a young age. I underestimated you.
This spear has been with me for decades and I have always taken good care of it. I will give it to you today.
This spear is so valuable, how can I...
You saved Beast Manor from a disaster. It's just a spear. Please accept it.
If that's the case... thank you for the spear, elder.
Don't worry, elder. I've got this.
Elder, I have cleaned up the remnants of Cloud Camp.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, you are indeed a young hero.
This spear has been with me for decades and I have always taken good care of it. I will give it to you today.
This spear is so valuable, how can I...
You saved Beast Manor from a disaster. It's just a spear. Please accept it.
If that's the case... thank you for the spear, elder.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, are you really going to do this?
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, be careful with your words and actions in the world of martial arts. Don't make such jokes again.
Well, it seems that I am really old. Anyone dares to mess with me.
{PlayerSurName}Brother, I didn't expect you to be this kind of person! We are enemies from now on!
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, since you insist on doing this, don't blame me for being rude!
Let me see your skills, {PlayerSurName} young hero!

This place is a fortress that has been defending the southwest for decades without retreating. It is the Great Wall that ensures the Central Plains are free from disaster in the wild. It is a paradise where birds and beasts play freely. But now, birds fall from the sky, beasts gasp for breath. In the fire, everything turns to ashes. The fortress and the Great Wall no longer exist.
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>Beast Manor, annihilated!</color></size>
column3: <size=250%><color=#E3170D>กวาดล้างหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูร!</color></size>

column2: {yell}Come on, is this all you Jiuli Tribe got?
column3: {yell}เข้ามา พวกเผ่าจิ่วลี่ได้แค่นี้รึไง!?

column2: Elder, what happened here?
column3: ท่านผู้อาวุโสเกิดอะไรขึ้น?

column2: A bunch of Jiuli flies, they smell blood and swarm over.

column2: Jiuli Tribe...
column3: เผ่าจิ่วลี่...

column2: Hey, you remnants of the Jiuli Tribe, do you know who I am?
You, you are {PlayerName}...
Tsk, we're done for this time, let's retreat!
Hey, did Ah Ge send you guys?
column3: เฮ้ย ท่านพี่ส่งพวกเจ้ามารึไง?

column2: Saint, Saintess! Why are you with them...
Cai Die can be with whoever she likes!\nYou haven't answered Cai Die's question yet, did Ah Ge send you?
What bad luck...|Why is the Saintess here of all places...|If we hurt the Saintess, the chief will...|The angry Saintess is so cute...|We can't afford to offend the Saintess and the chief...
You guys from the Beast Manor, you're lucky today, I'll spare your lives!\nLet's retreat!
Thank you, Little Cai Die, thanks to you they left obediently.
Huh? But Cai Die didn't do anything...
Senior, let me lend you a hand!
column3: ผู้อาวุโส ให้ข้าช่วยท่านนะ!

column2: No need, {PlayerSurName} young hero, they're just annoying bugs, I can handle them alone.
column3: ไม่ต้องหรอก จอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} พวกมันก็แค่มดปลวก ข้าจัดการคนเดียวได้

column2: Damn it, they dare to look down on us!\nLet's show them the power of the Jiuli Tribe!
column3: หน็อย กล้ามาดูถูกพวก้ขา!\nแสดงพลังของเผ่าจิ่วลี่ให้มันเห็น!

column2: Tsk, these guys have even learned to ambush.\n{PlayerSurName} young hero, I'll leave my back to you.
column3: ชิ พวกมันรู้จักซุ่มโจมตีกันด้วยรึ\nจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} ปล่อยให้ข้าระวังหลังให้เจ้าได้เลย

column2: Don't worry, senior, I won't let these guys get close to you!
column3: อย่าห่วงเลยท่านผู้อาวุโส ข้าจะไม่ปล่อยพวกมันเข้าใกล้ท่านแม้แต่ตัวเดียว!

column2: This side is taken care of, I need to go help senior--
column3: ฝั่งนี้ข้าจัดการเรียบร้อย ต้องรีบไปช่วยท่านผู้อา--

column2: It seems like there's no chance for me to intervene...
column3: ดูเหมือนข้าจะไม่มีโอกาสได้แสดงฝีมือสินะ...

column2: It seems that the young hero has also finished the battle.
column3: ดูเหมือนท่านจอมยุทธน้อยเองก็จัดการฝั่งนั้นเรียบร้อยแล้ว

column2: Senior's skills are extraordinary, I admire you very much.
column3: ท่านผู้อาวุโสแข็งแกร่งยิ่งนัก ข้าน้อยขอเลื่อมใส

column2: You're too kind, young hero. I haven't exercised for a long time, it took me some time to deal with these bugs.
column3: ท่านก็ชมข้าเกินไปแล้ว จอมยุทธน้อย ข้าไม่ได้ออกกำลังกายมาซะนาน กำจัดมดปลวกแค่นี้ยังต้องใช้เวลาเยอะมากมาย

column2: I just didn't expect these bugs to still have the energy to trouble the manor...\n{PlayerSurName} young hero, I'm worried that there are still some of them lurking around the manor, waiting for an opportunity to attack the manor.
column3: ข้าไม่คิดว่ามดปลวกพวกนี้จะยังมีแรงมาก่อปัญหาให้ที่หมู่ตึกเช่นนี้ได้\nจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} ข้ากังวลว่าจะมีพวกมันแอบซุ่มรอโอกาสโจมตีหมู่ตึกอยู่อีก

column2: I shouldn't have bothered you, but I need to ensure the safety of the road into the manor, I can't just run away from the manor, could you patrol around the manor for me?
column3: ข้าไม่ควรมารบกวนเจ้าเลย แต่ข้าต้องคอยเฝ้าระวังความปลอดภัยให้กับหมู่ตึกแห่งนี้อยู่ที่นี้ ข้ารบกวนเจ้าออกไปตรวจตรารอบๆแถวนี้แทนได้หรือไม่?

column2: It's a small matter, leave it to me.
column3: เรื่องเล็กน้อย ไว้ใจข้าได้

column2: Tsk, we've been discovered, attack!|They're from the Beast Manor, attack!|Tsk, how did you find me?!|Since you found me, I have no choice but to kill you!
column3: ชิ โดนเจอตัวแล้ว โจมตี! | พวกมันมาจากหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูร ลุย! | ชิ หาข้าเจอได้ยังไงกัน!? | ในเมื่อข้าถูกพบ คงปล่อยเจ้าไปไม่ได้แล้ว!

column2: There should still be Jiuli Tribe members lurking around the manor, let's go look in another direction.
column3: น่าจะมีพวกเผ่าจิ่วลี่แอบอยู่รอบๆอีก ลองไปหาที่อื่นอีกดู

column2: There should be no more Jiuli Tribe members lurking around here, let's go back and report to senior.
column3: ไม่น่ามีพวกเผ่าจิ่วลี่แอบซ่อนอยู่แล้ว ไปรายงานให้ผู้อาวุโสทราบดีกว่า

column2: Senior, I've driven away all the Jiuli Tribe members around here.
column3: ท่านผู้อาวุโส ข้าไล่พวกเผ่าจิ่วลี่รอบๆนี้ไปหมดแล้ว

column2: Good, as expected of {PlayerSurName} young hero.\nSigh, the manor is really short of hands, even these small matters have to bother the young hero...
column3: ดีมาก อย่างที่ข้าหวังไว้จากท่านจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName}เลยจริงๆ\nเฮ้อ หมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรขาดแคลนกำลังคนอย่างมาก เรื่องเล็กเพียงนี้ยังต้องรบกวนท่านจอมยุทธน้อย...

column2: These are some insights I've gained from practicing the spear for many years, I'll give them to you, young hero, I hope they can help you.
column3: นี่เป็นเคล็ดลับที่ข้าได้เรียนรู้หลังจากฝึกฝนเพลงหอกมานานนับสิบปี ข้าจะขอมอบให้เจ้า ท่านจอมยุทธน้อย ข้าหวังว่ามันจะช่วยท่านได้

column2: You're too kind, senior.
column3: เจ้าช่างมีน้ำใจยิ่งนัก ท่านผู้อาวุโส

column2: Thanks to you, young hero, we drove away these invaders without a fight.
column3: ขอบคุณท่านมากท่านจอมยุทธน้อย เราไล่พวกบุกรุกไปได้โดยไม่ต้องสู้รบกัน

column2: Not at all, you're too kind, senior.
Sigh, seeing you, young hero, reminds me of my youth...\nIf I were ten years younger, they wouldn't dare to offend!
Sigh... Unfortunately, the younger generation of the manor is in decline, and there's no one as capable as you, young hero...
Ah, I'm afraid I've bored you with my complaints. These are some insights I've gained from years of practicing spear, I'll give them to you. I hope they can be of help to you.
You're too kind, senior.
Brother Lu, is there something troubling you?
You're too kind, Brother {PlayerSurName}, it's just some matters within the manor...
Don't be a stranger, Brother Lu. Is there anything I can help with?
You're right, I was being too reserved.
Here's the thing, after returning to the manor, I've been learning how to handle the affairs within, but the progress has been rather slow...
Especially when it comes to the art of Beast Taming... I was too busy playing with Xue Rong before, I have no clue how to train other animals...
I wonder how Brother {PlayerSurName} is at Beast Taming. If Brother {PlayerSurName} has mastered it, could you teach me?
Well... I'm not necessarily better than you...
It seems I'll have to figure it out on my own.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, have you gained any insights into the art of Beast Taming?
Uh... I really don't have anything to teach you, Brother Lu...
It seems I'll have to figure it out on my own.\nIf Brother {PlayerSurName} has mastered the art of Beast Taming, please teach me.
I do know a thing or two about Beast Taming. Let's exchange some ideas, Brother Lu.
As expected of Brother {PlayerSurName}, please don't hesitate to teach me, Brother {PlayerSurName}!
You had a great time exchanging insights on Beast Taming with Lu Jian Nan. Before you knew it, a shichen had quietly passed.
I can't believe we've spent so much time. But thank you, Brother {PlayerSurName}, I've learned a lot.
Don't mention it, Brother Lu. I'm glad I could help.
Young hero, please stop!
Young hero, these are all untamed beasts. Please don't tease them, you might get hurt.
Wait, you're the young hero {PlayerSurName} who saved the manor's master, aren't you?
Yes, I am. And you are?
I'm the disciple in charge of Beast Taming in the manor. I've been wanting to thank you properly, young hero {PlayerSurName}, but I'm short-handed and can't leave here...
Short-handed? Is there anything I can help with?
No, no, I couldn't possibly trouble you, young hero {PlayerSurName}, with these dirty and tiring tasks...
Don't be a stranger. If there's anything you're struggling with, just let me know. I'm willing to help as long as I can.
...Since you've said so, young hero {PlayerSurName}, alright. I'm ashamed to admit, but I am indeed having some difficulties.
As you can see, young hero {PlayerSurName}, there aren't many disciples in the manor. Therefore, we can't train a large number of beasts in a short time, so we can only keep them in cages...
But if we keep them in cages for too long, their wildness will fade... But with only me, I can't tame so many beasts...
So, you want me to help you tame these beasts?
Hmm... But I'm just a minor character in the manor, even if the young hero is willing to help, I can't offer any decent thank you gift...
If {PlayerSurName} young hero doesn't mind that I can't offer a thank you gift, please help me when you have time.
Okay, I'll come to you when I have time.
Is {PlayerSurName} young hero willing to help tame the beasts?
Great, then I'll leave it to {PlayerSurName} young hero!
Are you feeling unwell today, young hero?\nPlease rest well and come back to help tomorrow.
Thank you, young hero, these beasts have become more obedient!\nThis is all I have as a thank you gift, if you don't mind, please accept it.
Let's end today's training here, if you have time tomorrow, come back to help.
{PlayerSurName} young hero has already trained these beasts today.\nPlease go back and rest well, we can talk about it tomorrow if you have time.
How can a rooster be wandering around in the grand Beast Manor, something is strange...
column3: ทำไมไก่แจ้ถึงมาเดินไปมาในหมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรที่ยิ่งใหญ่แบบนี้ได้เนี่ย พิลึกชะมัด...

column2: Oh oh oh
column3: โอ๊ะ โอ๊ะ โอ้

column2: Beast Manor gathers all kinds of rare birds and beasts, it's perfectly reasonable for me to be here, what's so surprising about that!
column3: หมู่ตึกหมื่นอสูรนั้นเป็นที่รวมสัตว์ป่าหายากจากทั่วทุกมุมโลก ตรูข้ามาอยู่ที่นี่ก็สมเหตุสมผลแล้ว มีอะไรให้แปลกใจนัก

column2: Am I hallucinating, I seem to hear this chicken talking, and it calls itself "this seat"!!!
column3: นี่ข้าหลอนหรือเปล่านี่ ทำไมถึงได้ยินไก่พูดได้แถมยังเรียกตัวเอง "ตรูข้า" อีก!!!

column2: Yes, I am the one who has inherited one in a billion of the bloodline of the Phoenix, the king of all birds, noble and unparalleled, it is your fortune to witness me.
column3: ถูกต้อง ตรูข้าเป็นผู้ที่ได้เชื้อสายหนึ่งในล้านล้านล้านมาจากเทพนกวิหคเพลิงอมตะ ราชันย์ปักษา สง่างามและไม่มีผู้ใดเทียมทานได้ เจ้าช่างโชคดีนักได้เห็นตรูข้า

column2: A mere rooster claiming to have inherited the bloodline of the Phoenix, by your logic, all birds can claim kinship with the Phoenix.
column3: ไก่แจ้ธรรมดามันบอกว่าเป็นผู้ที่ได้เชื้อสายหนึ่งในล้านล้านล้านมาจากเทพนกวิหคเพลิงอมตะเนี่ยนะ ถ้าเจ้าอ้างแบบนี้นกทุกตัวมันก็สืบสายเลือดมาจากเทพวิหคเพลิงอมตะแล้วมั้ง

column2: {yell} dare to look down on me, it infuriates me!
column3: {yell} กล้าดีนักมาลบหลู่ตรูข้า!

column2: Unfortunately, this place is remote and few birds come here, otherwise I would definitely show you how powerful I am!
column3: โชคร้ายนัก ที่นี่ช่างกันดาร มีนกมาที่นี่ไม่มากนัก ไม่อย่างนั้นตรูข้าคงแสดงให้เจ้าเห็นแล้วว่าตรูข้านั้นเจ๋งแค่ไหน

column2: Even someone like you has several intimate ladies, why am I still alone like a single chicken.
Seeing you without any luck with women, I feel a lot better.
Where did this country chicken come from, you should bow down to me when you see me!
A mere scruffy chicken dares to be arrogant, let me teach you how to be a chicken!
Who am I? Where am I? What just happened?
Scruffy chicken, if you dare to brag and swagger in front of me again, I'll peck all your scruffy feathers off!
Indeed, there are always bigger mountains and better chickens, I have learned a lot today.
You carry so much money, it must be ill-gotten gains, be careful of being robbed.
I've never seen a poorer pauper than you.
You came to see me empty-handed, don't you think it's too rude? I'm starving, you should at least show some courtesy.

My master is either working on a construction site or writing coin chapters, too busy to take care of me, so he left me in the manor for foster care.|Why waste your youth wandering the world instead of learning something useful, don't you think it's a waste of time?|I heard that many young people who want to be heroes are woodcutting and mining day and night, I can't understand the connection.
Why waste time making your own weapons? I heard that Langya Sword Pavilion has a lot of weapons, why not go "borrow" some ready-made ones.
I don't believe you can create an invincible armor, those are just icing on the cake. Learning more Legendary techniques is what really matters.
I'm best at causing trouble, otherwise I wouldn't have lasted long in the Beast Manor where strong fighters are aplenty.
Why don't you perform a trick of a rooster laying an egg~
Those big guys in the cage are always eyeing me, are they coveting my noble status?
You're overthinking, they're drooling over you, coveting the few pounds of chicken meat on you.
I have only one master in my life, and one day he will take me away from here, I'm looking forward to that day.
So, give up the idea of wanting me to acknowledge you!
You've been eating my food for so many days, if you don't show some gratitude, it might be a loss of face for you.
I've lived a clean life, I won't be tempted by your small favors!
This is one of the few treasures I have, consider it as a replacement for the food of these few days.
Doctor, you're finally back...|Doctor, I've been poisoned...|Doctor, my head hurts...|Doctor, I've been bitten by a snake...|Cough cough...|Doctor, I feel so cold...|Doctor, I'm dying...
No worries, everyone, don't rush, I can see all of you one by one.
Mr. Liu seems very busy, I'll come to see him later.
Old lady thanks {PlayerSurName} for your kindness, but there's nothing more Beast Manor can teach you. I just hope you can continue to maintain your friendship with Beast Manor.
Thank you for your kindness, but Beast Manor has no plans to recruit disciples for now.
Speaking of which, didn't the master take me to Bailing Mountain before?
Yeah, why bring this up all of a sudden?
I recall, I think I saw the Divine Hawk on the mountain...
What Divine Hawk? You're talking nonsense again.
What Divine Hawk?
Oh, it's {PlayerSurName}, you scared me, I thought it was Uncle Jie coming to check on us...
You just mentioned the Divine Hawk of the snowy mountain, what is it?
Ah, there's a rumor in the nearby village that there's a Divine Hawk in Bailing Mountain, which watches over the animals in the mountain to prevent them from being poached.
Such a powerful Divine Hawk, I didn't see it when I went to Bailing Mountain before.
Hey, young hero {PlayerSurName}, don't listen to his nonsense. This Divine Hawk is just a legend, no one has seen it.
Who says, I've seen it, I've really seen it!
You were on such an important mission with the master, how could you be distracted by other things, you must have seen it wrong!
Alright, stop arguing. Wouldn't we know if there's a Divine Hawk or not by going to Bailing Mountain?
That's right, young hero {PlayerSurName}, you're more powerful than us. If you can tame that Divine Hawk on Bailing Mountain and bring it back, it would be more convincing than us discussing here!
Hmph, there's definitely no such thing as a Divine Hawk!
(I'm somewhat concerned about the rumor of the Divine Hawk on Bailing Mountain. I should go and check it out when I have time.)
Brother, in which direction did you see the Divine Hawk on Bailing Mountain?
Let me think, I was hiding under the mountain path at that time, my eyes were on the direction of the path, so it should be along the mountain road all the way up.
Hello, fellow villager. Have you heard about the Divine Hawk on Bailing Mountain?
I think I've heard other villagers mention it, but I've never seen it myself.
Is there any legend about where it might be?
I'm not sure, but it's probably in the same place as the mountain god.
Thank you, fellow villager.

Apart from the camp set up by Liu Fuming and his team, there are no other signs of animal activity here. Moreover, the white tiger is so fierce. If the Divine Hawk really lives here, I'm afraid it's already been eaten by the white tiger.
God, Divine Hawk! It really exists!
Caw? Caw caw caw caw caw~
Look, I told you there was a Divine Hawk!\nAs expected of Young Hero {PlayerSurName}, you really managed to tame the Divine Hawk!
No... actually...
You briefly explain the situation with the Divine Hawk to the two of them.
Who would have thought that the so-called Divine Hawk was actually a person in disguise...\nWhat does this mean for our bet then...
That is...
There really is a Divine Hawk!
This guy is so big, he must be tough to deal with, what should I do?
This guy must be tough to deal with, I should prepare before challenging him.
What should we do with this Divine Hawk still here?
Caw caw——!
As expected, it's extraordinary, it can even use martial arts, I'll prepare before challenging it.
Caw...
You see how powerful I am!\nIf you don't want to get beaten again, behave and become my pet!
Okay! I agree, just stop hitting me——!\nLet's negotiate, I can accept you as my master, but can you not treat me as a pet, just as a partner...
You're sensible...
Wait, did you just speak? Did you just speak?!
Yes, yes I did...
I didn't expect that there are animals in this world that can speak human language. It's really a Divine Hawk, this trip is not in vain!
Um... It seems there's been a misunderstanding...\nI'm a human, not a hawk...
Ah, I see, I see.\nSince you can speak human language, it's only natural that you consider yourself a human. Don't worry, I'll treat you as a good companion.
No, {PlayerSurName} brother, this guy seems to be a real human.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, he should be a real human...
...Have you lost your mind from keeping too many pets? This guy is obviously a human.
No, no, no, look closely, I'm just like you, a human. This is just a costume...
Poke poke...
Pinch pinch...
It seems like he really is a human...\nI got my hopes up for nothing.
Hey, I'm talking to you, why are you pretending to be a Divine Hawk when you're a perfectly good human!
Well... there's a reason...
Forget it, I'm not interested in your reasons...\nI'm only interested in the Divine Hawk.
Sigh... what a letdown...
I didn't expect it to end up as such a farce...
Hehe, this wolf looks good, although it's not that Divine Hawk, it can still fetch a good price.
Don't move around, if you get hurt, you won't be able to sell for a good price.
{yell} Quack quack!
Speak of the devil and he shall appear, he really took the bait!
(This is the guy who disguised himself as Divine Hawk... With his abilities, I'm afraid he can't handle these people. What should I do?)
Hey, stop it!
If you want to hurt the animals here, you have to get past me first!
Where did this guy come from, he's asking for trouble!
These guys aren't that capable, but they sure know how to run.
Thank you, hero, for saving my life!
Don't you know your own abilities! Why would you stick your neck out?
It's my duty.
Duty? What duty?
It has to do with my disguise... Do you have time to listen?
Quack quack! Great!\nBut it's not convenient to talk here, let's go to the top of the mountain.
When I was very young, my parents fled the war in the Central Plains and traveled thousands of miles to the Southwest region, only to be attacked by the Jiuli Tribe here.
A female hero saved my life at that time, but my parents...\nAs a child, I didn't understand and blamed the female hero for not being able to save my parents, so I angrily parted ways with her.
By the time I came to my senses, I had run into a Dilapidated Temple in an Abandoned Courtyard, and the female hero was nowhere to be seen. So I had to live alone in that Dilapidated Temple.

During that time, I only had martial arts novels to keep me company.\nPerhaps influenced by the novels and the female hero, I also wanted to become a great hero, helping others and flying around like in the books.
...But that's just a Novel.\nI wanted to help the nearby villages, but they all saw me as an ominous symbol and no one was willing to accept me.

Finally, one day, I came to this Bailing Mountain and accidentally saved a white tiger that had been caught in a trap... At that moment, looking at the grateful eyes of the white tiger, I knew I had found my place.
Since that day, I've been living here, pretending to be the Divine Hawk from the storybooks, helping these animals.

Perhaps my actions touched the heavens, and every once in a while, I would find some delicious Food at the entrance of the Mountain cave where I lived. The temperature here is very low, and the Food doesn't spoil easily, so I've been able to survive on these rations until now.
I always thought what I was doing was right, until a few days ago...

That day, I saw a man in white leading a group of people into the white tiger's Mountain cave from afar. I wanted to help, but one of the group spotted me. Just a moment of eye contact, and my legs started shaking uncontrollably.

Then I saw you, defeating those people all by yourself and protecting the white tiger. At that moment, I knew that you were the hero described in the novels! And I'm just a passerby disguised as an animal...
The fascinating world described in the novels doesn't belong to me, it belongs to people like you. My place is only here, a snowy mountain in the remote southwest.
Hero, I ask you, what is the world of martial arts really like?
Brother Hawk, if you want to see, come and join me in the world of martial arts. Seeing is believing.
Someone like me would only get in the way, and besides, this snowy mountain can't do without me.
Alright, I respect your choice.
Thank you, hero, for your help today. May I ask your name?
I am {PlayerName}, may I ask how Brother Hawk is called?
I can't remember my name, but I quite like the title of Brother Hawk.
Found Divine Hawk, he's here!
Good lad, we finally found you!
Don't push it too hard, it might fall!
What's there to fear? Hawks can fly.
Such a big one can't fly... and even if it does, where are we going to find it?
True, let's not delay and catch it quickly!
Are you ignoring my existence?
Tsk, it's you again! You've ruined my plans over and over again, I won't let you live to run away from here today!
I'd like to see if you're capable of that!
Please, hero, spare us, we are just trying to make a living, we wanted to catch this Divine Hawk for money...
Catch Divine Hawk for money? Tell the truth, what's going on?
Yes, that's right...\nThis Bailing Mountain originally had a fierce white tiger, we would not come here to hunt unless necessary...
Yes, that's right...\nRecently, there have been rumors about a Divine Hawk here, someone is offering a high price for this Divine Hawk, so we came here to try our luck...
Since you came for the Divine Hawk, why did you go hunting other animals?
If we can't catch the Divine Hawk, this trip can't be in vain, we can only catch something else to exchange for money.
Brother Hawk, listen, they are coming for you now, do you still want to stay here like this?
But...
How, how can it talk?!
Because this guy is not the Divine Hawk at all, he's just a person pretending to be the Divine Hawk.
This... how can this be...
How about this, I let you go, you tell others that the Divine Hawk of Bailing Mountain is a person in disguise?
...In our line of work, we don't believe in such news released by others.\nUnless the Divine Hawk completely disappears from here, people will still come here for money.
Brother Hawk, if you want to save the creatures here now, the best way seems to be to restore peace to Bailing Mountain and let the legend of the Divine Hawk disappear from here.
And don't you want to fly? Only by leaving here and going out into the world will you know what flying is, what the world is, what a hero is.
...Is there no other way?

Brother {PlayerSurName}, since it has come to this, I accept your proposal to leave here. If brother {PlayerSurName} doesn't mind, please allow me to follow you down the mountain and wander the world.
If Brother Hawk understands, then I would be happy to wander the rivers and lakes with Brother Hawk.
As for you...
Hero, please spare me, I will go back and tell them that the Divine Hawk has already run away from Bailing Mountain, and I dare not come hunting again in my life!
Alright, I'll trust you this time, I hope you won't let me down.
Thank you, thank you!
{PlayerSurName} brother, let's go. From today on, I will be called The Divine Hawk Hero! I believe it won't be long before our names will spread all over the country!
Wait, are you really planning to wander the world dressed like this?
I've been wearing this for many years, I'm used to it. If you ask me to take it off, I won't feel right.
And with the Divine Hawk by your side, doesn't {PlayerSurName} hero look more like the hero in the storybook?
Well... never mind, as long as you like it.
By the way, I found this thing accidentally on Bailing Mountain and I want to give it to {PlayerSurName} hero. Consider it as a thank you gift for saving me twice, and a token of our friendship!
Alright, I'll accept it. When the time is right, I'll invite you to join me in the martial world!

If it doesn't concern me, I'll stay out of it.\nYou just watch this man dressed as the Divine Hawk being knocked out and taken away by this group of people.\nAs for what he will encounter, what does it have to do with you?
Bailing Mountain can't be without me, I can't join you in the martial world.
People are treacherous, it's more suitable for me to be with the birds and beasts of Bailing Mountain.
Great! Let's venture into the martial world together!|Watch me show off my skills!|The Divine Hawk Hero bravely ventures into the world of martial arts!
There seems to be no place for me by {PlayerSurName} hero's side.
Yes... (Tang Tai Jun just numbly agrees, without any actual response, because there is no extra space in the team.)
Yes, master...
There is no extra space in the team, unable to invite her to join the team.
I appreciate the kindness of {PlayerSurName}, but I have been living in the southwest for many years and have no desire to step into the Jianghu. I hope you can understand.
(How should I invite Tang Tai Jun to join my team?)
This is... the Heart Broken pill... You actually have this thing!
As expected of Tang Tai Jun, you recognize this pill, which saves me the trouble.\nDo you want to take it yourself, or should I "persuade" you to take it?
I have never bowed to anyone in my life, I wonder if {PlayerSurName} has such ability?
You forced Tang Tai Jun to take the Heart Broken pill. After a while, Tang Tai Jun's eyes were blurred and his mind was confused.
As the master of Beast Manor, I am now your master. From now on, you must follow my orders.
Yes... Master.
It seems that the Heart Broken pill has lost its effect...
What?
{PlayerName}, how dare you make me acknowledge you as my master!\nI have never been so humiliated in my life, die!
Tang Tai Jun, I have treated you well all the way, and you actually want to take my life!
Hmph, you are quite capable, I won't argue with you.\nFrom now on, don't even think about setting foot in Beast Manor!
Seeing that he couldn't get rid of you, Tang Tai Jun had to flash away and return to Beast Manor.
The golden order of Jianghu Master is here!\nMaster of Beast Manor, Tang Tai Jun, am I qualified now?
Beast Manor is now located in the southwest, and it has nothing to do with the martial arts of the Central Plains. Although it is the order of the Jianghu Master, please forgive me for not obeying.
I can't believe the Nine Factions Sect was destroyed by you...
How about it, Master, isn't your disciple very capable?
Indeed... it's a bit beyond my expectations.
Master, you don't seem very happy?
Master, have you ever mentioned your wish to me?
Master's wish?

The Nine Factions Sect was originally created by your master and uncle master to shelter the poor and unfortunate children across the world. But eventually, the Nine Factions Sect became a gathering place for all kinds of people, causing trouble everywhere, stirring up trouble for fear of the world not being chaotic.

Your master and your master's brother had a disagreement over the future direction of the Nine Factions Sect, so they were forced to run away. Later, the Nine Factions Sect became more and more reckless, even disregarding the three religions, and eventually suffered a joint crackdown by the three religions.

Your uncle master was obsessed with martial arts, disinterested in managing the Nine Factions Sect, and left everything in the care of his disciple. Unfortunately, his disciple, although expanding the Nine Factions Sect, also led it into an irreparable situation.
My wish is to clean up the Nine Factions Sect and return it to its original nature...\nBut now, there is no need for that...
Master, where are you going?
My wish has been fulfilled, there is no need to step into the martial world anymore, from now on I will retire to the Nameless village and live out my life.
If you miss me, come to the Nameless village to visit me from time to time.
Stop, this is Young Lady's room, without Young Lady's permission, no one can enter!
This is the strategist's room, the strategist has ordered, without his permission, no one is allowed to enter.
The scenery here is nice, much better than the yellow sand in the Western Regions.
Not only is the scenery here extraordinary, but its significance is also extraordinary.
Hmm? What's so extraordinary about this place?
This is where men and women in the Central Plains make their vows. If they are blessed by the matchmaker, they will stay together for life, growing old together.
I thought it was something extraordinary, what does it have to do with me, anyway, I haven't met any reliable men now.
Hey, I didn't expect you to be so weak, you're sweating?
Cough, there's nothing interesting here, let me take you somewhere else.
What a weirdo
I didn't expect you to have such a thought...
Since I brought you to run away from the Western Regions, you are unfamiliar with the Central Plains, of course I have to take care of your future, otherwise I can't rest assured.
Who needs your care, I've been able to survive all these years.
However, since we're here, let's try this matchmaker's blessing.
Wedding Stone... I seem to have forgotten to bring it.
What is a Wedding Stone?
The Wedding Stone is the key item to request the matchmaker's blessing, I'm so careless that I forgot to bring it with me.
You're really a killjoy, it seems we'll have to come back another time.
Alas, there's no other way.
Do you want to place the <color=#c44b0e>Wedding Stone</color> on the shrine?
Hey, are you joking around?
I suddenly remembered that I have a lot of important things to do, I can't get lost in this love affair.
I promise you, once I finish my work, I will bring you back here, with no distractions, to make a vow of love.
{PlayerName}, don't forget your promise to me today!
You place the Wedding Stone on the shrine, and the two of you begin to pray devoutly.
Let me guard for my good sister, to test whether the young hero is qualified to be with my good sister for three lives!
Just now was just a figment of my imagination...
Phew, it was just a false alarm...
Kid, you're a flirt, you can deceive the Innkeeper with sweet words, but you can't deceive Old Hunchback!
You deceive the Innkeeper's feelings, the only outcome is death!
Just now I was daydreaming...
Phew, luckily the scene just now wasn't real...
It exploded, the Wedding Stone actually exploded!
What's going on?
It seems that today is not a lucky day, the matchmaker suggests we come back another day.
I didn't expect there to be such strange things in the Central Plains, it seems we can only do so.
This is...
The matchmaker's blessing, the ceremony is complete!
Is it that simple?
This shows that our fate has been predetermined in the dark, the matchmaker just went with the flow.
From now on, you are my {PlayerName}'s woman. All the hardships and sufferings you've endured before, I will compensate you a thousand times over, making you the happiest woman.
I hope you can keep your word and not go back on it!
Judging by the layout and scenery here, could this be the famous love confirmation place in Xiangfan Region - God of Marriage's Shrine?
As expected of the Vermilion Bird Envoy of the Sacred Fire Sect who is good at gathering information, you even know about the God of Marriage's Shrine.
Praying to gods and buddhas ultimately depends on others' likes and dislikes. If you can't control your own fate, you will always be at the mercy of others.
I've heard that the blessings of the Matchmaker here are very effective. The blessed men and women will love each other for a lifetime and be happy. This is a good thing after all.

I don't believe in the blessings of the Matchmaker. When I was a child, I prayed to all the gods and buddhas, but there was no sign of effectiveness. I still couldn't change the outcome of my family's destruction and death.
So, I'd rather believe in myself. Only when I'm strong enough can I avoid being manipulated by others and become the true master of my own fate.
Let's go. Even the most beautiful scenery is just a fleeting beauty, and there's nothing worth lingering over.
The Innkeeper mentioned that there's going to be a black sandstorm here, and he seemed quite apprehensive. What is this black sandstorm?
column3: ได้ยินเถ่าแก่เนี้ยพูดว่าที่นี่จะเกิดพายุทรายดำเร็วๆ นี้  ดูท่าทางของเขาแล้วเหมือนจะกลัวมาก  พายุทรายดำนี่มันคืออะไรกัน?

column2: Every year at the turn of spring and summer, there will be a strong storm in this western desert, carrying a large amount of sand and stones, sweeping across the entire western region, and the places it passes are as dark as night.
column3: ทุกๆปีในช่วงเปลี่ยนผ่านระหว่างฤดูใบไม้ผลิและฤดูร้อน ทะเลทรายทางตะวันตกจะเผชิญกับพายุที่รุนแรง พายุนี้พัดพาเอาหินทรายจำนวนมหาศาล กวาดล้างไปทั่วทั้งภูมิภาคตะวันตก สถานที่ที่พายุผ่านท้องฟ้าจะมืดมิดดั่งตอนกลางคืน
