column2: Under the black sandstorm, no living thing has a chance of survival. This is the only inn within a hundred miles, so staying in the inn at this time is the safest.
column3: ใต้พายุทรายดำไม่มีอะไรรอดชีวิตได้ ในรัศมีใกล้ๆนี้มีเพียงโรงเตี๊ยมของข้าแห่งนี้เท่านั้น ดังนั้นการอยู่ในโรงเตี๊ยมตอนนี้จึงปลอดภัยที่สุด

column2: How long does this black sandstorm last?
column3: แล้วพายุทรายดำนี่จะอยู่นานแค่ไหนเล่า?

column2: Generally speaking, it lasts no more than twelve shichen, which means you can only stay in the inn for these twelve shichen.
column3: โดยปกติไม่เคยอยู่นานเกิน สิบสองชั่วยาม เจ้าก็พักอยู่ที่นี่ไปก่อนแล้วกัน

column2: The black sandstorm is coming. It's safest to stay in the inn at this time.
column3: พายุทรายดำกำลังมา ข้าควรอยู่ในนี้ดีกว่า

column2: The fat man watching the play over there is with you, right? You guys should pay the room fee first.
column3: ตาอ้วนที่ดูเจ้าต่อยตีกันมากับเจ้าใช่ไหม มาจ่ายข้าห้องก่อนเลยนะ

column2: Where am I fat? I just have a big face~
column3: ข้าอ้วนตรงไหนเนี่ย? ข้าแค่หน้ากลมเฉยๆ~

column2: How much is the room fee here?
column3: ห้องราคาเท่าใดเถ่าแก้เนี้ย?

column2: Room No.1, twenty guan!
column3: ห้องสวรรค์ชั้นหนึ่ง ยี่สิบตำลึงถ้วน!

column2: What, this is a rip-off! I've never stayed in Room No.1 before, and it costs twenty guan!
column3: จะบ้าเรอะ! นี่มันโรงเตี๊ยมปล้นสะดมชัดๆ ห้องสวรรค์ชั้นหนึ่งบ้าอะไร ราคายี่สิบตำลึง!

column2: Let me tell you, this inn is not a pay-per-day place. Once you've paid the room fee, you can stay as long as you want. If you stay for a year or half a year, who would think the daily room fee is expensive?
column3: ข้าจะขอชี้แจงเล็กน้อย ราคาของโรงเตี๊ยมนี้ไม่ใช่ราคาวันต่อวัน เมื่อเจ้าจ่ายค่าที่พักแล้ว เจ้าจะอยู่นานแค่ไหนก็ได้ จะอยู่สองสามปีก็ยังได้ เจ้ายังคิดว่าแพงไหม?

column2: Forget it, I won't argue with you.\nI'll stay in Room No.1, and you can find a cheap room for my bodyguard.
column3: ช่างมัน ข้าไม่เถียงเจ้าแล้ว\nข้าจะอยู่ไอ้ห้องสวรรค์ชั้นหนึ่งอะไรนั่น แล้วเจ้าก็หาห้องพักที่ถูกที่สุดให้ผู้คุ้มภัยข้าด้วย

column2: All the rooms here are Room No.1, and the price is twenty guan each.\nWhy don't you two squeeze in and make do?
column3: ห้องที่นี่ทุกห้องเป็นห้องสวรรค์ชั้นหนึ่ง  ราคาเท่ากันยี่สิบตำลึง\nถ้าอย่างนั้นพวกเจ้าสองคนนอนรวมกัน  เบียดกันหน่อยน่าจะพอได้อยู่นะ?

column2: No way!
column3: ไม่เอาโว้ย!

column2: Get him a Room No.1 too. This place is a rip-off!
column3: เอาห้องสวรรค์ชั้นหนึ่งให้เขาด้วย ที่นี่มันปล้นกันชัดๆแล้ว!

column2: {PlayerSurName} young hero, you saved my life, but we have to separate business from personal matters. This room fee will be deducted from your commission.
column3: ท่านจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} ท่านช่วยชีวิตข้าไว้ก็จริงแต่ต้องแยกเรื่องงานกับเรื่องส่วนตัวด้วย ค่าห้องนี้จะถูกหักจากค่าคุ้มภัยของท่านนะ

column2: I almost forgot there are three of you. Should I get a Room No.1 for your little clerk too?
column3: ข้าลืมไปว่าพวกท่านมีกันสามคน ข้าควรจะเอาห้องสวรรค์ชั้นหนึ่งให้เสี่ยวเอ้อน้อยด้วยไหม?

column2: Just let him make do here for the night. I don't have any extra money.
The first room on the left side of the second floor corridor is your room, and the <color=#c44b0e>second room on the right</color> is the young hero's room.
column3: ห้องแรกจากทางซ้ายของชั้นสองคือห้องของท่าน ส่วน <color=#c44b0e>ห้องที่สองจากทางขวา</color> เป็นของท่านจอมยุทธน้อย

column2: Shouldn't my bodyguard be arranged next to me for better protection?
column3: ไม่ใช่ว่าผู้คุ้มภัยของข้าควรมาอยู่ใกล้ๆข้ารึไง จะได้ปกป้องข้าได้?

column2: The other rooms are already full, so I have to inconvenience you two.
column3: ห้องมันเต็มแล้ว ข้าเลยไม่อาจอำนวยความสะดวกให้พวกท่านได้

column2: This money really hurts to spend.
column3: เฮ้อ เสียดายเงินชะมัด

column2: Young hero, you've been on the road for a long time. Please pay for the room first so you can rest early.
How much is the room rate here?
The best room, twenty taels.
What, did I hear wrong, twenty taels!!!
What kind of best room is this, daring to ask for twenty taels?
Sir, you don't know, this inn is not a daily rental. Once you pay, you can stay as long as you want. If you stay for a year or half a year, who would think the daily rate is expensive?
But I'm only staying for one day, I'm leaving tomorrow.
That has nothing to do with me, whether you stay for one day or a hundred days, the price is the same.
You don't have many rooms, if you have more long-term guests, won't you lose a lot?

Some people might go to bed with a head and wake up without one, not knowing when they will lose their lives in this Western Region. If I don't collect the room fee in advance, who will I ask for money when they are dead?
So this is a black shop!
Don't talk nonsense. I run my business honestly and don't stoop to such low-level tricks.

The Western Region is not like the Central Plains, it's a lawless place. There are gangs everywhere. Today you kill me, tomorrow I kill you, the day after tomorrow a group of people kill each other. Whether you can survive depends on how tough your life is.
If you die nearby, I have to collect your body and bury you.\nConsidering this, our room price is simply a loss.
You really know how to calculate, I have no words to refute.
(Hand over twenty taels)
The second room on the right side of the second floor corridor is your room, young hero. You can rest at any time.
But I don't have twenty taels on me...
Consider me unlucky, there is still a room upstairs, the second one on the right side, I'll let you stay for a cheaper price, just use all the money you have left for the room fee.
Young hero, please wait a moment, the fat man over there who looks rich is getting impatient, let's arrange his accommodation first.
Shouldn't it be first come, first served?
He came before you and looks richer than you, so it makes sense to arrange him first.
Alright, let him go first.
The fat man sitting over there, hurry up and pay the room fee!
Where am I fat? I just have a big face~
column3: ข้าอ้วนตรงไหนเนี่ย? ข้าแค่หน้ากลมเฉยๆ~

column2: How much is the room fee here?
column3: ห้องราคาเท่าใดเถ่าแก้เนี้ย?

column2: Room No.1, twenty guan!
column3: ห้องสวรรค์ชั้นหนึ่ง ยี่สิบตำลึงถ้วน!

column2: What, this is a rip-off! I've never stayed in Room No.1 before, and it costs twenty guan!
Are you staying or not? If not, get out of here!
Stay, no matter how expensive!
Almost forgot you two are together, should I open a best room for your little clerk too?
Just let him make do here for the night. I don't have any extra money.
This money really hurts to spend.
Is it my turn now?
Open the door quickly, open the door!
column3: เปิดประตูเร็วเข้า เปิดประตู!

column2: Don't dawdle, if you annoy me, I'll tear down your shop.
column3: อย่าลีลามาก ถ้าเจ้าทำข้าหงุดหงิด ข้าจะพังร้านเจ้า

column2: Can't you let me have some peace?
column3: ให้ข้าอยู่สบายๆหน่อยไม่ได้รึไงกัน?

column2: I'm knocking on the door and you dare not open it, are you tired of living!
column3: ข้าเคาะประตูแล้วยังไม่เปิด รนหาที่ตายใช่ไหม!

column2: So it's the Xuanwu Envoy who has graced us with his presence, who has upset you so much?
column3: อ้อ เป็นท่านฑูตเต่าดำนี่เองที่มา ไม่ทราบว่าผู้ใดทำท่านโมโหเช่นนี้เล่า?

column2: Innkeeper, you made me and my brothers eat the northwest wind outside for a long time, how are you going to compensate me?
column3: เถ้าแก่เนี้ย พวกเราอยู่ข้างนอก อดอยากตั้งนานเพราะเจ้า จะชดเชยพวกข้ายังไง?

column2: {yell} Little Lame, we have a distinguished guest, make a few hard dishes to reward the Xuanwu Envoy.
column3: {yell} ไอ้ขาเป๋ มีแขกผู้มีเกียรติมาเยือน ไปทำอาหารจานเด็ดมาเลี้ยงท่านทูตเต่าดำหน่อยเร็ว

column2: No problem, leave it to me!
column3: ไม่ต้องห่วง ปล่อยให้เป็นหน้าที่ข้าเถอะ !

column2: Xuanwu Envoy, please come in, we have prepared a feast for you.
column3: ท่านทูตเต่าดำ เชิญเข้ามาก่อนเถิด เราตระเตรียมอาหารไว้ให้ท่านแล้ว

column2: {yell} You little brats, you know what you should do, right?
column3: {yell} เฮ้ยเด็กๆ รู้ใช่ไหมต้องทำอะไร?

column2: Yes!
column3: ขอรับ!

column2: What do you mean by this, Xuanwu Envoy?
column3: หมายความว่ายังไงท่านทูตเต่าดำ?

column2: A sworn enemy of the Holy Fire Sect has infiltrated your Chang'an Inn. I will turn this place upside down to find him.
column3: ศัตรูตัวฉกาจของนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์แอบซ่อนตัวอยู่ในโรงเตี๊ยมฉางอันของเจ้า ข้าจะขุดพื้นพลิกโรงเตี๊ยมแห่งนี้เพื่อหาตัวมันออกมาให้ได้!

column2: Who dares to oppose the Holy Fire Sect?
column3: ผู้ใดกล้าไปแหย่นิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ล่ะนี่

column2: Don't ask what you shouldn't. It's for your own good.
column3: อย่าถามมาก ถ้าไม่อยากตาย

column2: Who is this Xuanwu Envoy, acting so high and mighty?
column3: ไอ้ทูตเต่าดำนี่มันเป็นใคร ทำไมมาทำตัวสูงส่งขมึงใส่ผู้อื่นแบบนี้?

column2: Shh, keep it down. This is Ren Zhongheng, the Xuanwu Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect. He has a bad temper, don't provoke him.
column3: เฮ้ย เบาๆ นี่คือ เหริน จงเหิง เป็นทูตเต่าดำจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ เขากำลังอารมณ์ไม่ดี อย่าไปยั่วเขาเลย

column2: Hey, kid! Come here and answer a few questions for me.
column3: เฮ้ย ไอ้หนู! มานี่แล้วตอบคำถามข้าเดี๋ยวนี้

column2: What can I do for the Xuanwu Envoy?
column3: ให้ข้าช่วยอะไรเล่าท่านทูตเต่าดำ?

column2: You're young but you recognize me, shows you're not ignorant.
column3: ยังหนุ่มแต่รู้จักข้าแบบนี้ แปลว่าเจ้าก็ไม่ได้หูตาเหมือนบอด

column2: Next, I'm going to ask you a few questions. Answer truthfully. If you lie, my iron rod will have to taste blood!
column3: ต่อไปข้าจะถามแกสักสองสามคำ ตอบให้ดีๆ ถ้าแกโกหกล่ะก็พลองเหล็กข้าได้ดื่มเลือดแน่!

column2: What does the Xuanwu Envoy want to ask?
column3: ท่านทูตเต่าดำอยากถามอะไรเล่า?

column2: What's your name?
column3: แกชื่ออะไร?

column2: My surname is {PlayerSurName}, and my name is {PlayerGivenName}.
column3: ข้าแซ่{PlayerSurName} ชื่อ{PlayerGivenName}

column2: {PlayerName}, hmm, doesn't seem like a lie.
column3: {PlayerName} อืม... ดูเหมือนจะไม่ได้โกหก

column2: My name is Wang Er Dan.
column3: ข้าชื่อ หวัง เอ้อ ต้าน

column2: Wang Er Dan, hmm, it suits your character.
column3: หวัง เอ้อ ต้าน ดูเข้ากับหน้าแกดี

column2: What brings you to the Western Regions?
column3: แกมาทำอะไรที่แดนตะวันตกกัน?

column2: I heard there's a rare item called Blood Jewel in the Western Regions that can enhance a martial artist's skills. I'm here to try my luck and see if I can find a few.
Hmm, the Blood Jewel does have such an effect, it's worth your long journey to the Western Regions.
I heard that the grapes in the Western Regions are exceptionally sweet, so I came here to satisfy my craving.
column3: ข้าได้ยินว่าองุ่นของแดนตะวันตกนั้นหวานเกินห้ามใจได้ ข้าเลยอยากมาลองชิมดูสักครั้ง

column2: Hmph, you seem to be quite interested.
column3: ฮึ่ม แกก็ดูจะสนใจได้

column2: Do you know anyone in this inn who is against the Holy Fire Sect?
column3: เจ้ารู้ไหมว่ามีใครที่ดูบาดหมางกับนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์บ้างในโรงเตี๊ยมนี้?

column2: The one-eyed man in the second room on the left upstairs seems to have a great grudge against the Holy Fire Sect.
Hmm, he must be the one we're looking for.
column3: อืม น่าจะเป็นคนที่พวกเราตามหา

column2: Kid, if what you said is true, you've done me a great favor.
column3: ไอ้หนู ถ้าแกพูดจริง ถือว่าแกได้ช่วยข้าครั้งใหญ่เลย

column2: I haven't heard of anyone here who is against the Holy Fire Sect.
Hmph, I knew asking you would be a waste of time.
The old man in the first room on the right upstairs seems to have a great grudge against the Holy Fire Sect.
column3: ชายชราคนที่อยู่ห้องแรกจากขวาสุดดูจะบาดหมางกับนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์มากสุดๆอยู่นะ

column2: Hmm, he must be the one we're looking for.
column3: อืม น่าจะเป็นคนที่พวกเราตามหา

column2: Kid, if what you said is true, you've done me a great favor.
column3: ไอ้หนู ถ้าแกพูดจริง ถือว่าแกได้ช่วยข้าครั้งใหญ่เลย

column2: Get lost, he's not the one we're looking for, don't get in my way.
column3: ไสหัวไป หมอนั่นไม่ใช่คนที่ข้าตามหา อย่ามาขวางทางข้า

column2: Does the Xuanwu Envoy have any other questions? If not, I'll be on my way.
Kid, are you trying to fool me?
Everything you just said was a lie. Even if you're not the one we're looking for, you're probably up to no good. I'll have you arrested and interrogated!
Such an arrogant Xuanwu Envoy!
Cough, kid, you've got guts!
But, do you dare to kill me?\nIf you kill me, you'll be an enemy of the Holy Fire Sect, and you'll die without a burial place in the Western Regions!
If you let him live, it will be endless trouble in the future.
Aren't you afraid of causing trouble by killing him here?
Who said he died in the inn? He clearly died in the outside sandstorm.
If you let him live, it will be endless trouble in the future.
If you kill me here, aren't you afraid that the Holy Fire Sect will make everyone here pay for it!
Who said you died in the inn? You clearly died in the outside sandstorm. Let the Holy Fire Sect settle the score with the sandstorm.
Hmm, what is it?
column3: หือ นี่มันอะไร?

column2: The inn is short-staffed, I'm here to help deliver food.
column3: โรงเตี๊ยมขาดแคลนคนช่วย ข้าเลยมาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: Why would they ask an outsider like you to deliver food? Why not have Haitang Qiu do it herself?
column3: แล้วคนนอกอย่างแกจะมาส่งอาหารทำไมวะ? ทำไมไห่ถังฉิวนางไม่มาทำเอง?

column2: There must be something wrong with this food, you eat a bite first.
column3: อาหารจานนี้ต้องมีบางอย่างแน่ๆ แกกินเข้าไปก่อนซิ

column2: (You take a bite of the food, and there's nothing unusual)
column3: (เจ้ากัดไปคำหนึ่ง ไม่มีอะไรแปลกๆ)

column2: (Takes the food and eats a small bite)
column3: (หยิบอาหารไปกัดคำหนึ่ง)

column2: {yell}Tch, what is this, animal feed?
column3: {yell}ถุ้ย อาหารสัตว์รึไงวะ?

column2: Please calm down, Xuanwu Envoy. If it's not to your taste, they will prepare another dish for you.
column3: ใจเย็นก่อนท่านทูตเต่าดำ หากไม่ถูกปากท่าน เดี๋ยวเราเตรียมจานใหม่ให้ท่านเอง

column2: I want you to deliver it personally, or don't blame me for being ruthless.
column3: ข้าอยากให้เจ้ามาส่งให้ข้าเอง ไม่อย่างนั้นอย่าหาว่าข้าเหี้ยมแล้วกัน

column2: Alright, I will deliver it to you personally later.
column3: ก็ได้ ข้าจะไปส่งให้ท่านด้วยตัวเองเอง

column2: Get lost, you're annoying to look at.
column3: ไสหัวไป เห็นหน้าเจ้าแล้วคันมือนัก

column2: Old Hunchback was also a wanderer in his youth, and knows some martial arts. If you're bored in the inn, you can always come to spar with Old Hunchback.
column3: ตาแก่หลังค่อยผู้นี้เคยเป็นจอมยุทธสมัยยังหนุ่มๆ และพอจะรู้วรยุทธอยู่บ้าง หากเจ้าเบื่อก็มาลองประลองกับตาแก่หลังค่อมผู้นี้ได้

column2: Do you want to practice with Old Hunchback?
column3: เจ้าต้องการประลองกับตาแก่หลังค่อมไหม?

column2: Don't hold back just because I'm old, Old Hunchback won't appreciate it.
column3: อย่าออมมือเพราะเห็นว่าข้าแก่ล่ะ ตาแกหลังค่อมผู้นี้ไม่ชอบ

column2: Old Hunchback is indeed old, now it's the world of you young people.
column3: ตาแก่หลังค่อมคงแก่ไปแล้วจริงๆ นี่เป็นยุคของเหล่าคนหนุ่มแล้วสินะ

column2: I have a favor to ask, I wonder if you could do me this honor.
column3: ข้ามีเรื่องอยากขอร้องท่าน ไม่รู้ท่านจะช่วยได้ไหม

column2: Please feel free to ask, there's no need to be polite.
column3: ว่ามาเถิด ไม่ต้องสุภาพ

column2: Old Hunchback had a deviation in his Qi circulation during his practice years ago, which caused his body to deform. His internal injury has not healed to this day, and he suffers unbearable pain on stormy days.
column3: ตาแก่หลังค่อมนั้น ฝึกฝนกำลังภายในผิดวิธีเมื่อหลายปีก่อน ส่งผลให้ตันเถียนแตกสลาย จนถึงปัจจุบันอาการบาดเจ็บภายในยังไม่หายดี ทกครั้งที่ฝนฟ้าคะนอง ตาแก่มักจะรู้สึกเจ็บปวดทรมาน

column2: You are one of the few travelers I trust, could you help me find someone proficient in medicine to treat Old Hunchback's injury?
column3: เจ้าเป็นหนึ่งในนักเดินทางที่ข้าเชื่อใจ เจ้าช่วยหาใครบางคนที่พอจะรักษาอาการขอตาแก่หลังค่อมได้ไหม?

column2: Rest assured, leave it to me.
column3: โปรดวางใจ ปล่อยเป็นหน้าที่ของข้า

column2: Old Hunchback, the Innkeeper asked me to find someone to treat your injury.
I've given up hope on my decade-old ailment, the Innkeeper shouldn't bother for me.
You consider this an incurable disease? It's a piece of cake for me.
Half a shichen later...
Indeed, the Qi is flowing smoothly, there's no feeling of blockage in the meridians, it seems the disease has been cured!
Thank you for your healing hands, you've relieved Old Hunchback of his long-standing illness, I'm deeply grateful.
You don't have to thank me, I did it for the Innkeeper, you should thank her.
You guys are lucky, you didn't force me to kill, you've helped me accumulate virtue.
Haitang Qiu, the Suzaku Envoy can't protect you forever, you should find a new backer.
Let's go!
Bastard...
You guys are unlucky, I haven't found what I'm looking for, so none of you can leave today.
{yell}Ren Zhongheng, you've gone too far!
The Sacred Fire Sect doesn't rule the Western Regions, do you, a Xuanwu Envoy, have to be so domineering?
The Azure Dragon Envoy has ordered, better to kill a thousand by mistake than to let one go.
Are you planning to kill everyone here?
One of you must have what I'm looking for, so I can't let any of you go.
As for you, Haitang Qiu, such a beautiful person, it would be a pity if you died.
Pah, even if I die, I won't let you touch me!
Everyone, I'm sending you on your way!
The Xuanwu Envoy of the Sacred Fire Sect, I thought you were a formidable character, but you're just so-so.
The black sandstorm has dissipated, you can set off without worry.
The mountain is high and the road is long, we will meet again in the future.
We'll meet again, I'll take my leave.
Hmph, without a guide, let's see how long you can last in the Western Regions!
{PlayerSurName}Brother, my real identity is the third master of the Cold Skin Gang in Flame City, you're welcome to visit the Cold Skin Gang, we'll meet again.
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, let's hurry on our way. As long as we reach Flame City, this trip will be a great success.
Are you still lingering here? Do you really want to stay and live here, and earn back the room fee?
I'm a stranger in the Western Regions, I don't know where to go next, could you please give me some guidance, Innkeeper?
Considering our acquaintance, I'll be kind enough to give you some guidance.

Most of the merchants from the Central Plains go to Flame City for trade. Flame City is known as the gathering place of hundreds of merchants. It's the territory of the Cold Skin Gang. As long as you don't do anything outrageous, it's quite safe in the city.
I'm just about to meet with the Cold Skin Gang, thank you for the information, Innkeeper.
Don't you know the rules? Such valuable information should be bought with money.
How much does it cost?
Not expensive, fifteen guan.
You're really greedy.
Do you want this information or not?
Don't try to bargain, I don't negotiate here, one piece of information costs fifteen guan!

Most of the merchants from the Central Plains go to Flame City for trade. Flame City is known as the gathering place of hundreds of merchants. It's the territory of the Cold Skin Gang. As long as you don't do anything outrageous, it's quite safe in the city.
I've been searching everywhere, I'm just about to meet with the Cold Skin Gang!
The master is resting, no one is allowed to disturb.
column3: นายท่านกำลังพักผ่อน ห้ามผู้ใดรบกวน

column2: I'm here to deliver food for the shop.
column3: ข้ามาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: We have our own food.
column3: เรามีอาหารส่วนตัวแล้ว

column2: You're quite cautious.
column3: ขี้ระแวงจริงๆ

column2: The master is resting, no one is allowed to disturb.
column3: นายท่านกำลังพักผ่อน ห้ามผู้ใดรบกวน

column2: I'm here to deliver food for the shop.
column3: ข้ามาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: We have our own food.
column3: เรามีอาหารส่วนตัวแล้ว

column2: You're quite cautious.
column3: ขี้ระแวงจริงๆ

column2: (There seems to be a dangerous aura emanating from the room, as if there's a very powerful person inside.)
column3: (ดูเหมือนจะมีคลื่นพลังอันตรายแพร่ออกมาจากในห้อง ด้านในน่าจะมีผู้ที่แข็งแกร่งสุดๆอยู่)

column2: I'm here to deliver food for the shop.
column3: ข้ามาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: Get out!!!
column3: ไสหัวไป!!!

column2: Such a strong MP, just a shout pushed me away, it seems the person inside is not easy to mess with, better run away.
column3: พลังปราณอะไรกันนี่ เพียงแค่ตะโกนก็ทำให้ข้ากระเด็นไปได้ ดูท่าคนด้านในไม่ใช่เล่นๆแน่ ข้าควรไปดีกว่า

column2: Your MP is impressive, but I advise you not to seek your own death!
column3: กำลังภายในเจ้ายอดเยี่ยมมาก แต่ข้าแนะนำว่าอย่ารนหาที่ตายเลย!

column2: Just a shout has such power, it seems the person inside is not easy to mess with, better run away.
column3: เพียงแค่ตะโกนก็ทรงพลังขนาดนี้ ดูท่าคนด้านในไม่ใช่เล่นๆแน่ ข้าควรไปดีกว่า

column2: Who dares to hurt the people of the Holy Fire Sect!
column3: มันผู้ใดกล้าทำร้ายคนของนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์กัน!

column2: We don't know what happened, we just flew out.
column3: ข้าไม่รู้ รู้ตัวอีกทีข้าก็ปลิวไปแล้ว

column2: You're useless!
column3: ไอ้เจ้าตัวไร้ประโยชน์เอ้ย!

column2: No matter who it is, offending the Holy Fire Sect means death!
column3: ไม่ว่ามันจะเป็นใครกล้ามาหยามนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ มันผู้นั้นต้องตาย!

column2: The master is resting, no one is allowed to disturb.
column3: นายท่านกำลังพักผ่อน ห้ามผู้ใดรบกวน

column2: The master is resting, no one is allowed to disturb.
column3: นายท่านกำลังพักผ่อน ห้ามผู้ใดรบกวน

column2: {yell} dares to offend the Sacred Fire Sect in the Western Regions, you must be tired of living!
column3: {yell} กล้ามาหยามนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ในแดนตะวันตก เจ้ารนหาที่นักใช่ไหม!

column2: Where did this fly come from, scram!!!
column3: ไอ้แมลงหวี่นี่มาจากไหน ไสหัวไป!!!

column2: Puff-- (Spits out a mouthful of fresh blood)
column3: ถุ้ย-- (ถุยเลือดออกจากปาก)

column2: This person is highly skilled, not the one we are looking for.
column3: มันผู้นี้แข็งแกร่งมาก ไม่น่าใช่คนที่เราตามหาอยู่

column2: But he has insulted our Holy Fire Sect, shouldn't we teach him a lesson?
column3: แต่ว่าไอ้หมอนี่มันกล้ามาหยามนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ ไม่ใช่ว่าเราควรสั่งสอนมันหรือขอรับ?

column2: Why did you have to provoke this kind of person!\nThis person's strength is not inferior to the sect leader, don't cause me trouble, shut your mouth immediately.
column3: แกจะไปหาเรื่องคนแบบนี้ทำไมกันวะ!\nความแข็งแกร่งของคนผู้นี้คงไม่ด้วยไปกว่าท่านเจ้าสำนักแน่ๆ อย่าสร้างปัญหาให้ข้า หุบปากเจ้าเดี๋ยวนี้

column2: Ren Zhongheng, the Xuanwu Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect, pays his respects to the elder. I apologize for any offense I may have caused earlier, and I ask for your understanding.
column3: เหริน จงเหิง ทูตเต่าดำจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ ขอคารวะท่านผู้อาวุโสด้วย ข้าขอโทษที่ไปก่อนความวุ่นวานก่อนหน้านี้ด้วย หวังว่าท่านคงเข้าใจ

column2: Get lost now.
column3: ไสหัวไปได้แล้ว

column2: Yes!
column3: ขอรับ!

column2: If you dare to speak of what just happened, beware that I might kill you!
column3: ถ้าเจ้ากล้าพูดเรื่องที่เกิดขึ้น ระวังหัวหลุดจากบ่าแน่!

column2: This door is decorated in such a unique way, it's probably the Innkeeper's room. It's best not to enter casually.
column3: ประตูบ้านนี้ตกแต่งแตกต่างจากบานอื่นมาก น่าจะเป็นห้องของเถ้าแก่เนี้ย ข้าไม่ควรเดินสุ่มๆเข้าไป

column2: Have you never seen a woman before? You dare to barge into my room!
column3: ไม่เคยเห็นสตรีรึยังไง ถึงได้กล้าบุกเข้ามายังห้องข้า!

column2: You audacious fellow, you should have been sent to meet the King of Hell long ago!
column3: เจ้าเด็กบ้าบิ่น เตรียมไปพบกับยมบาลได้เลย!

column2: {yell}Old Hunchback, Little Lame, where the hell are you guys!!!
column3: {yell}ตาแก่หลังค่อม ไอ้ขาเป๋ พวกแกไปอยู่ไหนกันวะ!!!

column2: {yell}Little Lame, where the hell are you!!!
column3: {yell}ไอ้ขาเป๋ แกไปอยู่ไหนวะ!!!

column2: {yell}Old Hunchback, get your ass in here now!!!
column3: {yell}ตาแก่หลังค่อม สะบัดตูดมานี่เดี๋ยวนี้ !!!

column2: Sigh, the situation just now was simply an endless deadlock, I had no choice.
I'm bored drinking alone, you're just in time, come play a game of finger-guessing with me.
column3: ข้าดื่มคนเดียวกำลังเบื่อๆพอดีเลย เจ้ามาได้เวลาพอดี มาเล่นเป่ายิงฉุบกับข้ามา

column2: You win a round, you get 2 strings of cash, lose a round, you only lose 1 string of cash, how about it?
What a buzzkill, if you're not interested in keeping me company, then don't kill the mood here.
Great, let's get started!
column3: เยี่ยม งั้นมาเริ่มกันเลย!

column2: What gesture should I make this round?
column3: ข้าจะออกอะไรดี?

column2: <size=250%>Hammer!</size>
column3: <size=250%>ค้อน!</size>

column2: <size=250%>Scissors!</size>
column3: <size=250%>กรรไกร!</size>

column2: <size=250%>Rock!</size>
column3: <size=250%>กระดาษ!</size>

column2: Come on, let's go again!
column3: เสมอ มาอีกรอบ!

column2: Unbelievable, you actually won, let's continue!
No more, no more, you've won all my money, what's the point of playing?
Satisfying! You finally got to see how powerful I am.
(I'm bored anyway, should I keep playing?)
What a buzzkill, if you're not interested in keeping me company, then don't kill the mood here.
Hey Innkeeper, don't think I won't dare to touch you just because you're under the protection of the Suzaku Envoy!
If I tell the sect leader that you're harboring people from the Cold Skin Gang, do you think the Suzaku Envoy can still help you?
The Xuanwu Envoy, you're drunk.
How about we have a drink together and get drunk?
If you take another step, I, I won't be polite!
Impressive, I like your temperament.
Which side should I help in this situation?
Xuanwu Envoy, I'll help you deal with her!
Get lost, this is none of your business! Don't ruin the mood.
This person is not easy to deal with, I'll help you.
I'm lucky and have a big life, let's beat this bastard together!
Don't leave any survivors, to avoid retaliation from the Holy Fire Sect!
Won't killing the Xuanwu Envoy here cause trouble for you?
Who said he died in the inn? He clearly died in the outside sandstorm.
The things that happen next are not suitable for young heroes to participate in, please step aside.
{yell}Old Hunchback, Little Lame, where the hell are you guys!!!
column3: {yell}ตาแก่หลังค่อม ไอ้ขาเป๋ พวกแกไปอยู่ไหนกันวะ!!!

column2: {yell}Little Lame, where the hell are you!!!
column3: {yell}ไอ้ขาเป๋ แกไปอยู่ไหนวะ!!!

column2: {yell}Old Hunchback, get your ass in here now!!!
column3: {yell}ตาแก่หลังค่อม สะบัดตูดมานี่เดี๋ยวนี้ !!!

column2: What a buzzkill, all of you go to hell!
Aren't you afraid of trouble for killing the Xuanwu Envoy here?
Who said he died in the inn? He clearly died in the outside sandstorm.
What happens here has nothing to do with the young hero, please step aside.
Breaking into someone else's room with ill intentions, you're asking for death!
column3: บุกเข้าห้องผู้อื่นมานับว่าเจตนาไม่ดี รนหาที่ตายซะแล้ว!

column2: Your martial arts style is not from the Holy Fire Sect, you should not be from the Holy Fire Sect.
column3: วรยุทธของเจ้าไม่ใช่วิชาของนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ เจ้าไม่ได้มาจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์นี่

column2: What would you do if I were from the Holy Fire Sect?
column3: แล้วจะทำไมถ้าข้ามาจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์จริงๆ?

column2: If you were from the Holy Fire Sect, you would be dead by now.
column3: ถ้าเจ้ามาจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ เจ้าก็ตายไปแล้ว

column2: Do you have any grudges against the Holy Fire Sect?
column3: เจ้าไปบาดหมางอะไรกับนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์มา?

column2: This has nothing to do with you.
column3: เรื่องนี้ไม่เกี่ยวข้องกับเจ้า

column2: The Xuanwu Envoy downstairs claims to be from the Holy Fire Sect, could it be...
column3: ทูตเต่าดำข้างล่างอ้างว่าตัวเองมาจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ หรือว่า...

column2: Don't force me to kill you to keep you quiet.
column3: อย่าบังคับให้ข้าปิดปากเจ้าล่ะ

column2: Breaking into your room was my fault, but you didn't have to start fighting right away.
column3: บุกเข้าห้องผู้อื่นมาก็เป็นความผิดข้าเอง แต่เจ้าก็ไม่เห็นต้องท้าต่อยตีทันทีสักหน่อย

column2: Ahem, your martial arts style is not from the Holy Fire Sect, you should not be from the Holy Fire Sect.
column3: อะแฮ่ม วรยุทธของเจ้าไม่ใช่วิชาของนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ เจ้าไม่ได้มาจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์นี่

column2: What if I were from the Holy Fire Sect?
column3: แล้วจะทำไมถ้าข้ามาจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์จริงๆ?

column2: Then it would be either you die or I die.
column3: ถ้าอย่างนั้นไม่เจ้าก็ข้าต้องตายกันไปข้าง

column2: Do you have any grudges against the Holy Fire Sect?
column3: เจ้าไปบาดหมางอะไรกับนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์มา?

column2: This has nothing to do with you.
column3: เรื่องนี้ไม่เกี่ยวข้องกับเจ้า

column2: The Xuanwu Envoy downstairs claims to be from the Holy Fire Sect, could it be...
column3: ทูตเต่าดำข้างล่างอ้างว่าตัวเองมาจากนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ หรือว่า...

column2: They are after me, but they don't know my identity yet, I'm still safe for now.
column3: พวกมันตามล่าข้า แต่พวกมันยังไม่รู้ตัวตนข้าตอนนี้ ข้ายังปลอดภัยอยู่

column2: You're seriously injured, if you don't heal soon, your injuries will get worse.
column3: เจ้าบาดเจ็บหนักนี่ ถ้าไม่รีบรักษา อาการคงแย่ลงหนักแน่

column2: Time is of the essence for me, I can't afford any delay, besides, ordinary doctors can't treat my injuries.
column3: เวลาของข้าเป็นเงินเป็นทอง ข้าช้าไม่ได้แล้ว อีกอย่างหมอทั่วไปรักษาอาการข้าไม่ได้หรอก

column2: (If I think of a way, maybe I can heal his injuries)
column3: (ลองคิดดู บางทีข้าอาจรักษาเขาได้)

column2: I'm proficient in medical skills, let me try to heal your injuries.
column3: ข้าเชี่ยวชาญการแพทย์ ให้ข้าลองรักษาดู

column2: A dead horse is better than a live horse doctor, anyway, the situation can't be worse than it is now.
column3: คงไม่มีอะไรเลวร้ายได้กว่านี้แล้ว เจ้าลองดูคงไม่เสียหาย

column2: One shichen later...
column3: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา...

column2: It's indeed the Healing Hands technique, such severe injuries can actually be healed!
column3: ช่างเป็นวิชาหัตถ์หมอเทวดาโดยแท้ แผลหนักขนาดนี้กลับรักษาได้!

column2: Your injury is not difficult to treat, I have a method to try.
column3: บาดแผลเจ้าไม่อยากจะรักษา ข้ามีวิธีอยู่

column2: A dead horse is better than a live horse doctor, anyway, the situation can't be worse than it is now.
column3: คงไม่มีอะไรเลวร้ายได้กว่านี้แล้ว เจ้าลองดูคงไม่เสียหาย

column2: One shichen later...
column3: หนึ่งชั่วยามต่อมา...

column2: You actually used your MP to heal me, this, this...
column3: เจ้าใช้ลมปราณของเจ้ารักษาข้า นี่... จ..เจ้า...

column2: Your injury is not difficult to heal, I have a pill here that can be tried.
column3: บาดแผลเจ้าไม่อยากจะรักษา ข้าพอมียาเม็ดนี้อยู่

column2: A dead horse is better than a live horse doctor, anyway, the situation can't be worse than it is now.
column3: คงไม่มีอะไรเลวร้ายได้กว่านี้แล้ว เจ้าลองดูคงไม่เสียหาย

column2: A moment later...
column3: สักครู่ต่อมา...

column2: What kind of medicine did you give me, it's so effective!
column3: เจ้าให้ยาอะไรข้ามา ยอดเยี่ยมจริงๆ!

column2: It's just a mere Heavenly Fragrance Life-Extending Pill.
column3: ก็แค่โอสถหอมรักษาสวรรค์ธรรมดา

column2: For the favor of healing and saving my life, Shi Wenxiu has nothing to repay, only this manual can be given to repay your great kindness.
column3: เพื่อตอบแทนที่ท่านช่วยชีวิตข้าไว้ สือเหวินซิ่วผู้นี้ไม่มีสิ่งใดตอบแทน มีเพียงตำราวรยุทธเล่มนี้ที่อาจพอตอบแทนท่านได้

column2: Frozen Heart Palm, Shi Wenxiu, you've hidden your identity well!
column3: ฝ่ามือใจน้ำแข็ง สือเหวินซิ่ว เจ้าปกปิดตัวตนได้ดียิ่งนัก!

column2: Alas, my identity has been exposed after all.
column3: ให้ตายเถอะ ตัวตนของข้าก็ถูกเปิดเผยจนได้

column2: Hand over the things and I'll spare your life.
column3: มอบสิ่งของมาแล้วข้าจะไว้ชีวิตเจ้า

column2: Hmph, there's no one in the Cold Skin Gang who fears death!
column3: ฮึ่ม ไม่มีใครในพรรคมังสาเหมันต์ ที่กลัวตาย!

column2: I wonder if you can still be so tough later.
column3: งั้นมาดูกันว่า หลังจากนี้เจ้ายังอวดเก่งแบบนี้ได้อีกไหม

column2: Which side should I help in this situation?
column3: ในสถานการณ์เช่นนี้ ข้าควรช่วยฝ่ายไหนดี?

column2: Xuanwu Envoy, this person is not easy to deal with, let me provide Combat Support.
column3: ทูตเต่าดำ บุคคลนี้ไม่ใช่จัดการได้โดยง่าย ให้ข้าช่วยท่านสู้เอง

column2: Good, don't let him escape!
column3: ดี อย่าปล่อยให้มันหนีไปได้!

column2: This thing is indeed on him, this trip is not in vain.
column3: เป็นตามที่คิดไว้ ของสิ่งนี้อยู่กับเขา ในที่สุดการเดินทางครั้งนี้ก็ไม่ไร้ประโยชน์

column2: What are you looking for?
column3: เจ้ากำลังมองหาอะไร?

column2: This thing has no Relations with you, you don't need to inquire.\nHowever, you have helped me a lot. If you come to the Holy Fire Sect one day, I can recommend you.
column3: สิ่งนี้ไม่เกี่ยวกับเจ้า เจ้าไม่จำเป็นต้องรู้\nแต่อย่างไรก็ตาม วันนี้เจ้าช่วยข้าได้มาก ถ้าวันหนึ่งเจ้ามาที่นิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ ข้าสามารถแนะนำเจ้าได้

column2: This person is not easy to deal with, let me provide Combat Support.
column3: บุคคลนี้ไม่ใช่จัดการได้โดยง่าย ให้ข้าช่วยท่านสู้เอง

column2: Thank you.
column3: ขอบใจเจ้าแล้ว

column2: The Holy Fire Sect would never expect that their Xuanwu Envoy would die here.
column3: นิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ไม่เคยคาดคิดว่า ทูตเต่าดำของพวกเขาจะจบชีวิตลงที่นี่

column2: Aren't you afraid of causing trouble for the Innkeeper by killing the Xuanwu Envoy here?
column3: เจ้าไม่กลัวที่จะสร้างปัญหาให้กับเจ้าของโรงเตี๊ยมด้วยการสังหารทูตเต่าดำที่นี่หรือ?

column2: If she can run an inn in the Western Regions, she is not an ordinary woman, don't underestimate her.
column3: หากนางสามารถเปิดโรงเตี๊ยมในแดนตะวันตกได้ นางต้องไม่ใช่สตรีธรรมดาแน่ อย่าประมาทนาง

column2: If it weren't for the young hero's help this time, Shi Wenxiu might never have been able to leave this room. Young hero's great kindness, Shi Wenxiu will remember in his heart.
column3: หากไม่ได้รับความช่วยเหลือจากจอมยุทธ์น้อยในครั้งนี้ สือเหวินซิ่วคงไม่สามารถออกจากห้องนี้ไปได้ ความมีน้ำใจอันยิ่งใหญ่ของจอมยุทธ์น้อย สือเหวินซิ่วจะจดจำไว้ชั่วชีวิต

column2: Brother Shi, you're too kind, it's just a helping hand.
column3: พี่สือ ท่านกล่าวเกินไป ข้าแค่ช่วยท่านเล็กๆ น้อยๆ

column2: If you ever go to Flame City in the future, be sure to come to Cold Skin Gang, I will recommend you to the big brother.
column3: จากนี้ไปหากเจ้ามาที่เมืองอัคคี อย่าลืมแวะมาที่พรรคมังสาเหมันต์ ข้าจะแนะนำให้เจ้ารู้จักกับพี่ใหญ่ของข้า

column2: This thing is indeed on him, this trip is not in vain.
column3: เป็นตามที่คิดไว้ ของสิ่งนี้อยู่กับเขา ในที่สุดการเดินทางครั้งนี้ก็ไม่ไร้ประโยชน์

column2: The Holy Fire Sect would never expect that their Xuanwu Envoy would die here.
column3: นิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ไม่เคยคาดคิดว่า ทูตเต่าดำของพวกเขาจะจบชีวิตลงที่นี่

column2: {PlayerSurName} Brother, what are you doing?
column3: น้อง{PlayerSurName} เจ้ากำลังทำอะไร?

column2: The inn is short of hands, I'm helping to deliver food.
column3: โรงเตี๊ยมขาดแคลนคนช่วย ข้าเลยมาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: This inn really doesn't appreciate, they actually treat you like a Clerk.
column3: โรงเตี๊ยมนี้ไม่เห็นคุณค่ากันจริงๆ พวกเขาปฏิบัติต่อเจ้าเหมือนเสี่ยวเอ้อจริงๆ

column2: It's okay, I'm free anyway.
column3: ไม่เป็นไร ยังไงข้าก็ว่างอยู่แล้ว

column2: {PlayerSurName} Brother personally delivers food, I must give face.
column3: น้องชาย{PlayerSurName} มาเสิร์ฟอาหารด้วยตัวเอง ข้าควรไว้หน้าเขา

column2: (Takes the food and starts eating)
column3: (รับอาหารแล้วเริ่มกินทันที)

column2: What are you trying to do?
column3: เจ้าคิดจะทำอะไร?

column2: The inn is short of hands, I'm helping to deliver food.
column3: โรงเตี๊ยมขาดแคลนคนช่วย ข้าเลยมาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: I'm not used to eating food from Strangers.
column3: ข้าไม่กินอาหารจากคนแปลกหน้า

column2: Are you afraid that the inn has Poisoned you, or that I have Poisoned you?
column3: เจ้ากลัวโรงเตี๊ยมหรือข้าจะวางยาเจ้ารึไง?

column2: In the martial arts world, one must be careful.
column3: ในยุทธภพ ไม่ว่าผู้ใดก็ต้องระวังไว้ก่อน

column2: Whatever, eat or not, it's up to you.
column3: ก็แล้วแต่ เจ้าจะกินไม่กินก็แล้วแต่เจ้า

column2: So, young hero {PlayerSurName}, you are worried about my safety and plan to guard outside the door?
column3: แปลว่าท่านจอมยุทธน้อย{PlayerSurName} กังวลความปลอดภัยของข้าเลยตั้งใจจะป้องกันอยู่ด้านหน้าประตูสินะ?

column2: I'm just wandering around, checking for any safety hazards. Seeing that you're okay, I'm relieved.
column3: ข้าเพียงแค่ตรวจรอบๆเท่านั้น ดูว่าอาจมีอันตรายอะไรไหม ท่านไม่เป็นอะไร ข้าก็โล่งใจแล้ว

column2: Thank you for your concern, young hero {PlayerSurName}.
column3: ขอบคุณท่านจอมยุทธน้อย ในความเป็นห่วงของท่านมาก

column2: We meet again, you didn't get lost in the desert, you're really lucky.
column3: เจอกันอีกแล้ว เจ้าไม่หลงทางในทะเลทราย โชคดีจริงๆ

column2: Thanks to you, it's just a desert, it can't bury me.
column3: ขอบใจมาก มันก็แค่ทะเลทราย ฝังข้าไม่ได้หรอก

column2: Hmph, the road ahead is long, without guidance, you can only return to the Central Plains.
column3: ฮึ่ม ทางข้างหน้านั้นยาวไกล หากไม่มีการนำทาง เจ้าทำได้เพียงกลับไปยังจงหยวนเท่านั้น

column2: There will be a way when the car reaches the mountain, you don't need to worry.
column3: ต้องมีทางก่อน รถถึงจะผ่านภูเขาได้ เจ้าไม่ต้องกังวล

column2: What are you doing?
column3: เจ้ากำลังทำอะไร?

column2: The inn is short of hands, I'm helping to deliver food.
column3: โรงเตี๊ยมขาดแคลนคนช่วย ข้าเลยมาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: You're my hired Bodyguard, but you're helping others. Do you still want your salary?
column3: เจ้าเป็นคนคุ้มภัยที่ข้าจ้างมาแต่ดันไปช่วยคนอื่นเนี่ยนะ ยังอยากได้เงินอยู่ไหมฮะ?

column2: It's just a helping hand, besides, you're not in danger now, you don't need protection.
column3: ข้าแค่ช่วยผู้อื่นเล็กๆน้อยๆเท่านั้น อีกอย่างรอบๆนี้ไม่มีอันตรายใดๆ ท่านไม่ต้องการคุ้มภัยแน่นหนาขนาดนั้น

column2: That's not acceptable!
column3: ข้ายอมรับไม่ได้อยู่ดี!

column2: Let me tell you, I hired you as my Bodyguard, you must protect me at all times, you can only follow my arrangements, otherwise you won't get a penny of the remaining salary!
column3: ข้าบอกเจ้าไว้ก่อน ข้าจ้างเจ้ามาเป็นผู้คุ้มภัย หน้าที่ของเจ้าคือต้องปกป้องข้าทุกฝีก้าว เจ้าต้องเชื่อฟังข้าแต่เพียงผู้เดียว  ถ้าไม่เช่นนั้นข้าจะไม่จ่ายค่าจ้างที่เหลือให้เจ้าแม้แต่อีแปะเดียว!

column2: I've brought you the food, eat or not, it's up to you.
column3: ข้าเพียงเอาอาหารมาให้ท่าน จะกินไม่กินก็เรื่องของท่าน

column2: Yo, what is the great hero doing?
column3: ไง ท่านจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่กำลังทำอะไรอยู่?

column2: The inn is short of hands, I'm helping to deliver food.
column3: โรงเตี๊ยมขาดแคลนคนช่วย ข้าเลยมาส่งอาหารให้แทนโรงครัว

column2: I thought you were so noble, but it seems a Coin can stump a hero.\nEven if you have great skills, you still end up running errands and delivering food.
column3: ข้าคิดว่าท่านสูงส่งดังพวกขุนนาง แต่ดูเหมือนว่าเงินก็ทำให้จอมยุทธ์สะดุดได้\nแม้ว่าท่านจะมีฝีมือที่ยอดเยี่ยมแค่ไหน แต่ท่านก็ยังต้องไปทำงานแบกห่าม และวิ่งบริการอาหารอยู่ดี

column2: I've brought you the food, eat or not, it's up to you.
column3: ข้าเพียงเอาอาหารมาให้ท่าน จะกินไม่กินก็เรื่องของท่าน

column2: Tell me honestly, who are you and why are you coming to the Western Regions?
I, I was telling the truth just now.
Your eyes were evasive when you spoke, you must have lied.
Let me tell you, I don't have much patience!
I swear I didn't lie to you, I'm just here in the Western Regions to trade tea, sob sob sob...
You're quite stubborn! The Azure Dragon Envoy has ordered, better to kill a thousand by mistake than to let one go!
(How dare they commit murder in the inn, there's no law and order at all, should I save this Merchant?)
Just pretend you didn't see anything.
Ah--
{yell} Stop!
Kid, are you sure you want to meddle in the affairs of the Holy Fire Sect?
Can the Holy Fire Sect act lawlessly and kill people at will? I must intervene in this matter!
Hmph, you dare to confront me, the Black Tortoise Envoy, you do have some skills.
I was just testing him just now, not really trying to take his life, it seems he is not the one we are looking for, sorry for the disturbance.
{PlayerSurName} Young Hero, thanks to your timely arrival, otherwise I would have lost my life here, I'm lucky to have you as my Bodyguard.
What did he ask you just now, why did you lie?
He asked me what I was doing in the Western Regions, I said I was selling Tea leaf...
He asked me how much money I could make from a cart of Tea leaf, I thought he was eyeing my goods, so I lied to him that it wasn't worth much, just enough to make ends meet...
He then concluded that I was not really here to trade tea, but had other plans in the Western Regions.
{PlayerSurName} Young Hero, thanks to your timely arrival, otherwise I would have lost my life here.
What did he ask you just now, why did you lie?
He asked me what I was doing in the Western Regions, I said I was selling Tea leaf...
He asked me how much money I could make from a cart of Tea leaf, I thought he was eyeing my goods, so I lied to him that it wasn't worth much, just enough to make ends meet...
He then concluded that I was not really here to trade tea, but had other plans in the Western Regions.
I must repay you for saving my life, if that guy comes to provoke again, you must protect me.
There are Coin characters on this stone wall! The Coin characters here seem a bit strange.
Didn't expect it, did you? This is the Flame Toad Technique I've learned!
Years ago, I accidentally entered this place and found Coin characters on the wall, unexpectedly it turned out to be a highly sophisticated internal strength method.
After practicing this method, I truly transformed and my strength increased day by day.
Since this technique is so magical, I want to make a rubbing of it and take it back for further study.
A moment later...
It seems to be an internal strength method that records a special way of circulating Qi.
This technique is engraved in such a hidden place, it must be extraordinary!\nI want to make a rubbing of it and take it back for further study.
A moment later...
Why is the Black Tortoise Envoy leisurely strolling in Flame City?
It's you, kid, I thought it was those annoying flies from the Cold Skin Gang.
Come, have a few drinks with me, you're paying today!
What's going on, no one is here to greet us!
Black Tortoise Envoy, please calm down, it seems that the Tavern Owner is not here, why don't we drink another day?
I insist on drinking today, if no one comes, I'll overturn this wine stall!
I was wondering who was so lawless and didn't put the Cold Skin Gang in their eyes, turns out it's the Black Tortoise Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect.
Hmph, a few small shrimps from the Cold Skin Gang dare to shout in front of me, call your leader named Huo, that would be more like it.

The Cold Skin Gang and the Holy Fire Sect don't interfere with each other, if the Black Tortoise Envoy intends to disrupt the relations between the two factions, I'm afraid you can't afford the consequences when your sect leader investigates.
Don't pressure me with the sect leader, I don't believe in this superstition today!
{PlayerName}, do you want to join me in teaching these little brats from the Cold Skin Gang a lesson?
(If I fight the Cold Skin Gang in Flame City, wouldn't that be openly opposing the Cold Skin Gang, how should I respond?)
Hmph, you spineless coward!
Well, I can't drink today and I'm pissed off, so you guys are just unlucky!

The Cold Skin Gang Disciples are no match for Ren Zhongheng, they were beaten to broken bones in no time.\nRen Zhongheng looked at you with disdain before he left, seemingly very contemptuous of your choice just now.
Heh, now that's a real man.
The Cold Skin Gang Disciples are no match for you, they were beaten to broken bones in no time, and your hatred with the Cold Skin Gang deepened as a result.
Didn't get to drink, it's all because of these guys ruining the mood.\nIt's getting late, I need to hurry back to the Holy Fire Sect to avoid punishment.
What's going on, no one is here to greet us!
May I know what kind of drink the two guests would like?
Stop talking nonsense, bring up the best wine you have, the kid next to me will pay.
Alright~
Here are your drinks, please enjoy.
(Takes a sip of the drink on the table)
{yell} Bah, you dare to fool me with plain water!
How dare I deceive the guest, this is indeed the best drink in our shop.
If I say it's plain water, it's plain water. You dare to talk back, believe it or not, I'll flip your stall!
So it's Vice Sect Master {PlayerSurName}, I, I... I was... a bit... craving for wine... so...
As one of the Four Holy Envoys of the Holy Fire Sect, you dare to leave your post and come to Flame City for a drink in broad daylight!
I know I was wrong, please punish me, Vice Sect Leader.
You are one of the Four Holy Envoys after all, I have to save some face for you.\nThis will not happen again, you must return to the sect immediately, no more unauthorized outings!
Thank you, Vice Sect Leader {PlayerSurName}, for your mercy.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, would you like to join me for a few drinks at the tavern?
Then I won't bother you, Brother {PlayerSurName}, as you wish.
When I first came to the Western Regions, I wanted to make a fortune like other merchants, but I was robbed on the way, lost all my goods, and barely escaped with my life.
The Western Regions are full of endless deserts. Although I didn't die at the hands of the robbers, I almost got lost and died in the desert.
A passing group of people on horses saved me and took me to a village for treatment. This village was the predecessor of Flame City, and the leader of the group was Huo Shilou.

The leader saw that I was homeless and arranged for me to do some chores in the Cold Skin Gang. He told me that I could leave at any time if I wanted to go home. At that time, I had not yet joined the Cold Skin Gang.
He Denuo told you many stories about his life before joining the Cold Skin Gang...
column3: เหอเต๋อนัวเล่าเรื่องมากมายให้เจ้าฟังก่อนจะเข้าร่วมพรรคมังสาเหมันต์...

column2: It's too late today, I'll tell you my story another time.
Because I don't have any special skills, running away from the protection of the Cold Skin Gang would mean death anywhere. So I officially joined the Cold Skin Gang and became an outer disciple.

As an outer disciple, I witnessed the growth of the Cold Skin Gang. Under the leadership of the leader, everyone built walls and cities around the village. After several renovations, Flame City has reached its current scale.
There are many talents in the Cold Skin Gang. Like me, who has no special skills, I can barely make ends meet. Everyone dares to bully me, and all the dirty and tiring work is left to me.
He Denuo told you the story of how he was bullied in the Cold Skin Gang...
column3: เหอเต๋อนัวเล่าเรื่องราวการถูกรังแกในพรรคมังสาเหมันต์...

column2: It's too late today, I'll tell you my story another time.
Before joining the Cold Skin Gang, my biggest wish was to survive in the Western Regions; after joining, I wanted to live better!

I was accidentally bitten by a Flame Toad in the Western Regions, and was poisoned. I was in critical condition. I struggled to crawl back to the Cold Skin Gang hoping for treatment, but those who usually bullied me were afraid of being infected, so they hired someone to throw me into the desert to fend for myself.
Fortunately, I was lucky enough to survive in the desert, and I was able to endure the Flame Toad poison, so I didn't die from it.

When the gang leader heard that I was thrown into the desert, he personally led people to search for me. I had given up hope for the Cold Skin Gang, but from the moment the Master helped me up from the ground, I didn't find the Cold Skin Gang so annoying.
The Flame Toad poison in my body tormented me every day at first, but now it has become my unique self-defense technique, which is a blessing in disguise.
He Denuo tells you about his story of how he improved his skills after a series of adventures, then was heavily used by the Master, and finally became the fourth leader of the Cold Skin Gang...
column3: เหอเต๋อนัวเล่าให้เจ้าฟังถึงเรื่องราวที่ฝีมือของเขาพัฒนาขึ้นอย่างมากหลังจากประสบกับการผจญภัยมาหลายครั้ง จากนั้นเขาก็ถูกหัวหน้าพรรคใช้งานอย่างหนัก และในที่สุดก็กลายเป็นผู้นำคนที่สี่ของพรรคมังสาเหมันต์...

column2: It's too late today, I'll tell you my story another time.

In a place like the Western Regions, it's the law of the jungle. Whoever has the hardest fist and the hardest heart can live longer. Morality and justice will only lead to a place where there is no burial.

The Cold Skin Gang started by robbing houses and looting. After the gang leader saw the scale of Flame City, he strictly forbade gang members from looting and killing for money. Isn't this cutting off the brothers' livelihood?

The reason why the gang leader built a city and surrounded the village was because he found the rare treasure Blood Jewel in the Flame Sand Cave, and he didn't want to share it with other forces. Now he strictly forbids the continued mining of Blood Jewel, just so he can enjoy it alone.
He Denuo tells you about his many dissatisfactions with Huo Shilou's actions...
column3: เหอเต๋อนัวเล่าให้เจ้าฟังเกี่ยวกับความไม่พอใจมากมายของเขาต่อการกระทำของฮั่วซื่อเหล่า...

column2: {PlayerSurName} brother, I want to ask you, do you agree with my views?
(How should I answer his question?)
There is no future in working with such unkind, selfish people.
After all, the gang leader saved my life. If I leave him, it would be heartbreaking.
The contributions you have made over the years can already repay the kindness of the day. He is not your biological parent, there is no need to take care of him in his old age.
Back then, I was suffering from Flame Toad poison, and only the gang leader didn't despise me. He kept me working in the Cold Skin Gang, and later made me the fourth leader.
Isn't it because your skills are outstanding that he used the position of the fourth leader to win you over?
Looking back, the gang leader has been good to me...
If it weren't for your rapid improvement in skills due to a series of adventures, would Huo Shilou still treat you differently if you were as ordinary as before?
This...
With your skills, you will be valued wherever you go. A man should stand tall and upright, why should you compromise so much.
Well, I see.
Drink a few more cups with me tonight, there may not be many such opportunities in the future.
That night, neither of you said much, just drank until you were drunk.

In the lawless Western Regions, although you survive by strength, if you fight and kill every day, how can you ensure that you won't age, your skills won't decline, and you won't be killed by other forces?
Seize the opportunity when our forces are strong and sweep all other forces to become the true ruler of the Western Regions. Who dares to oppose the Cold Skin Gang then!
The Cold Skin Gang has made enemies everywhere, and all forces are attacking together. Do you think a mere Flame City can hold them off?
The conflicts have been going on for years without any rest. Once the war starts, how will you supply all the necessary resources? How will you replenish the lost Disciples?
Why make it so complicated? Whoever doesn't submit, just kill them all the way, and everything will be clear!
The Cold Skin Gang and the Holy Fire Sect have been in a stalemate in the Western Regions for many years, and neither can do anything about the other. How do you explain that?
This...
In any case, I see no future in working with such unkind, selfish people.
The leader's decision to let you rest and stop the killing is a great act of kindness and righteousness. Besides, he saved your life. If you abandon him, wouldn't it be heartbreaking?
He's not my real parents. I don't need to take care of him in his old age. Besides, the merits I've earned over the years have long since paid off.
The leader didn't mind that you were afflicted with Flame Toad Venom and promoted you to the fourth leader. This is also a favor to you.
I fought my way up with my own abilities. He just used the sweet position of the fourth leader to win me over.
I thought you were a good man, but your words today make me think you're the selfish, self-righteous one.
Who do you think you are to scold me!
Are you angry because I disagreed with you? Come on, let me wake up this ungrateful fool!
You were seriously injured and unconscious. When you woke up, He Denuo was already gone.
column3: เจ้าได้รับบาดเจ็บสาหัสและหมดสติ เมื่อเจ้าตื่นเหอเต๋อนัวก็จากไปแล้ว

column2: I didn't do anything wrong, I didn't do anything wrong!
You're not satisfied with being the fourth leader with your abilities, don't you think it's the leader who's promoting you?
You think you're so great? You can't take a few punches and kicks in front of me. What's there to be arrogant about?
{yell} Stop talking, stop talking!
He Denuo covered his face and fled in panic, no longer the confident and arrogant person he was before.
column3: เหอเต๋อนัว ปิดหน้าและหลบหนีไปด้วยความตื่นตระหนกไม่ใช่คนมั่นใจและหยิ่งผยองเหมือนเมื่อก่อนอีกต่อไป

column2: Kid, we're short of hands right now. It's a great opportunity for you to show your loyalty to our sect.

The Cold Skin Gang and the Holy Fire Sect have always been at odds. Now they dare to establish a branch under the eyes of the Holy Fire Sect! You go and destroy this branch of the Cold Skin Gang to prove your loyalty to our sect.
This is a branch of the Cold Skin Gang. Without the Master's order, no one is allowed to enter!
You can go back to the Holy Fire Sect and report to Xuanwu.
Hmm, well done.
Xuanwu, I've completed the task you assigned me.
Deputy Sect Leader, you're too hard on yourself. How could you do such a thing yourself?
By doing it myself, it shows my unwavering loyalty to the Holy Fire Sect.
The Deputy Sect Leader is loyal and straightforward. If anyone dares to question you, they are my enemy, Ren Zhongheng!
{PlayerSurName} Brother, you must be a master swordsman. I have a sword move that I would like to ask for your advice.
(How should I respond?)
{PlayerSurName} Brother, if you are interested in the future, I am always ready to accompany you.
This battle has indeed given me a lot of inspiration. {PlayerSurName} Brother, if you have free time in the future, I would like to learn more from you.
It seems that my swordsmanship still has many shortcomings. I would like to present you with a sword manual, hoping that {PlayerSurName} brother can give me some advice.
I have an unreasonable request and hope that {PlayerSurName} brother can help me.
There is an <color=#c44b0e>arrogant and cold swordsman</color> on Bailing Mountain in the Southwest region, he is my sworn enemy, his existence is like a thorn in my side!
Due to some special reasons, I can't take action directly, I hope {PlayerSurName} brother can help me.
On Bailing Mountain, the arrogant and cold swordsman, isn't he Yan Luochong?
column3: บนภูเขาไป่หลิง มือกระบี่ผู้เย่อหยิ่งและเย็นชา เขาคือเยี่ยนหลัวจงใช่ไหม?

column2: Isn't he the White Tiger Envoy of the Holy Fire Sect?
The White Tiger Envoy has defected from the Holy Fire Sect many years ago, and now he has no relations with the Holy Fire Sect.
Hmm, I've noted down the task you've assigned.
Bailing Mountain, the arrogant and cold swordsman...
Hmm, I've noted down the task you've assigned.
Someone has hired me to take your life!
I don't know how many people who wanted to take my life have been buried in this Bailing Mountain, and you won't be an exception today!
Cough, I didn't expect that I, the White Tiger Envoy, would end up like this.
Feng'er, I'm sorry, I can't fulfill my promise to you...
I've completed the task you assigned.
With the help of {PlayerSurName} brother, there's nothing to worry about in the future!
If {PlayerSurName} brother can recommend me as the deputy sect leader in the future, I will reveal to you the secret of our sect - the manufacturing process of the Exploding Thunder Bullet.
If you and I join hands one day, there's nothing to worry about in dominating the martial arts world!
I will do my best.
Greetings to the Deputy Sect Leader.
{PlayerSurName} brother is indeed a man of his word. This Exploding Thunder Bullet is a secret of our sect. Today, I give it to {PlayerSurName} brother, which shows my sincerity.
{PlayerSurName} young hero is promising, I have a favor to ask, I wonder if you can help me?
Let's hear it, if it's a reasonable request, I will definitely fulfill your wish.

The Cold Skin Gang has been increasingly strict in guarding the Flame Sand Cave. I have tried several times to send people to sneak into the Flame Sand Cave to investigate, but they all failed. So, I would like to ask you to go and investigate.
I'll give it a try, and I'll let you know when I have news.
I will be waiting for your good news.
I've been to the Flame Sand Cave before, it's a piece of cake for me to get in.
You tell Feng Xuanji about the situation in the Flame Sand Cave in detail.
{PlayerSurName} young hero has solved a big problem for me. With the information you provided, I can prepare for the next steps.
I've been to the Flame Sand Cave, it's a piece of cake for me to get in.
You tell Feng Xuanji about the situation in the Flame Sand Cave in detail.
{PlayerSurName} young hero has solved a big problem for me. With the information you provided, I can prepare for the next steps.
So this is what the Flame Sand Cave looks like! I wonder where the rumored Blood Jewel can be found.
So this is the Blood Jewel, I finally saw it with my own eyes! I wonder what effect it will have after use.
Today, I received a pigeon message from my good sister, a group of unknown people are trying to take over the Chang'an Inn, I can't spare any time, I ask the young hero to go and help.
Your good sister... could it be Haitang Qiu, the Sea Innkeeper?
Indeed, if the young hero could help her through this crisis, I would be eternally grateful.
I am also acquainted with the Sea Innkeeper, I will definitely help.
The situation is dire, Chang'an Inn has been surrounded by unidentified people!\nShould I rush in to save them?
Kill all who approach!
I wonder how Haitang Qiu is doing now, I need to hurry into the inn to check!
Haitang Qiu, today Chang'an Inn is surrounded by us from all sides, there will be no reinforcements, you might as well surrender.
I've been running this Chang'an Inn for so long, I've weathered all kinds of storms, you few people think you can scare me!
Yes, you've been running this Chang'an Inn for a long time, it's time for a change.\nDon't think that just because you have Feng Xuanji in the Holy Fire Sect protecting you, you can rest easy.
You don't even regard the Holy Fire Sect?
Feng Xuanji is in danger herself, you still expect her to save you? Dream on!
If the Suzaku envoy can't come, I can.
{PlayerName}, it's you!
Innkeeper, rest assured, I will take care of these guys for you.
Such arrogance!
Let's find out.
I didn't expect you to save me again...
I happened to be entrusted by the Suzaku envoy, luckily I arrived in time.
How is Sister Feng, just now that person said Sister Feng is also in danger?
The Suzaku envoy may be encountering some troubles, that's why she asked me to come and rescue you because she couldn't spare the time.
Young hero {PlayerSurName} is highly skilled, I believe you are someone Sister Feng can trust, thank you for protecting her.
The dignified Holy Fire Sect's Suzaku envoy shouldn't need me to worry about her.
She's not having a good time in the Holy Fire Sect, many people don't take her seriously, even want to get rid of her, you must warn her to be careful.
Hmm, I will remind her, you also take care.
You recount the events at Chang'an Inn to Feng Xuanji.
I can already guess who is behind this operation.
Who is it?
This matter involves too much, I don't want the young hero to get involved.\nThanks to the young hero's righteous rescue, my good sister was able to escape from danger.
You also be careful, I heard that there are many crises in the Holy Fire Sect, which is not good for you.
I have my own way to deal with it, thank you for your concern, young hero.
I have one last favor to ask of {PlayerSurName} brother, if this matter is successful, my position in the Holy Fire Sect will be secure, and I will be the only choice for the next sect leader.
The things you ask me to do are getting more and more complicated, what benefits will I get in the end?
After the matter is done, I will give you the sect's token, the Flame Seal, with this token, you will have power comparable to mine!
Tell me, what do you want me to do?
The Suzaku envoy Feng Xuanji is my last obstacle in the Holy Fire Sect, I want you to... (gesture of slitting throat)
Aren't you afraid that the Holy Fire Sect will lose its talents, and when you take the position, there will be no one to use?
Those who are not willing to serve me wholeheartedly, it's better to get rid of them early to avoid future troubles.
You are really ruthless. I wonder when I will become your obstacle and then you will get rid of me too.
{PlayerSurName} is my right-hand man in achieving my ambitions, how could I destroy my own Great Wall?
I hope your words are true.\nI have noted down the task you assigned.
Zhuque Envoy, I'm sorry, someone has commissioned me to take your life.
I've calculated everything, but I didn't expect Gu Qing Yang to send you. He must have offered you great benefits.
I've always wanted to personally test {PlayerSurName} young hero's skills, why not take this opportunity to fulfill my wish.
Okay, I promise you.
Flowers bloom and fade, life is but a dream...
Half a lifetime of drifting, finally free...
With Zhuque fallen, Brother Gu can rest easy from now on.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, please accept the Flame Seal. From now on, you are my trusted aide. In the Holy Fire Sect, you are only second to me and the sect leader.
Now the Holy Fire Sect is in internal and external troubles, I'm walking on thin ice every day, not knowing when I won't be able to see the sunrise of the next day.
You've been operating in the Holy Fire Sect for many years, don't you have any trusted aides to help you?
There is one candidate, but he's not in the Holy Fire Sect, distant water can't quench immediate thirst.
As long as I can help you, I will find him even if he's at the ends of the earth.
Thank you, young hero.

There is an <color=#c44b0e>arrogant and cold swordsman</color> on Bailing Mountain in the Southwest region, he is one of the Four Holy Envoys of the Holy Fire Sect. If he comes back, no one in the Holy Fire Sect would dare to touch me!
This man is stubborn, you alone may not be able to persuade him to come back. Show him my token, and tell him that I'm asking him to come back to the Holy Fire Sect to help.
(It seems she doesn't know that he's already dead, Zhuque Envoy's information is not very accurate.)
It will take a lot of time to find someone in the vast sea of people, this won't be a short time.
I'm prepared to leave it to fate.
As long as he's still in this world, I will bring him to you personally.
My safety is all on this move.
Phoenix... Zhuque Envoy, I hope you're well...
You're finally back, it's good that you're back.
Don't worry, with me here, no one will dare to trouble you!
Phoenix... Zhuque Envoy, I hope you're well...
You're finally back, it's good that you're back.
Don't worry, with me here, no one will dare to trouble you!
I'll go to the main hall first to greet the old acquaintances, let them know that the White Tiger Envoy is back!

Although I have the help of the White Tiger Envoy, and I have the capital to compete with the Qinglong Envoy in the Holy Fire Sect, if the position of the Vice Sect Leader falls into the hands of others one day, I will still be in danger.
Is there a permanent solution?
Unless the young hero strives for the position of Vice Sect Leader, and personally takes refuge under the protection of the Vice Sect Leader, that would be a complete turn from danger to safety.
I will do my best.
Greetings to the Deputy Sect Leader.
My safety is now entirely entrusted to the Vice Sect Leader.
Zhuque Envoy, you're too serious, I will do my best to protect you, please get up quickly.

The Sect Leader has gone into seclusion, the Holy Fire Sect should respect the Vice Sect Leader from now on. This is a gift I specially prepared for the Vice Sect Leader, please accept it with a smile.
Holy Fire Divine Skill! Zhuque Envoy, you are bold and reckless, daring to privately copy the divine skill of our sect and teach it privately!

This Holy Fire Divine Skill is nominally only for the Sect Leader to practice, but the Vice Sect Leader is sooner or later the next Sect Leader of our sect, what's the difference between practicing it one day earlier or one day later.
Could it be that you're still harboring the ambition to become the deputy leader and succeed to the position of the leader one day?
Qinglong Envoy, it seems that you're quite bothered by me becoming the deputy leader, aren't you?
Humph, in the future, I will definitely report this to the leader and let him decide!
The leader of the Holy Fire Sect is currently in seclusion for cultivation, I wonder what consequences it would bring if I break in now...
{PlayerSurName} Deputy leader, this place is a forbidden area of our sect. Without the permission of our leader, no one is allowed to enter!
I have long admired the divine skill that the leader practices, and I hope that the leader will not hesitate to teach me.
You dare to covet the Vedas Scripture of our leader, you really are a wolf with wild ambitions!
This place is a forbidden area of our sect. Without the permission of our leader, anyone who enters without permission will die!
I have long admired the divine skill that the leader practices, and I hope that the leader will not hesitate to teach me.
How dare you covet the Vedas Scripture of our leader!
Fortunately, I was prepared for this. Today, I will definitely make you die without a burial place!
Let me see how much progress you have made now!
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, you have done what I wanted to do but didn't. Naturally, I will lend you a helping hand.
Feng Xuanji, our leader has trusted you so much, are you going to betray our leader now?
You really are a shameless wretch, hooking up with the White Tiger Envoy, and not even letting this pretty boy go.
I owe all my skills and knowledge to the years of cultivation by the Sect Leader, for which I am deeply grateful.
However, the Sect Leader forcibly took me into the Holy Fire Sect, causing the destruction of my family. This is something I will never forget!

Our leader originally thought that you had forgotten your hatred, seeing that you are decisive and outstanding in your actions, he gave you the position of Suzaku Envoy, allowing you to have your own place in the Holy Fire Sect.
Unexpectedly, you are waiting for the opportunity, always ready to take revenge.
Today, our leader is in a good mood, and will send you to reunite with your family, so you don't have to worry about it anymore.
Who dares to bully Feng'er, pass my level first!
Yan Luochong, since you are determined to die, our leader will fulfill you.
column3: เยี่ยนหลัวจง ในเมื่อเจ้ามุ่งมั่นที่จะตาย ผู้นำของเราจะทำให้เจ้าสมปราถนาเอง

column2:
Dominate the Western Regions, compete in the Central Plains, and finally turn into a dream.
The eyes of a generation of Western Region heroes are full of regret, unwillingness, and helplessness at the end.
At the peak, the once endless life force of the Holy Fire finally dimmed, until it turned into a wisp of smoke rising to the nine heavens.
The Holy Fire Sect is now in name only, and soon no one will mention the Holy Fire Sect.
It's like a stone thrown into the vast ocean, disappearing forever.
<size=250%><color=#E3170D>The Holy Fire Sect, destroyed!</color></size>
Young hero, you have helped me fulfill my wish this time. I have nothing to repay you in this life, so I can only give you this Manual that I once received from a stranger to express my gratitude.
The Holy Fire Sect no longer exists, and I will spend the rest of my life in Chang'an Inn.
Feng'er, wait for me!

Young hero, you have helped me a lot in the past, and this time you have helped me fulfill my wish. I have nothing to repay you, and I am willing to follow you to the ends of the earth for the rest of my life.
There is no vacancy in the young hero's team, I will wait for the young hero at Chang'an Inn at any time.
Feng'er...
The matter here is over, if you want to find me in the future, you can come to Bailing Mountain.
Feng'er...
Your White Tiger Envoy is here to accompany you.
A golden opportunity...
{yell}Fang Xiaoian, I've finally waited for this day. Today, I will avenge my deceased parents!
This place is dangerous, it's better for the young hero to stay away.
What's going on here, it seems that there are many people inside who are acting crazy?
These are all disciples of our sect who have used Blood Jewel recklessly, causing Qi Blood reversal, and become obsessed.
These people have lost their sanity and are hostile to anyone, very dangerous, so we guard this place to prevent people from entering by mistake.
The Master has sent people to seek medical advice everywhere, hoping to cure them as soon as possible, but unfortunately there has been no progress so far.
I am proficient in Medical, perhaps I can Heal these people's illnesses.
If you can really cure them, that would be great, but these people have lost their sanity, no one can get close to them.
Leave it to me, I'll calm them down.
Please be very careful!
Demon... it's a demon!|Kill, kill, kill!|Ha ha, ha ha ha--|You are Fang Xiaoian, give me your life!|
After subduing these Obsessed Disciples, start treating them one by one.\nOne shichen later...
Where... where is this...|Who am I...|Why does my whole body hurt...|What happened?|My head is so dizzy...
As expected of a master, even such complex diseases have been cured. These people have recovered their sanity and no longer need to be guarded.
We must report this great news to the Master.
The Holy Fire Sect has repeatedly opposed our gang, this time they have made an Assassin attempt on me, I can't swallow this!
{PlayerSurName} Brother, dare to accompany me to make a big fuss in the Holy Fire Sect, to vent our anger?
The second master is seriously injured and not healed, it is not appropriate to trouble the Holy Fire Sect at this time.
Stop beating around the bush like a maiden, I just want to ask you one question, do you dare to venture into the Holy Fire Sect with me?
(The second master is reckless, do you want to go with him to the Holy Fire Sect?)
Come find me when you're ready, I won't stop until I vent this anger.
That's the spirit, that's what a man should be!
Zi Tian is impulsive, without waiting for you to prepare, he drags you all the way to the Holy Fire Sect...
Who dares to break into the Holy Fire Sect!
Hehe, Zi Tian of the Cold Skin Gang is here to pay a visit!
So you're the second master of the Cold Skin Gang who was defeated by the Azure Dragon Envoy and fled.
Didn't catch you last time, this time you came to die?
The damn Azure Dragon Envoy only knows how to attack in the dark, I'm not afraid of him in a fair fight!
Call that bastard out, tell him, I'm here to avenge a sword!
Hmph, it's overkill to use a sledgehammer to crack a nut, there's no need for the Azure Dragon Envoy to deal with you.
Ah, you people from the Holy Fire Sect are always so confident, why do you always overlook my existence.
You must be the one who saved him before, today is a good day to take you both down!

You and Zi Tian caused a commotion in the Holy Fire Sect, seeing more and more people coming, a wise man knows better than to fight when the odds are against him, you both choose to quickly retreat to the Cold Skin Gang.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, it's been a long time since I had such a good fight!
That was really close just now, if we had delayed any longer, we might have provoked some powerful people, which we can't handle right now.
I found out in advance that the Azure Dragon Envoy happened to be away from the Holy Fire Sect today, how could I miss such a rare opportunity, as long as he doesn't show up, the rest are nothing.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, I had a Great first impression of you, we have been through life and death together, I have a palm technique that is passable, I'll give it to you.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, are you ready to go with me to make a big fuss in the Holy Fire Sect?
Relations are not familiar yet, don't bother her.
I didn't expect the deputy sect master to also have trouble sleeping at night, would you like to accompany me to enjoy the night view?
{PlayerSurName}Young hero, you seem to have some free time. Would you like to spend a little more time with me?
Oh, I'm being presumptuous.
The Western Regions are not like the Central Plains. All you can see here is endless sand and endless killing. Everything you see can take your life.
People born in such a place don't know if they can see the sun the next day when they go to bed every night, but everyone is still trying to live, living for the sake of living.
Naturally, I am no exception, growing up in such an environment...\nPerhaps dying young would have been a relief.

The Holy Fire Sect rose up in such a place, sweeping across the Western Regions with lightning speed, unstoppable. In order to continue expanding, the Holy Fire Sect looted people everywhere, not even sparing women and children.
It was then that I was forcibly taken to the Holy Fire Sect, and my parents died one after another in that looting...
Feng Xuanji recalls the sad past, her mood getting lower and lower...
I thought I was strong enough, but every time I think of the past, I still feel a heartache...
It's late at night, I must take my leave.
Last time you mentioned being brought here, what happened next?
After that...\nLike the other girls who were captured, I did a lot of hard chores, cleaning, washing clothes, cooking, etc.

The Holy Fire Sect has a large number of people, and these chores basically have to be done from the moment you open your eyes in the morning until you close your eyes at midnight. If you do well, you might get a moldy steamed bun to eat, if you don't do well...

In the cold winter months, we girls were dressed in patched-up rags, living in thatched huts with wind blowing in from all sides... I don't know how many sisters never woke up after they went to sleep...
One day, they asked us to infiltrate an enemy force of the Holy Fire Sect at the time, to remember their numbers, supplies, secret passages, etc., and then report back to the Holy Fire Sect quickly.
Under the cover of my sisters, I returned alone with the collected information. Since then, I have been taken away from my original residence and no longer have to do those chores.
In the new place, I only needed to do two things, learn how to kill and how to gather intelligence.

Years later, the sect leader wanted to select outstanding individuals from his disciples to serve as the Four Holy Envoys, to share the various affairs of the sect, a lofty position second only to the leader himself.

I didn't want to be at the mercy of others, I didn't want to be controlled by others, only by becoming superior to others could I get rid of others' control. So I participated in the selection, it was bloody and cruel all the way, but in the end, no one stopped me from becoming one of the Four Holy Envoys of the Holy Fire Sect, the Vermilion Bird Envoy.
Feng Xuanji becomes more and more excited as she speaks, as if that moment was the most glorious moment in her life...
Is my story boring? I've been talking about myself for so long, I'm really sorry.
I'm very willing to listen to your story.
Besides you, I really don't know who else I can talk to, the people around me are not trustworthy.
If you're willing to listen, I'll tell you more later.
Originally, my martial arts skills were not outstanding, even the newest disciples of the Holy Fire Sect were stronger than me.
No one in the Holy Fire Sect knows why my killing skills are improving day by day. They all think it's the result of my hard work and practice.
I'm only telling you this in secret, all these skills were honed from the disciples of the Holy Fire Sect. This is how I learned many secrets of the Holy Fire Sect, including the Treasure room...

The Treasure room contains manuals and divine weapons collected by the sect leader from various sects. I sneaked into the Treasure room when no one was guarding it, chose some manuals suitable for myself, copied them quietly, and practiced in secret.

In order not to arouse suspicion, I had to hide my cultivation. Therefore, many people mistakenly thought that I was weak and easy to bully, and the reason I could become the Suzaku envoy was because I sold my beauty.
When Feng Xuanji talked about how she stole martial arts and deceived everyone, a rare look of pride appeared on her face...
Don't reveal what I told you today to others, or I will be in big trouble.
Don't worry, I will keep it a secret.

According to my investigation, the current sect leader of the Holy Fire Sect, Fang Xiaoian, was just a reckless man, impulsive and reckless. But for some reason, the previous sect leader valued him very much.
In order to temper Fang Xiaoian's temperament, the previous sect leader deliberately threw him into the uninhabited desert, letting him endure ten days and nights alone in the desert.
After returning from the desert, Fang Xiaoian seemed to have changed into a different person, calm and meticulous, and his cultivation improved by leaps and bounds.
It was then that he personally led people to kidnap me into the Holy Fire Sect, and in the same year, he took the position of the sect leader of the Holy Fire Sect.

After he became the sect leader, he once again recovered his violent nature from his early years, often causing massacres, repeatedly provoking surrounding forces, and the Holy Fire Sect was also retaliated against by various forces several times.
In recent years, for some reason, Fang Xiaoian often retreats, as short as ten days, as long as several months, during which he hands over all affairs to the Azure Dragon envoy.

The Azure Dragon envoy seemed to have noticed my secret of practicing superior martial arts in secret, and felt that I would be a major obstacle to his future pursuit of the deputy sect leader, so he made things difficult for me. Back then, thanks to the White Tiger envoy's protection...
Feng Xuanji revealed to you many unknown secrets about Fang Xiaoian and the internal affairs of the Holy Fire Sect...
Now that I've spoken out these secrets that have been held in my heart for many years, I feel so relieved and comfortable.
You've been wronged all these years.
Sometimes I'm not sure whether it's fortunate or unfortunate to have come this far.
Although your current position is not absolutely detached, the number of people who can threaten you is already very few. This is the result of your efforts over the years.
With your skills, you should be able to control most of your future destiny now. You will make your life better and more valuable.
Listening to your words, I suddenly see the light. I really should start thinking about my future.

On the eve of the destruction of the Divine Ox Kingdom, the king buried the national treasure, and no one knew where it was afterwards.

Recently, there have been rumors in the martial arts world that the treasure map marking the location of the treasure has appeared, and the Divine Ox Treasury is finally going to see the light of day.
Unfortunately, the treasure map fell into the hands of the Holy Fire Sect. If they plan to swallow the treasure, others won't get a single drop.
