Gu Qing Yang practices Cold Yin Energy, his sword energy carries cold Yin MP, Brother Zi Tian is showing symptoms of cold invasion!
Quickly take Brother Zi Tian to the Flame Sand Cave for treatment, no one is allowed to disturb!
It seems that Brother Zi Tian is seriously injured.
The only solution now is the Flame Toad in the Flame Toad Cave that can remove the cold qi in Brother Zi Tian's body.
I'll go find the Flame Toad to treat Brother Zi Tian's injuries.
Thank you, {PlayerSurName} brother.
Now that the Flame Toad has been tamed, take it to treat Zi Tian.
You told Huo Shilou everything that happened in the Flame Toad Cave...
Ah, Brother He...
The urgent task is to ask {PlayerSurName} brother to go to the Flame Sand Cave to treat Brother Zi Tian.
If the Guard stops you, you can tell them that Huo has allowed you to enter the Flame Sand Cave at any time.
Brother Zi Tian, I brought the Flame Toad to treat your injuries.
Thank you, {PlayerSurName} brother.
One shichen later...
It really worked, the cold qi in the body has been completely expelled!
I'm going to find the leader, ask him to help me gather manpower, I'm going to settle accounts with the Holy Fire Sect!
{PlayerName}, if you choose to be an enemy of the Holy Fire Sect, this Flame Toad Cave will be your final resting place!
How did you know I came here to find the Flame Toad?
Of course someone told us, and it was someone from the Cold Skin Gang.
It's you! You're the one who tipped off the Holy Fire Sect!
He Denuo, this man in front of you is the Nomination Certificate you gave to the Holy Fire Sect, kill him, let us see your sincerity.
column3: เหอเต๋อนัว ชายที่อยู่ตรงหน้าเจ้าคือใบรับรองการยอมจำนนที่เจ้าจะมอบให้กับนิกายไฟศักดิ์สิทธิ์ ฆ่าเขาซะ เพื่อพิสูจน์ความจริงใจของเจ้า

column2: He Denuo, don't be stubborn, do you really want to be a traitor to the Cold Skin Gang!
column3: เหอเต๋อนัว อย่าดื้อดึงไป อยากทรยศพรรคมังสาเหมันต์จริงๆ หรือ?

column2: {PlayerName}, you're right, the leader doesn't want the brothers to continue killing, he's seeking a stable life for everyone...
The wealth accumulated by the Cold Skin Gang is all used for the construction of Flame City, I have seen countless people living in the city, smiling from the heart...
The leader has been very kind to me, he has spared no effort to seek medical treatment for the Flame Toad poison in my body...
As for why I leaked the secret today...

I originally planned to use this opportunity to lure out the Green Dragon Envoy Gu Qing Yang, and join forces with {PlayerSurName} brother to kill him here, but he learned in advance that his skills would be restrained by the environment here, so he declined to come.
Ah, what a pity.
You dare to play us!
I was really worried just now, I thought you really betrayed the Cold Skin Gang.
If it wasn't for you waking me up, I might have made a big mistake.\nNo matter what, I have betrayed the leader's trust, I will go back to plead guilty, and let the leader punish me.
{PlayerSurName} brother, take care.\nIf there's a chance in the future, let's join forces to defeat the enemy.
Brother He died in battle... In his final fight, he chose the most brutal way to die, perhaps to prove his loyalty.
{PlayerName}, you will never understand my situation, you will never feel the coldness and exploitation of others!
Master Fang is a man of great talent and strategy, he is destined to be the overlord of the Western Regions, only by following him can I truly rise!
No sect can ever trust a traitor!
So, only by killing you can I prove my sincerity and worth!
Wolf, you ungrateful creature, despite the great care and training from the leader, today is a good day to clean up the Cold Skin Gang.
Now that the matters of the Cold Skin Gang have been resolved, it's a bit boring with nothing to do.
What a peculiar toad, its body is blood red, could it really have emerged from the magma underground!
It seems this is the Flame Toad that caused HealZi Tian's illness, watch me tame it!
Ribbit~
This creature has a poisonous skin, it seems I need to find a poison expert to help.
This creature's skin is poisonous, but it's nothing to me.
This creature's skin is poisonous, but luckily there's a poison expert in the team, so there's nothing to worry about.
It seems I underestimated this little thing, taming it is not as easy as I thought.
Ribbit~
What's going on, shouldn't it obediently wait to be tamed after being defeated?
It seems my animal communication skills are not enough, I can't understand what it means.
You mean you want to eat... rocks?
Ribbit~
(Swallowed a stone that fell from the Ore pile)
So you love to eat the Fire Sulfur here! Okay, wait here, I'll go mine some for you.
Your outfit is quite unique, are you not from the Central Plains?
column3: เสื้อผ้าเจ้าดูโดดเด่นนัก เจ้าไมได้มาจากจงหยวนสินะ?

column2: Isn't this hat very distinctive? It allows others to recognize my difference at a glance among the crowd.
Are you here at the God of Marriage's Shrine to find a marriage partner? Are you afraid of not being noticed, so you dress uniquely to attract attention?
Joke! I, Pear Blossom, am full of charm, why would I be afraid of not finding a marriage partner?\nIn my last life, oh no, last month, I just got married to eighteen ladies.
My apologies, so you are a spiritual master who doesn't show off, indeed one should not judge a book by its cover.

The most important thing in the martial world is "Dharma, Wealth, Companion, Land", this "Companion" refers to a partner. You're not still single, are you? Is it that hard to find a suitable female companion?

Let me, your senior, share some experience with you. The people of the martial world don't care much about those complicated rituals, generally, there are only two ways for female knights to get married.

The first situation is when two people are birds of a feather, and their relations have reached the <color=#c44b0e>Inseparable</color> level, bring your female companion to this God of Marriage's Shrine to pray for blessings from the matchmaker, it must be just the two of you, don't bring any other people, don't say I didn't warn you.

For the first situation, you should prepare the Wedding Stone in advance, so you don't find out you didn't bring the Wedding Stone at the crucial moment after setting the mood, not only would it be a wasted trip, but it would also affect the woman's mood, which is a troublesome matter.
The second situation, these female knights generally have a strong personality, they don't believe in traditional beliefs like blessings from the matchmaker, they believe more in their own feelings.
As long as you accompany them through some experiences, or help them fulfill their wishes, they will secretly fall for you.
As for how to discern which situation a female knight falls into, I still have no clue to this day, I can only eliminate them one by one.
Out of the vast sea of love, you only drink a ladleful. You are still devoted in this flourishing world, truly a rare good lad.

As a senior, I need to remind you, you are surrounded by beauties, wanting to benefit equally is probably impossible, I just hope you treat each relationship seriously, don't let down those women who truly love you.
What! The number of people you have bonded with is even more than mine?!
Indeed, the waves behind drive on those before, the younger generation is to be feared!
No, my life has been too comfortable recently, I need to keep striving!
The title of Love Saint is only temporarily placed with you, one day I will take it back!
Wait for me!
I thought you heard the name of the Sacred Fire Sect and were scared to come, you have guts, kid!
Sect Leader, this is the kid I mentioned to you who helped me find the treasure map at the Chang'an Inn.
Hey, this is our Sect Leader Fang Xiaoian, hurry up and pay your respects!
{PlayerName} pays respects to the Sect Leader.
A good bird chooses a tree to nest in, if you can wholeheartedly work for the Sacred Fire Sect in the future, I, the Sect Leader, will definitely not treat you badly.
I, the Sect Leader, always reward and punish clearly, this little trinket is a gift for you, you should be glad you didn't choose to oppose the Sacred Fire Sect.
Thank you, Sect Leader.
Where has the Xuanwu Envoy run off to!
Could it be that he sneaked out for a drink again?
If he messes things up, I won't let him off!
The Holy Fire Sect does not keep useless people.
Subordinate has an urgent matter to report to the Sect Leader, please make a decision, Sect Leader.
Speak!
Cold Skin Gang's second in command, Zi Tian, was spying on the Sacred Fire Sect, was discovered and injured by me, he should not have escaped far, I have ordered people to search for him.
However, Zi Tian is far from an ordinary expert, the people sent may not be able to restrain Zi Tian, what do you think...
The matter has been handled, the Sacred Fire Sect owes me another favor.
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, you helped the Sacred Fire Sect capture the second in command of the Cold Skin Gang, this is a great merit, this manual is a reward for you, as a reward for this time.
Thank you, Sect Leader.
There is a letter that needs to be delivered to Huo Shilou of the Cold Skin Gang. Can you do this favor for me?
Leave it to me.
With the second in command of the Cold Skin Gang in my hands, Huo Shilou will be afraid to act rashly, this time I'm not afraid he won't submit, hahaha.
Subordinate has an urgent matter to report to the Sect Leader, please make a decision, Sect Leader.
Speak!
Cold Skin Gang's second in command, Zi Tian, was spying on the Sacred Fire Sect, was discovered and luckily escaped with injuries, I have sent people to search for him.
However, Zi Tian is far from an ordinary expert, the people sent may not be able to restrain Zi Tian, what do you think...
{PlayerSurName} Young hero, you've heard the situation. The Cold Skin Gang is despicable and shameless, even sending people to spy on our Holy Fire Sect. They must be fearless!

Now the Sacred Fire Sect is short of hands, dealing with this kind of martial arts expert is really hard, I, the Sect Leader, would like to ask the young hero to take a trip and assist the Sacred Fire Sect disciples in capturing the second in command of the Cold Skin Gang, there will be a great reward afterwards!
I will do my best!
Leader Huo, Sect Leader Fang of the Holy Fire Sect asked me to deliver a letter to you.
You actually became a messenger for the Holy Fire Sect, you're really helping the tyrant.
(Hand Huo Shilou something)
This, this is...
This is a strand of hair from Brother Zi Tian!
{yell}What have you done to Brother Zi Tian?
Brother Zi Tian is doing very well, Leader Huo, there's no need to worry.
I, Huo, need to see Brother Zi Tian safe and sound before I can agree to the request in Sect Leader Fang's letter.
Since you don't trust me, then so be it. When you figure out the pros and cons, come find me.
Wait! Go back and tell Fang Xiaoian that I will send someone to deliver the item, and I hope he keeps his word!
Also, if Brother Zi Tian is missing even a single hair, my Cold Skin Gang will never stop fighting with the Holy Fire Sect!
I'll take my leave.
The letter has been delivered, and Huo Shilou has agreed to the sect leader's request.
Hahaha, Huo Shilou's weakness is his brother under Helper, it's too easy to manipulate. Zi Tian is useless now, let him go, so as not to waste the food of the Holy Fire Sect.
{PlayerSurName} Brother, you finally came, I've been waiting for you!
Boss, this is the brother {PlayerSurName} I mentioned to you!\nIf it weren't for his help at the Chang'an Inn, I might have fallen into the hands of the Holy Fire Sect.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, this is our Cold Skin Gang's boss, Huo Shilou!
Greetings to Boss Huo.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, you have helped Brother Coin many times, so we are all brothers, no need to be polite.
Brother {PlayerSurName}, you must be tired from the journey. You can rest at the inn in the city. Brother {PlayerSurName} is one of us, so the accommodation is free of charge.
Thank you, Boss Huo.
Why hasn't Brother Coin returned yet?
Did he encounter any trouble on the way?
I shouldn't have let him go alone.
Sigh...
column3: เฮ้อ...

column2: A Mountain cave is found here, for some reason, there is a heat wave coming, as if there is something extremely hot in the Mountain cave.
{PlayerSurName} young hero, can you do me a small favor?
There is a letter that I need you to deliver to a woman with the surname Feng in the Holy Fire Sect.
Why do you think I would go to the Holy Fire Sect? Besides, I don't even know where the Holy Fire Sect is.
That's not a problem, if you don't know where the Holy Fire Sect is, I'll tell you.
Why do you think I would go to the Holy Fire Sect?
Vagabonds coming to the Western Regions will inevitably have Relations with the Holy Fire Sect sooner or later, whether they are friends or enemies depends on their own fate.
I'll give it a try, but let me make it clear in advance, if I become an enemy with the Holy Fire Sect, I won't deliver the letter willingly.
That's natural, it's just a desperate attempt, if the message can be delivered, that's good, if not, then let it be.
This is a letter from the Innkeeper of Chang'an Inn for you.
Thank you, young hero, for your hard work.
column3: ขอบคุณจอมยุทธน้อย ลำบากท่านแล้ว

column2: (Take the letter)
I see...
I didn't expect the Xuanwu Envoy to be so shameless...
(She is so engrossed in reading this letter, I better not disturb her for now)
Hmm? What's that...\nThere seems to be a wisp of smoke over there. Was there something there before?
I'm a bit curious, let's go check it out.
Huh? Where's the Plum Blossom Village that was here before? I clearly remember it being here, but now it's suddenly gone.
Hmm? Young man, are you looking for something?
Traveling salesman, the thing is, I clearly remember there being a village here, but now I can't find it no matter what...
A village? Young man, you must be dreaming. There's no village here.
Dreaming? But I clearly remember the Plum Blossom Village being here...
Plum Blossom Village? Isn't that...
Sir, do you know this name?
Ah no no no.\nHey young man, I advise you to stay in a proper inn next time, don't sleep outdoors anymore.
Could it really have been just a dream?
Is this position okay?
Let me see... a little higher.
Like this?
Good, right here!
Heave ho...
Crack
Old Wang, are you okay!
My, my back...
This, this is not a joke! You better go rest, I'll figure out the lantern...
Did you two encounter something hard?
You're too kind, as you can see, we're hanging lanterns.
Sigh, this old body is no good...
Since you're here, if you have time, could you help hang the lanterns?
No problem, leave it to me.
Under the direction of the Village Head, you efficiently hang all the lanterns in the village.
Phew... finally, all are hung.
Thank you so much, if it weren't for your help, we really wouldn't know what to do.
I've been wanting to ask since earlier, why are you two hanging the lanterns? Where are the young people in the village?
Sigh, the young people have all run away to the city to pursue their dreams, leaving only the old and children in the village.
Isn't it the New Year? The young people should be coming back from the city.\nWe old men just want to decorate the village to welcome the young people home.
So that's how it is...
Since the young hero is here at this time, it must be fate.\nIf the young hero doesn't mind, stay in the village for the New Year.
Is... is that okay?
No relations, the young people haven't come back yet, everyone in the village is preparing for the New Year. The village has been quiet for too long, we also want to be a little lively.
Well then, I'll respectfully comply.
Wait until <color=#c44b0e>all the young people come back, we will hold a New Year's Eve celebration</color>, please make sure the young hero doesn't miss it.
When will they be able to come back?
I'm not sure, it could be a few shichen, or a day...
Is there anything I can help with?

Celebrating the New Year requires a lot of firecrackers, but Liu Lao Si, who makes firecrackers, is not sure what he's thinking, the number of firecrackers he provides is far from enough. If the young hero wants to help, you might start with him.
Okay, I'll go check it out.
Oh... my back...
Are you okay, old man?
Ah, I can't deny my age...\nBack in the day, let alone hanging lanterns, even climbing the city gate was nothing, sigh...
Oh, it hurts...\nI can't move at all, it hurts as soon as I move...
Old man, I know a little about medical, let me take a look.
Okay, you take a look.
(Gently touches the old man's waist)
Miss Wang You, how is the old man's injury?

It's just a strain from overexertion, it didn't hurt the bones.\nJust need to use gold needles and apply some medicine, it can be relieved, but the old man has an old injury, so the needle placement needs to be careful.
{PlayerName}, I'll stay here to treat the old man for now, if you want to run away from the village, I'll follow you.
Okay.
{PlayerName}, I'm treating the old man, please don't disturb me for now.\nIf you want to run away from the village, I'll follow you.
You seem to have twisted it, let me massage it for you?
Okay, be gentle...
Don't worry, although I'm not good at medical, I'm good at massage and bone setting.
(Gently presses the old man's lower back)
It's indeed a sprain, but you should have an old injury, so I need to be careful when massaging you.
{PlayerName}, I need to stay here to heal him for now, but I'll follow you when you run away from the village.
{PlayerName}, I can't be distracted for now.\nIf you want to run away from the village, I'll follow you.
I know a little about medical, let me take a look at the old man?
Okay, you take a look.
The bone... is fine.\nThe muscles are tense, old man, you should have a strain.
This feeling... old man, do you have an old injury on your waist?
Yes... I fell off the roof when I was young.
Your injury is not serious, old man, but because of the old injury, it will take extra time to treat.
If you have something to do, young hero, go ahead, don't spend too much time on me.
Should I treat the old man's injury?
Then I'll leave it to you, young hero.
You carefully heal the old man's waist.\nTwo shichen later...
Young hero, your medical skills are not bad, my waist doesn't hurt at all now.
I've only temporarily treated you, for the next three months, you must not lift heavy objects or engage in farming.
I understand, I will definitely be more careful.
It's a pity that I don't know medical skills, otherwise I could heal the old man.
It's okay, young hero, don't worry about it, I'll be fine in a few days.
Big brother, do you have time now?
Hmm? What's the matter, little friend?
We want to build a snowman, but the head of the snowman is too big, we can't lift it.
Big brother, you look very strong, can you help us lift the head of the snowman?
What's so difficult about this, it's a piece of cake~
A moment later.
Big brother is really amazing~
Thank you, big brother~
It's just a small effort, it's nothing.
With this, the snowman is almost done.
No, no, it still lacks a nose and eyes!
Uh, right.
What are you going to use for the snowman's nose and eyes?
Uh... this...
I know! Last year, my dad used coal balls for the eyes and a carrot for the nose when he built a snowman for me!
That's right! And branches for arms!
Carrot, branch and coal balls...
These are common things, we can find them ourselves~
It looks like fun, can I play with them, big brother?
Of course, but when it's time to leave, you must follow me obediently.
Yay! Big brother is the best!
Big brother, building a snowman is so much fun~
Is this snow... I want to play too!
Okay, be careful, or the sisters in your workshop won't let me off.
Don't worry, big brother, if you leave the village, I will follow you~
Big brother, do you want to build a snowman with me~
Big brother, do you want to come and build a snowman?
Big brother, have you found the body part of the snowman?
Thank you, big brother, we'll go and put it on right away~
It's done~
Wait, there's still one piece missing~
Job well done~
Wow, it looks just like me~
Thank you, big brother, without your help, we wouldn't have been able to build this snowman~
Daddy says we should thank those who help us, but we don't have anything to give to big brother.
Don't worry about it, your happiness is the best gift for me.
Are you interested in firecrackers, young hero?
I am {PlayerName}, I heard from the Village Head that the village needs a large number of firecrackers, but the current amount is far from enough, so I came to ask about your situation, uncle.
Just call me Fourth Uncle, sigh, I didn't expect you to come for this, yes, there is such a situation.
Did you encounter any difficulties? Is there anything I can help with?
Sigh, don't laugh at me, young hero, I, Old Fourth Liu, have been making firecrackers all my life, but recently, even my grandchildren don't like the firecrackers I make.
I've been worrying about this recently, I want to make firecrackers that everyone likes.
I see, do you need me to ask the children in the village what kind of firecrackers they like?
No need, I've recently had a good idea, it's sure to make a big splash!
But... the red paper used for firecrackers has run out, and the rest has been taken by Old Chen at the entrance of the village. I wonder if the young hero could help me get it back?
It's convenient, but why doesn't Uncle Liu go by himself?
Old Chen has a very explosive temper. He took all the paper without saying a word in the morning. With his temper, if I go to ask him, he would rather eat the paper than give it to me.
I see, then I'll go ask him.
Young hero, have you got the red paper?
Not yet, Uncle Liu, please wait a moment.
Uncle Liu, I've asked Old Chen to give you the red paper.
I wondered why he would willingly return the paper to me, it turns out it's thanks to the young hero! With these, I can make a firecracker that will shock everyone!
First, glue the red paper into a barrel shape...
Add sulfur, saltpeter, and charcoal...
Finally, shape it... Done!
Is this the firecracker that Uncle Liu said would shock everyone?
Of course, this is the crystallization of my life's work!\nI guarantee with my craftsmanship that everyone will love this firecracker!
Come on, let's go to the entrance of the village and try it out!
Light the fuse
Off you go!
Uncle Liu, are you sure this is a firecracker?
This, maybe I put a little too much gunpowder...
What just happened? Was it an earthquake?
You briefly explain what happened to the Village Head.
Oh, I see...\nOld Fourth, are you planning to celebrate the New Year with this new firecracker?
Village Head, I...
Old Fourth... Everyone doesn't say it, but actually, everyone loves your firecrackers. Without your firecrackers, it's like cooking without salt, lacking a lot of flavor.
I understand your mood to create a new style of firecracker, but haste makes waste. The current priority is to celebrate the New Year. After the first month, we can research firecrackers, okay?
I understand, I will make a batch of firecrackers in the old way, and ensure that they are ready before the celebration!
Oh, I see...\nOld Fourth, is the New Year's firecracker delayed because of this thing?
Village Head, I...
Old Fourth... Everyone doesn't say it, but actually, everyone loves your firecrackers. Without your firecrackers, it's like cooking without salt, lacking a lot of flavor.
I thought you would understand, Old Fourth, but...
Village Head, don't say anything else, I promise that when the sky gets dark again, my firecrackers will appear all over the village!
Good, I feel relieved with your words.
Ah, it's embarrassing for the young hero to see this. I didn't expect that the new type of firecracker I've been researching for so long turned out to be useless...
I don't think so. Uncle Liu, your firecracker is so powerful. If you carry some with you, you can use it to fend off enemies in the future.
I never thought of this use. Young hero, you may find it useful in your travels.

However, there is still room for improvement in this formula. I am now making firecrackers for the celebration. After the celebration, I will slightly improve the formula and teach it to the young hero!
Okay, I'll come to Uncle Liu for the request after the celebration.

However, there is still room for improvement in this formula. The current priority is to rush to make a batch of firecrackers. After tonight, I will improve the formula and teach it to the young hero tomorrow!
Okay, I'll come to Uncle Liu for the request tomorrow.
Young hero, I'm busy making firecrackers. Let's talk about it later.
Old man...
Go, go, go, can't you see I'm busy!
I wonder if there's anything bothering you, old man. Is there anything I can help with?
You? Can you read?
Old man Chen, I'd like to ask you for some red paper...
Red paper? I'm using it right now, I don't have any to give you!
(It seems that the old man's troubles have something to do with this red paper. It seems that if I want the red paper, I'll have to help him solve his troubles first.)
I wonder if there's anything bothering you, old man. Is there anything I can help with?
You? Can you read?
Can I read? Of course I can, old man. Why do you ask?
That's good if you can read, quickly help me look at this couplet on the roll.
"Fortune and prosperity come with the spring", old man, what's wrong with this couplet?
I had this written by a young scholar in a nearby village a while ago, and I've been keeping it in the back room, but I don't know when the lower couplet was chewed up by a mouse.
I can't read many characters, so I can only try to draw them out. I've wasted a lot of paper in just a short time.
Since you can read, please help me write the lower couplet!
Do you remember what the lower couplet was, old man?
I've told you, I can't read, how could I possibly remember?
Then this lower couplet should be...
I remember that the lower couplet corresponding to this upper couplet should be "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year". It's a spring couplet praying for blessings and auspiciousness.
As expected of sister Mengdie.
{PlayerSurName} brother, this lower couplet should be "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".
Right, right, right, I was just about to say that, but brother Cai beat me to it.
In that case, I was too impatient.
I think, this lower couplet should be "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".
I didn't expect brother Lu to have studied this couplet?
{PlayerSurName} brother is joking, I've just read a few books.
I'm presumptuous, but this lower couplet should be "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".
Miss Wan'er, do you know this?
The gentleman is joking, I just know a little bit.
This can't stump me, the lower couplet should be "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".
Master Lv, do you understand spring couplets?
There's a lot I can do, I'm just usually mysterious.
This can't stump me, the lower couplet is "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".
I've already asked someone, the lower couplet is "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".
I don't have any clues either, let me go ask someone.
Young hero, have you thought of the lower couplet?
This lower couplet should be...
I have a request for the Village Head.
{PlayerSurName} young master, please speak.

I recently learned of a couplet, but the lower couplet is missing. I only know that the upper couplet is "Fortune and prosperity come with the spring". I wonder if the Village Head knows what the lower couplet is?
Of course I know, the lower couplet is "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".
Thank you for telling me, Village Head.
Hello, sir, I have a couplet I'd like to ask you.
Young friend, please speak.
The upper couplet is "Fortune and prosperity come with the spring".

That's simple, the lower couplet is "Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year".\nAh, you young people nowadays, how come you don't even know this, all you think about is fighting and killing, you don't even know this bit of knowledge...
Thank you, Dean, I will study hard.
Hello, sir, I have a couplet I'd like to ask you.
Couplet? Say it, there's no couplet that can stump me, the "Couplet King of Daliang"!
The upper couplet is "Fortune and prosperity come with the spring".
Good fortune and auspiciousness come with the year.
As expected of the "Couplet King of Daliang", you're amazing, sir.
That's natural.
Yes, yes, yes, this lower couplet is indeed this, I have some impression, the old scholar said it!
Now that you know what the lower couplet is, could you please help me write it down?
Leave it to me.
Then I'll have to trouble the senior.
A moment later.
It's done.
Quick, let me see!
Amazing, the handwriting is exactly the same as before!
Imitating handwriting is just a small skill, not worth mentioning.
Just writing a couplet, leave it to me.
Then I'll leave it to Brother Ling.
A moment later.
Mission accomplished.
Quick, let me see!
This... although it seems to be well written, the handwriting is much more bold.
The original handwriting was too delicate, not my style.
It seems that it's finally time for me to show my hand!
A moment later.
It's done.
